story:
La Vocation du WORLD KINDNESS MOVEMENT:


Le Mouvement Mondial de la Gentillesse et de la Bienveillance -présent dans 23 pays - a pour mission d’inviter chaque être humain à révéler son intelligence du coeur, par l’expression créative de sa bienveillance et sa gentillesse. Se soutenir mutuellement pour révéler ensemble la destinée extraordinaire de chacun et de l’Humanité entière.


The mission of The World Kindness Movement

The global movement of Kindness is alive in 23 countries and the goal is to invite every individuals to listen to their hearts, by the creative expression of Kindness. To support each other to reveal together the extraordinary destiny of everyone and the humanity.



Aimer - Connecter -  Inspirer - Accueillir - Créer 

Love - Connect- Inspire- Host- Create


L'ONG World Kindness France est l’antenne en France de cette assemblée internationale à caractère humanitaire, à visée apolitique et areligieuse. Elle aide les personnes, les organisations et les populations dans l'expression créative de la bienveillance, de la gentillesse et de l'entraide, de manière à agir à l'émergence d'un nouveau “vivre et travailler ensemble”, qui soit bénéfique, joyeux et bienfaisant pour tous.


The NGO World kindness France is the pole in France of this international meeting with an humanitarian caracter refered to a non-politiacal and non-religious. 

It support people, organizations, and populations in the creative expression of Kindness in order to act for the manifestation of a new “live and colaborate together” around happiness and kindness for the whole.

____________________________________________________________________

LE PROJET

Pour son lancement en France, le World Kindness Movement trouve important d’agir pour la jeunesse qui fait face aux difficultés liées à la crise afin de la transformer en opportunité.

The World Kindness France lance donc un projet pilote pour re dynamiser la jeunesse, lui redonner confiance, et qu’elle puisse croire en ses rêves.


For the launching of the World Kindness France, It felt important to offer our support to the youth facing difficult situations connected to the crisis in order to transform it into opportunity.

The World Kindness France is organizing a new project to empower the youth, to bring a new energy to get confidance so they can believe in their dreams.


Les 27 et 28 Juin 2015, des personnalités nationales et internationales se rassemblent pour célébrer la jeunesse, et lui offrir des outils pour qu’elle puisse réaliser tous ses projets.

Réserver en ligne !!!

https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-grand-show-pour-la-jeunesse-17151819554

Le but de ce week-end sera de : 

  • Offrir l’accès a des outils exceptionnel de réussite 

  • Créer la dynamique collective et la mise en lumière du potentiel de la jeunesse

  • Former des jeunes pour qu’ils puissent aider d’autres jeunes à réussir à leur tour

  • Soutenir leurs talents uniques dans le monde et l’expression de leur plein potentiel


The 27th and 28th of June 2015, national and international personalities will be gathered to encourage the youth, offer them tools so they will be able to undertake their own projects and reach their dreams. 

Reserve Online !!!

https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-grand-show-pour-la-jeunesse-17151819554

The goal of this week-end will be:

  • Offer the access to exceptional tools of success 

  • Create a collective dynamic and let everyone’s potential be seen

  • Train some young people so they can train others in return

  • Support their unique qualities and the expression of their full potential



UNE PREMIÈRE EN FRANCE 

The first LAUNCHING in France


Le 27 Juin 2015 aura d’abord lieu la Cérémonie Officielle d’inauguration de l’ONG WORLD KINDNESS FRANCE avec la présence de personnalités officielles  et sera suivie d’une Grande Soirée Unique réservée aux jeunes

Un cocktail détonnant entre un SHOW et une conférence.


The 27th of June 2015 will start with the Official inauguration of the NGO France World Kindness France with leaders from many corners of the world and will follow with the special and unique event reserved to the youth.

A Cocktail will be served in between both to give the space to what ever wants to emerge.


La venue EXCEPTIONNELLE de DAVID LAROCHE, un jeune coach international, spécialisé sur le développement de la confiance en soi et l'atteinte d'objectifs.

"LES DECLICS", association lyonnaise sont de la partie pour offrir les meilleurs outils pour révéler son potentiel afin de relever les défis de la vie.

En première partie BODYART, groupe d'artiste, Athlètes de rue viennent enflammer les planches de la salle polyvalente de Montfavet, avec leur spectacle ATHLETES DE RUE, vu sur M6 en demi finale de la France à un INCROYABLE TALENT.


The EXCEPTIONAL coming of DAVID LAROCHE, a young international trainer, focused on the personnel developement of confidance and reaching your goals.

“LES DECLICS”, an organization from Lyon (France) are part of the party to offer incredible tools to reveale the full potential in order to transform the challenges of life.

In the first part BODYART, a group of artists, street athletes are coming to set on fire the stage of La Salle Polyvalente de Montfavet, with their show.



_____________________________________________________________________________

Le samedi 27 JUIN, 19H30

Show des Body Art, Athlètes de rue

DAVID s'adresse aux jeunes accompagné des Déclics

Le Dimanche 28 JUIN, 13h30

Open Space : opportunité de présenter un projet et d’être soutenu

Echange entre les membres internationaux du WKM et les jeunes

Toute la journée : Formation des Déclics “Climb to the Top” pour 20 jeunes


Saturday 27th of June, 7.30pm 

Show of Body art, street Athletes 

DAVID talk to the youth with Les Declics 

Sunday 28th June, 1.30pm 

Open Space: Opportunity to present your projects and be supported 

Engage with the internationals members of WKM and the youth 

The all day: The training with the Declics "Climb to the top" for 20 people


_____________________________________________________________________________


Au programme:

The Program:


  •  Gagner et activer la confiance en soi,
  •  Histoires inspirantes,
  •  Oser passer à l'action,
  •  Gérer et évacuer le stress,
  •  Améliorer tes capacités d'apprentissage,
  •  Reprendre le pouvoir sur ta vie
  •  Rencontres des artistes - BODYART - en action avec les meilleurs coach LES DECLICS,

  •  Gain and activate confidance in yourself
  •  Inspiring stories
  •  Dare to go into action
  •  Manage and evacuate your stress
  •  Improve your learning capacities
  •  Take on power into your life
  •  Meeting artists - BODYART - in action with amazing coachs LES DECLICS 
_____________________________________________________________________________
Ce dont nous avons besoin pour réaliser ce projet

Pour organiser ce week-end, le WKF a besoin de 45 000 euros.

Cette levée de fond servira entre autre à:

  • Payer les intervenants et l'équipe Provence 

  • Financer la formation des Déclics pour 20 jeunes pour leur donner tous les outils nécessaires à la réalisation de leurs projets,

  • Logement 

  • Nourriture

  • Transports

  • Communication

  • Location de la Salle Polyvalente 

  • Equipe de Film 


To organize this Week-end, the World Kindness France need about 45 000 euros to make it happen.

This amount of money will serve for:

  • Accomodation

  • Food

  • Transport

  • Communication

  • Marketing

  • Salary

  • Film markers

  • Rent the building

_____________________________________________________________________________

L'impact


L’impact de ce projet est de faire réaliser à chaque être humain qu'il détient les capacités unique pour réaliser son rêve. Faire vivre aux jeunes l’expérience ensemble qu’une autre réalité est possible et que ça vient de leur force intérieur.

La solidarité et l’entraide sont un atout majeur aujourd’hui pour pouvoir co-créer ensemble notre avenir.


The Impact of this project will be to bring concsiouness to every human beings about their unique capacities they have to achieve their dreams.They can experiment together another possible reality and realize that it comes from their inner force.  

The solidarity and the support that we can give to each other, is today essential in order to co-create together our future.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Une équipe dont beaucoup de bénévoles travaillent sur ce projet depuis plus de 6 mois, donnent toute leur énergie possible pour la réalisation de ce projet.

Les défis de cet évènements sont de :

  • Rassembler 700 jeunes

  • Récolter 45 000 euros

A team of co-workers with many volunteers has been working on this project for more then 6 months and gave their best to make this event happen. 
The challenges of this event are: 
  • Gather 700 young people
  • Harvest 45 000 euros 
_____________________________________________________________________________

D'autres façons de nous aider

Other ways to support us 


Si vous ne pouvez pas nous soutenir financièrement vous le pouvez autrement en partageant l’information avec votre réseau !!!

If you can not support us financialy, you can do it in another way by sharing this project with your network !!! 


MERCI Du fond du coeur 

THANK YOU from the deepest place of our hearts

If you can not support us financialy, you can do it in another way by sharing this project with your network !!! 

MERCI Du fond du coeur 
THANK YOU from the deepest place of our hearts

story:
We hope can help 10.000 children in Indonesia can Finish their Study in Elementary School. Beyond that, we dream they can find their potentials & be someone who can give impact to community.


Persada Foundation is a non profit organization focus on education, especially for south east asia region. Our vision is to educate people by finding out their potentials and nourishing their capacities to the well-being of society.

More than 1 Million Children in Indonesia still can't have an education in Elementary School.

In 21st century we still find out more than 1 million children in Indonesia can't have an education in elementary level. This is not only because of their economic condition, but also the scarcity of schools in villages and capability teachers to teach in manners. 

Every young person deserves to have a great education and teachers so they can have a better future and give impact to their changing world.

What We Need?

Why do We Need the Money?

We've provided school's infrastructure, built new schools, trained skilled elementary teachers, did leadership camp and youth conference and provided school's facilities to support the socio-economic improvement of well-being society. We also provided coaching and mentoring sessions for parents, teachers and government officer so they can get involved to the bigger purposes. But, we need your help to bring these activities to more areas and villages in Indonesia. Your support will provide a development of schools building, facilities and training for teachers.

Among non profits, Persada foundation  is incredibly cost-effective. We have low administrative costs (<10%). Besides, all of our administrative costs are already covered by existing donors and sponsors. So are the costs of implementing our overly year program.  

So, every dollar you donate will be used only on providing the 100 school developments, school facilities and training for 300 teachers. 
Beyond money - we need your help spreading this momentum.

At its heart, 10.000 young age go to school program is a revolutionary movement from Indonesian young generation who cares about their generation’s future, teachers and parents. Whether you donate or not, you still can make a history for your community and society by providing the opportunity for young people to get a better education.

Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word of #10.000Young-ageGoToSchool
  • Contact Indonesian Young Community in your area to develop the movement of #10.000Young-ageGoToSchool
  • Stay Connected. Follow persadafoundation.org to stay update of our movement

Recognizing your Generosity. Thank You!

The work we do touches students’ lives in a meaningful way. Every dollar you give will touch one student, who will learn about your support. We thank you, and so do all the young-age all over Indonesia. Terima kasih (thank you).

story:
Short Summary

 

  • about school film clubs Jordan:

  • my name is Mahmoud abed Hamash and I am a Jordanian teacher and filmmaker .i have been a teacher for more than 10 years now  and I am a Winner of   queen Rania excellence prize for teachers – first rank – for the year 2017. and I am Experienced trainer of trainers with 13 year of experience 
  • this is my Facebook page : https://web.facebook.com/trainer.mahmoud.hammash/

  •  

  • school film clubs initiative puts film at the heart of the educational and personal development of children and young people across  Jordan and the region  .

  • We support teachers and educators to achieve a wide range of effective learning outcomes in their use of film. Our program includes a network of extra-curricular film clubs, resources for use in clubs and in the classroom, training opportunities, a cinema-based film festival for kids . It has been designed to meet the needs of all teachers in Jordan.

  • this is our Facebook page : https://web.facebook.com/filmclubsJordan/

we work in 4 areas :

1- Teacher training: we have created a trainer course for teachers with the name (T.O.T  filmmaking in education for teachers) that enables teachers to train other teachers and there students. And also helps them to create school film clubs in their schools.

we have trained tell now 90 teachers and 200 students .

2- Student training: we have created a student course in filmmaking and it is A FUN, SIMPLE AND VALUABLE WAY TO ENGAGE YOUNG PEOPLE IN FILM .

3- We want to create the first children film festival in Jordan with a film-curriculum competition .

4- We provide the film clubs created by our team of teachers with a film bank and full   film-curriculum resources  

 

We can't make it without your help! Your donation not only gives these students a unique learning experience, but will also change there life

 

 

WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL GO

we have 4 steps plan :

 

we are now at step number 01 where we want to register our work as a NGO in Jordan .

this will help us get fund to continue our work and progress .

the amount money needed is about :

495 $ for registration fees .

150$ working papers 

1000$ office rent for the end of this year  

 

 

The Impact

1- creating a TEACHER TEAM with T.O.T training

2- creating school film clubs in Jordan public and privet sector school 

3- creating film bank and resources  

4- creating Jordan first children film festival. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

if you  can't contribute,  that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • help us by  getting  the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • please  use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
This campaign has been postponed  (see Update #2). 
Purchases can be made here. 
Crypto purchases can be made  here.
BALANCE Edutainment is working with nonprofits and celebrities including Mos Def and Cheech Marin to catalyze a movement for nutritious children's entertainment that nourishes our kids physically, mentally, emotionally, and spiritually. Our intention is to bring balance to the world by helping the younger generation discover their unique gifts and bring them to the world. 

Our first products are two augmented reality children’s books, related media, and activities that inspire kids to read and learn about living in harmony with nature through an engaging and interactive experience. 

The Rhyming Picture - for 0-5-year-olds - is Pacha's first dream as a 3-year-old about meeting animal friends in the jungle. The Young Reader version - for 7-12-year-olds - is about Pacha's dream of returning to the jungle as a 10-year-old.

 

  • The young reader and rhyming picture books have 80 and 32 animated illustrations, respectively, many in 3D featuring the voices of celebrities including Cheech Marin, conscious rapper Talib Kweli, rock icon Lester Chambers,  Choo Choo Soul's Genevieve Goings, and  Mos Def aka Yassin Bey, our beloved narrator. 
  • Features an easy-to-use mobile app that brings the book’s many characters to life, turning them into fun 3D animations that “jump” off the page.
  • Pacha teaches children compassion, empathy, and connectedness through a compelling and enriching storyline about the beauty of nature, and to realize that each of them has unique gifts they can use to positively impact the environment and the world around them.
  • Includes an Award-winning 2-disk musical CD set and features real-world activities that are designed to get kids dancing and singing about their connection with nature and one another.
  • Prompts to trigger rich conversations and bring the family together
  • Fun facts that increase a child's knowledge and appreciation of animals and plants. 
  • A dream journal that supports a child's exploration of their own dream world
  • A dance activity that invites kids to make videos of themselves doing the Connected Dance to spread the message that "We Are ALL Connected.

 

When Pacha goes to sleep, the plants and animals on her pajamas become her guides on a dream adventure.

One evening, Pacha’s magical pajamas carry her into the jungle where she finds a group of animals upset about the state of their home. They decide to throw a huge festival in nature to bring all species together.

In the young reader book, Mr. Tick and his parasite minions aim to shut down the festival. They want everything to stay the same.    

Through her magical dream adventure, Pacha realizes that We Are ALL Connected and awakens with a new purpose to help the planet, using her own unique gifts as a force for good. Pacha's Connected Dance Challenge invites kids to make dance videos to show that "We Are ALL Connected!"

 

Pacha is beloved by children, parents, and teachers!

  • Teaches your child about the environment, as well as what they can do to help protect it.
  • Empowers your child to discover and use their unique gifts to make the world a better place.
  • Captivates your child’s imagination and helps them understand the power of their dreams
  • Cultivates your child’s spiritual connection with themselves, nature, and the world.
  • Engages budding and reluctant readers 

In the spirit of Pacha and with your help, we want to make it possible for kids everywhere to be able to experience and grow from Pacha's books and music. You have the opportunity to send Pacha’s Pajamas to kids in need at children's hospitals, schools, and libraries in underserved communities. If you choose one of our "GIFT | GET" rewards, books will be donated to kids in need. At the end of the campaign, you will decide to which charity you want your donation to go - see below!

Grounded by amazing talent including our narrator Yasiin Bey aka Mos Def, Talib Kweli, and Cheech Marin and lifted by the voices of 30 young artists,  Pacha’s Pajamas’ special blend of reading, music, and technology is taking the world by storm! Check out some of the awards we’ve received from wonderful organizations. 

The Pacha's Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature ZBook has 80 illustrations, all of which spring to life with augmented reality. Hovering the Pacha Alive app over the book makes the characters jump off of the page in 3D.  

How does it work? The app uses the device's camera to look for the illustrations in the book.  When an illustration from the book is encountered, the app zeroes in on the image and matches it with the correct animation, bringing the picture to life.

  

​

“Whoa! This is mind-blowing! The app brought the book to life and the characters jumped off the page, singing and dancing.” L.P., Mom

 

Go ahead - Take two minutes and the try out the App!

 

Since the app works on the computer screen, you can try it in a matter of minutes. Once you get a chance see this, you will understand why we are so excited for children and the future of books.

“Sweet!. Ever since my kids read Pacha’s Pajamas, they have been way more connected with animals and plants.“ ~ J.C., Mom

Through her dream adventure, Pacha sees how she is connected with nature, other humans, and herself. When Pacha goes to sleep, she meets the plants and animals on her pajamas in the jungle. They are sad about the state of their homes. She learns about their challenges as well as what they really want. Together, they create a huge festival in nature where plants and animals perform from their unique perspective in the ecosystem, giving your child a "nature's eye view" into things that ordinarily would not have got their attention.

Pacha sees how all the plants and animals are connected, including her fellow humans. She also learns to work through some important and relatable hurdles in her own life: her asthma, her discomfort in being the center of attention, her animal nature, and stress responses.  She awakens inspired to show the world that We Are ALL Connected. 

“Pacha inspires my students to take action!” ~ Dennise Hilliman, LEAD Curriculum, London  

Pacha’s Pajamas encourages kids to be Youth Leaders and builds their confidence. The story reminds children that they have everything they need within themselves and that they can create the world they want to live in.  Through her dream adventure, Pacha transforms from a disengaged kid to a youth leader. She discovers her unique gifts - problem-solving, dancing, public speaking - and how to bring them to the world in a positive way.


Pacha's Pajamas is the perfect educational tool for schools, home schools, and anywhere kids can learn. The story grabs their attention and engages them, making reading fun. Because the interactive material has proven to increase reading comprehension and literacy skills, the app (which makes the pictures spring to life in 3D) and the music enhance the learning experience and engage kids even more in learning and reading.  

Educators find Pacha's Pajamas to be a great way to introduce environmental issues, mindfulness, and social and emotional skills to young children using Pacha as a relatable and fun guide. The innovative use of story, animation technology, song, and dance are great ways to get the attention of today's young people. For schools and homeschool environments, Pacha's Classroom Companion is available upon request. 

Pacha’s Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature is the story of an Afro-Latina girl named Pacha whose incredible imagination and magical pajamas take her on an adventure with a whole cast of animals who help her learn about the environment and how each and every one of us is connected. The Young Reader ZBook is 200 pages long with 80 illustrations that come to life in colorful, 3D animation via the Pacha Alive app. Your child will sing along to the music and become a more engaged reader while learning about plants, animals, nature, the environment, and self-discovery. This multi-sensory approach has shown to help budding readers and get kids more engaged in reading and learning...all while having fun!

 

The Pacha’s Pajamas books are specially designed to work in conjunction with the Pacha Alive augmented reality app to help the black and white pictures spring to life in full color and create an unforgettable experience. Simply hover the app over the illustrations and the characters come to life in beautiful 3D animation! Featuring a diverse cast of celebrities including Mos Def, Talib Kweli, and Cheech Marin, Pacha’s story is not just entertaining for children, but a big hit amongst adults too. The augmented reality and music not only encourages children to want to read more, but also enhances story comprehension and expressive vocabulary.

Install the Pacha Alive App!  

 

As an added bonus, you can download the Connected Dance App right now and use it for FREE! Our new ARKit Connected Dance Challenge app enables your child to create photos and videos of themselves dancing alongside Pacha and some dancing flamingos with the power of augmented reality! You can use the app anywhere your child wants to dance and the video will show Pacha and the Flamingos dancing right beside them!

Install the Pacha’s Connected Dance App and start playing now!


See how kids (including yours) can connect from all over the world with Pacha’s Connected Dance Challenge at http://connecteddancechallenge.com.

 

The Pacha’s Pajamas double album has won a total of nine awards including People’s Choice for Best Children’s Music in the Independent Music Awards, the Eco-Arts award for best songwriting, and the Academics Choice Smart Media award.   

 

Up until the last few years, only 1.5% of children’s books were about African American or Latino characters and only roughly 31% having female central characters. Pacha’s Pajamas helps correct this underrepresentation by presenting a female whose family is Peruvian American of African, European, and Native descent. In fact, her background plays a huge part of the storyline as she explores the world of Pachamama (The Incan Mother Nature).

 

When Pacha awakens from her dream adventure, she feels called to spread the message from her dream - that We Are ALL Connected - to the world. She has initiated an internet dance challenge - the Connected Dance Challenge, which invites kids to submit videos of themselves doing the Connected Dance for the chance to win prizes and to be in a dance video with kids around the world. 

This is our first Pacha’s Pajamas Webisode. It presents the beginning of the story up to the point that Pacha gets her magical pajamas.  and features Mos Def aka Yasiin Bey as the narrator, Genevieve Goings as Mama, and Ta’Kaiya Blaney as Pacha.  Stay tuned for the second webisode!

You and your child can get started giving back to your community right away with your order of Pacha’s Pajamas. Get and Gift options that send books to kids in need. Later, at the end of the campaign, you will choose among 5-7 options (through a survey at the end of this campaign) where to send books including children’s hospitals, schools, nonprofits, enrichment programs, and libraries that serve underserved communities.  We'll share updates with photos, videos, and testimonials from the kids that benefit from your donation so you can see how your donation has positively affected others.

ALMA Orphanage Centre, Tanzania - An orphanage and school dealing with children of all tribes. We love serving and helping children with different challenges. We are seeking 108 books.

Caliber Beta Charter School, Richmond, CA - Charter school serving primarily low-income Latino and African American students in Richmond's Iron Triangle neighborhood. 

 

Child’s Play, Seattle, WA - Brings games and books to Kids in Children’s Hospitals - Target 1000 books 


 

Children’s Book Project, San Francisco, CA - Provides books to Teachers in San Francisco and Northern California. Target 100 books 


 

Dekalb County Board of Health, Atlanta, GA - Provides books to schools, libraries, Junior League, and children’s hospitals in and around Atlanta, Georgia. Target 1000 books


Lead Curriculum, London, UK - Teaches Youth Leadership to underserved kids in London and in Connecticut. Target 100 books
 

 

 

The mission of Pacha’s Pajamas is to translate ancient ways of seeing our relationships with nature, one another, and ourselves into the language of today’s kids, with the intention to inspire tens of millions of young people to become leaders and create the world they want to live in. We do this with culturally relevant characters and locales, engaging stories that remind, eye-catching illustrations, and uses of augmented reality technology that inspire, engage, and educate.

The idea for Pacha’s Pajamas came to our co-founder Aaron Ableman as he told his younger brother bedtime stories. These bedtime stories about animals coming together for a festival in nature evolved into a short story called “Pachamama’s Pajamas.” When Dave and Aaron came together around the vision of a healthy and resilient world in a dynamic, ever evolving balance, they re-wrote the story to focus on the little girl Pacha who showed up at the end of the original story.

Our first several years were focused on creating a rich, multimedia tapestry for this children's story about our connectedness. The final incarnation co-authored by Dave and Aaron - Pacha’s Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature - was published by Morgan James in April 2016. The augmented reality app was completed in October 2016. In June 2017, the book received the award for Book of the Year in the Augmented Reality category of the Foreword Indies Awards.  

People often ask us how can they help. Usually, unless they have some very specific skills that we need at that moment, it can be challenging to find a short-term meaningful project for people to do. 

But it just so happens that right about now, we've got some amazing things that those of you who want to help can do! And it will make a huge difference right now. Allow us to leverage your social network to spread the word far and wide about Pacha and her movement for people to realize we are all connected. The more networks we connect into this, the farther this can go.

We are looking for 25 Super Supporters to use an online tool to send short, personalized messages to 1,000 or more of their Gmail, Facebook, and LinkedIn contacts.  

As a way of saying thank you, we are overjoyed to offer our Super Supporters a FREE limited edition Pacha's Pollinators jersey with choice of name and number.

Email info@pachaspajamas.com if you are interested in becoming a Super Supporter.

Q: What phone do I need to use the apps?
A: The Pacha Alive Apps works with both Android and iOS devices. (The app does not yet work on 64-bit devices like the Samsung S7 and S8.)  Find them in the Google Play and App Store. Pacha’s Connected Dance App only works with iOS devices.  

Q: Where do I get the app?
A:  Find the Pacha Alive App on the Google Play and App Store.  Find the Connected Dance Challenge App at the App Store.

Q: Can a child use the app?
A:  We do not recommend that children younger than 2 years old use the app. Young children may have an easier time maneuvering a phone or a small tablet than a regular size tablet.

Q: What reading level does my child have to be to read Pacha’s Pajamas?
A: The Younger Reader was written for 7-12 year-olds. Some budding readers may need assistance from an adult. Parents enjoy reading the ZBook with younger children (4-8) while the child operates the app.  

Q: What reading level does my child have to be to read the rhyming picture book?
A: The rhyming for beginning readers and with parent or teacher assistance.

Q: Is there a program for schools?
A: The Young Reader and Rhyming Picture books and music are ready to go for use in schools. Pacha's Classroom Companion (beta edition) which contains curriculum for English Language Arts, Climate Change, and Social & Emotional Learning is available upon request for the K-2nd, 3rd-5th, and 6th-8th grade bands. 

Q: Is the Augmented Reality helpful for special needs kids?
A: Studies show that Augmented Reality is being used to support kids with autism. 

Q: What is the educational value?  
A: Pacha's Pajamas has so many educational elements. It is a perfect way to introduce kids to nature, animals and plants, environmental issues, mindfulness, how to be a force for good and create a better world, how other kids live, and social and emotional learning.

Q: How do the music and dance elements help my child?
A: Studies show that dance and music are great for physical expression and emotional regulation.

Q: Where is Aaron Ableman?
A:  Aaron Ableman has moved on from his work with BALANCE/Pacha's Pajamas to forge a career in the music, film and TV industry. He is producing an exciting new brand entitled "Alive & Awake"! A quest for the meaning of life, "Alive & Awake" celebrates every young person's yearning to tackle big challenges through the power of creativity. Leading with the album (17 songs, 8 stories, and 3 music videos), Aaron is pioneering a new means of distributing the content: a downloadable album on the back of a tree kit of ethically-sourced tree seedlings. This is the world's first plantable music album. Youth 7 + will get an album (companion booklet inside) along with each tree kit to plant in their school communities. Plus, for every album/tree purchased, one is planted in a developing nation.

If you choose one of our "GIFT | GET" rewards, books will be donated to kids in need. At the end of the campaign, you will decide to which charity you want your donation to go - see below!Grounded by amazing talent including our narrator Yasiin Bey aka Mos Def, Talib Kweli, and Cheech Marin and lifted by the voices of 30 young artists,  Pacha’s Pajamas’ special blend of reading, music, and technology is taking the world by storm! Check out some of the awards we’ve received from wonderful organizations. The Pacha's Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature ZBook has 80 illustrations, all of which spring to life with augmented reality. Hovering the Pacha Alive app over the book makes the characters jump off of the page in 3D.  How does it work? The app uses the device's camera to look for the illustrations in the book.  When an illustration from the book is encountered, the app zeroes in on the image and matches it with the correct animation, bringing the picture to life.  ​“Whoa! This is mind-blowing! The app brought the book to life and the characters jumped off the page, singing and dancing.” L.P., Mom Go ahead - Take two minutes and the try out the App! Since the app works on the computer screen, you can try it in a matter of minutes. Once you get a chance see this, you will understand why we are so excited for children and the future of books.“Sweet!. Ever since my kids read Pacha’s Pajamas, they have been way more connected with animals and plants.“ ~ J.C., MomThrough her dream adventure, Pacha sees how she is connected with nature, other humans, and herself. When Pacha goes to sleep, she meets the plants and animals on her pajamas in the jungle. They are sad about the state of their homes. She learns about their challenges as well as what they really want. Together, they create a huge festival in nature where plants and animals perform from their unique perspective in the ecosystem, giving your child a "nature's eye view" into things that ordinarily would not have got their attention.Pacha sees how all the plants and animals are connected, including her fellow humans. She also learns to work through some important and relatable hurdles in her own life: her asthma, her discomfort in being the center of attention, her animal nature, and stress responses.  She awakens inspired to show the world that We Are ALL Connected. “Pacha inspires my students to take action!” ~ Dennise Hilliman, LEAD Curriculum, London  Pacha’s Pajamas encourages kids to be Youth Leaders and builds their confidence. The story reminds children that they have everything they need within themselves and that they can create the world they want to live in.  Through her dream adventure, Pacha transforms from a disengaged kid to a youth leader. She discovers her unique gifts - problem-solving, dancing, public speaking - and how to bring them to the world in a positive way.Pacha's Pajamas is the perfect educational tool for schools, home schools, and anywhere kids can learn. The story grabs their attention and engages them, making reading fun. Because the interactive material has proven to increase reading comprehension and literacy skills, the app (which makes the pictures spring to life in 3D) and the music enhance the learning experience and engage kids even more in learning and reading.  Educators find Pacha's Pajamas to be a great way to introduce environmental issues, mindfulness, and social and emotional skills to young children using Pacha as a relatable and fun guide. The innovative use of story, animation technology, song, and dance are great ways to get the attention of today's young people. For schools and homeschool environments, Pacha's Classroom Companion is available upon request. Pacha’s Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature is the story of an Afro-Latina girl named Pacha whose incredible imagination and magical pajamas take her on an adventure with a whole cast of animals who help her learn about the environment and how each and every one of us is connected. The Young Reader ZBook is 200 pages long with 80 illustrations that come to life in colorful, 3D animation via the Pacha Alive app. Your child will sing along to the music and become a more engaged reader while learning about plants, animals, nature, the environment, and self-discovery. This multi-sensory approach has shown to help budding readers and get kids more engaged in reading and learning...all while having fun! The Pacha’s Pajamas books are specially designed to work in conjunction with the Pacha Alive augmented reality app to help the black and white pictures spring to life in full color and create an unforgettable experience. Simply hover the app over the illustrations and the characters come to life in beautiful 3D animation! Featuring a diverse cast of celebrities including Mos Def, Talib Kweli, and Cheech Marin, Pacha’s story is not just entertaining for children, but a big hit amongst adults too. The augmented reality and music not only encourages children to want to read more, but also enhances story comprehension and expressive vocabulary.Install the Pacha Alive App!   As an added bonus, you can download the Connected Dance App right now and use it for FREE! Our new ARKit Connected Dance Challenge app enables your child to create photos and videos of themselves dancing alongside Pacha and some dancing flamingos with the power of augmented reality! You can use the app anywhere your child wants to dance and the video will show Pacha and the Flamingos dancing right beside them!Install the Pacha’s Connected Dance App and start playing now!See how kids (including yours) can connect from all over the world with Pacha’s Connected Dance Challenge at http://connecteddancechallenge.com.

 
The Pacha’s Pajamas double album has won a total of nine awards including People’s Choice for Best Children’s Music in the Independent Music Awards, the Eco-Arts award for best songwriting, and the Academics Choice Smart Media award.   
 Up until the last few years, only 1.5% of children’s books were about African American or Latino characters and only roughly 31% having female central characters. Pacha’s Pajamas helps correct this underrepresentation by presenting a female whose family is Peruvian American of African, European, and Native descent. In fact, her background plays a huge part of the storyline as she explores the world of Pachamama (The Incan Mother Nature). When Pacha awakens from her dream adventure, she feels called to spread the message from her dream - that We Are ALL Connected - to the world. She has initiated an internet dance challenge - the Connected Dance Challenge, which invites kids to submit videos of themselves doing the Connected Dance for the chance to win prizes and to be in a dance video with kids around the world. 

This is our first Pacha’s Pajamas Webisode. It presents the beginning of the story up to the point that Pacha gets her magical pajamas.  and features Mos Def aka Yasiin Bey as the narrator, Genevieve Goings as Mama, and Ta’Kaiya Blaney as Pacha.  Stay tuned for the second webisode!
You and your child can get started giving back to your community right away with your order of Pacha’s Pajamas. Get and Gift options that send books to kids in need. Later, at the end of the campaign, you will choose among 5-7 options (through a survey at the end of this campaign) where to send books including children’s hospitals, schools, nonprofits, enrichment programs, and libraries that serve underserved communities.  We'll share updates with photos, videos, and testimonials from the kids that benefit from your donation so you can see how your donation has positively affected others.ALMA Orphanage Centre, Tanzania - An orphanage and school dealing with children of all tribes. We love serving and helping children with different challenges. We are seeking 108 books.Caliber Beta Charter School, Richmond, CA - Charter school serving primarily low-income Latino and African American students in Richmond's Iron Triangle neighborhood. 

 
Child’s Play, Seattle, WA - Brings games and books to Kids in Children’s Hospitals - Target 1000 books 
 Children’s Book Project, San Francisco, CA - Provides books to Teachers in San Francisco and Northern California. Target 100 books 

 
Dekalb County Board of Health, Atlanta, GA - Provides books to schools, libraries, Junior League, and children’s hospitals in and around Atlanta, Georgia. Target 1000 books



Lead Curriculum, London, UK - Teaches Youth Leadership to underserved kids in London and in Connecticut. Target 100 books
 


 
 The mission of Pacha’s Pajamas is to translate ancient ways of seeing our relationships with nature, one another, and ourselves into the language of today’s kids, with the intention to inspire tens of millions of young people to become leaders and create the world they want to live in. We do this with culturally relevant characters and locales, engaging stories that remind, eye-catching illustrations, and uses of augmented reality technology that inspire, engage, and educate.The idea for Pacha’s Pajamas came to our co-founder Aaron Ableman as he told his younger brother bedtime stories. These bedtime stories about animals coming together for a festival in nature evolved into a short story called “Pachamama’s Pajamas.” When Dave and Aaron came together around the vision of a healthy and resilient world in a dynamic, ever evolving balance, they re-wrote the story to focus on the little girl Pacha who showed up at the end of the original story.Our first several years were focused on creating a rich, multimedia tapestry for this children's story about our connectedness. The final incarnation co-authored by Dave and Aaron - Pacha’s Pajamas: A Story Written By Nature - was published by Morgan James in April 2016. The augmented reality app was completed in October 2016. In June 2017, the book received the award for Book of the Year in the Augmented Reality category of the Foreword Indies Awards.  People often ask us how can they help. Usually, unless they have some very specific skills that we need at that moment, it can be challenging to find a short-term meaningful project for people to do. But it just so happens that right about now, we've got some amazing things that those of you who want to help can do! And it will make a huge difference right now. Allow us to leverage your social network to spread the word far and wide about Pacha and her movement for people to realize we are all connected. The more networks we connect into this, the farther this can go.We are looking for 25 Super Supporters to use an online tool to send short, personalized messages to 1,000 or more of their Gmail, Facebook, and LinkedIn contacts.  As a way of saying thank you, we are overjoyed to offer our Super Supporters a FREE limited edition Pacha's Pollinators jersey with choice of name and number.Email info@pachaspajamas.com if you are interested in becoming a Super Supporter.Q: What phone do I need to use the apps?A: The Pacha Alive Apps works with both Android and iOS devices. (The app does not yet work on 64-bit devices like the Samsung S7 and S8.)  Find them in the Google Play and App Store. Pacha’s Connected Dance App only works with iOS devices.  Q: Where do I get the app?A:  Find the Pacha Alive App on the Google Play and App Store.  Find the Connected Dance Challenge App at the App Store.Q: Can a child use the app?A:  We do not recommend that children younger than 2 years old use the app. Young children may have an easier time maneuvering a phone or a small tablet than a regular size tablet.Q: What reading level does my child have to be to read Pacha’s Pajamas?A: The Younger Reader was written for 7-12 year-olds. Some budding readers may need assistance from an adult. Parents enjoy reading the ZBook with younger children (4-8) while the child operates the app.  Q: What reading level does my child have to be to read the rhyming picture book?A: The rhyming for beginning readers and with parent or teacher assistance.Q: Is there a program for schools?A: The Young Reader and Rhyming Picture books and music are ready to go for use in schools. Pacha's Classroom Companion (beta edition) which contains curriculum for English Language Arts, Climate Change, and Social & Emotional Learning is available upon request for the K-2nd, 3rd-5th, and 6th-8th grade bands. Q: Is the Augmented Reality helpful for special needs kids?A: Studies show that Augmented Reality is being used to support kids with autism. Q: What is the educational value?  A: Pacha's Pajamas has so many educational elements. It is a perfect way to introduce kids to nature, animals and plants, environmental issues, mindfulness, how to be a force for good and create a better world, how other kids live, and social and emotional learning.Q: How do the music and dance elements help my child?A: Studies show that dance and music are great for physical expression and emotional regulation.Q: Where is Aaron Ableman?A:  Aaron Ableman has moved on from his work with BALANCE/Pacha's Pajamas to forge a career in the music, film and TV industry. He is producing an exciting new brand entitled "Alive & Awake"! A quest for the meaning of life, "Alive & Awake" celebrates every young person's yearning to tackle big challenges through the power of creativity. Leading with the album (17 songs, 8 stories, and 3 music videos), Aaron is pioneering a new means of distributing the content: a downloadable album on the back of a tree kit of ethically-sourced tree seedlings. This is the world's first plantable music album. Youth 7 + will get an album (companion booklet inside) along with each tree kit to plant in their school communities. Plus, for every album/tree purchased, one is planted in a developing nation.

story:
For 2020, we will be continuing our annual tradition of supporting the Walter and Connie Payton Foundation's School Supply Drive virtually. Also starting this year, we will continue to do so in Lindsay Porter's honor!

Lindsay Porter started supporting the WCPF in 2010 through an outside staffing firm's campaign. Since then, she's coordinated the event every year in Northbrook, helping set countless children up for success with the supplies they need to start their school year. As she starts her next phase of retired life, we will continue to support the organization in her honor. 

Please consider contributing to the virtual campaign this year. We hope to be back to collecting and stuffing backpacks for the 2021 school year. WCPF is a 501c3 non for profit organization

Children and children are the future of our country. The healthy growth of children is our mission. We hope that everyone will contribute their strength and love.

story:
On 4/9/2020, approximately 70 dance instructors at Joy of Motion Dance Center with studios in Washington, DC & Maryland lost their jobs as a result of the pandemic. Their livelihood was lost and connections to their students came to a halt. Support is needed so that these teachers may continue to inspire the lives of the students they care for so deeply, and so that their living conditions are not interrupted during this uncertain time. 

We ask for your donations to help our educators keep afloat in this time of distress. 

Your donation will go towards basic needs such as: 

Rent payments
Groceries
Utilities
Instructor's Childcare needs
Financial needs that can no longer be met due to the pandemic 
Additional needs to teach from home: 

Subscriptions to facilitate online teaching
Ballet Barres to assist in demonstration
Safe Flooring for jumping and demonstrating 
Equipment to effectively communicate online (lav mics, webcams, etc)
Whether you can donate $1, $50, or $500, any amount is helpful and appreciated! Our goal is to make sure dance educators are taken care of. Alleviating financial stress will aid in teachers' ability to focus on the thing they love - sharing the language of dance with their students!

For more information about DMV Coalition of Dance Educators, please visit and follow us in the links below!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DMVCODE

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dmvcode44/

 Rest

Learning

Studying, concentration, creativity...and do you want to use your brain to its maximum potential capacity? 

Try out the high-alpha wave.


Before using the super brain (almost no alpha wave)

five minutes after using the super brain (rapidly increased alpha wave status)

REX Super brain is crafted based on Dr. Robert O. Becker’s theory that both human beings and animals significantly react to the magnetic field.

Super brain stimulates the brain wave by producing a specific harmless magnetic field from the main device to head band and creating high alpha wave, low alpha wave theta wave, and wave of delta wave

Even Albert Einstein, known as the biggest genius of all time, could not use his brain to the full potential.    

Then how can a human being use his/her brain to the maximum capability? 

The answer is in transforming the brain wave to alpha wave with the power of science. 

 Once the brain wave is changed into alpha wave with science.. it is easier to extract the unlimited potential that a brain has.. The brain of a human being, when the brain wave turns into alpha wave.. extracting the limitless hidden capability that was given by god is possible.

 When a brain wave becomes an alpha wave, not only concentration, creativity, studying capability, and memory power significantly develops but also mental stress goes away and peace in mind is created.

 A status that the brain is extremely active and studying capability, intuition, and creativity is increased to the maximum, is the alpha wave status.  

When the brain wave is in alpha wave status, the brain can demonstrate the maximum potential capability and when the brain wave changes into theta wave, brain goes into a sleeping mode.  

In a normal situation, human being’s brain wave is in beta wave status. If the brain wave is in beta wave, tension, agitation, anxiety and worries accumulate, and with such mental stress, they often damage your body and mind.  

However, once the brain wave turns into alpha wave, anti-stress hormone called beta-endorphin increases two to three times.

 As a result, it is scientifically known that the mental stress quickly goes away.    

And the brain wave turns into slow alpha wave and the brain enters the meditation status. 

The alpha status of brain is the best status for an ideal life of a human being. 

Therefore, no matter Western or Asian, the purpose of all meditation practices is about changing the brain wave to alpha wave. 

However, it is extremely difficult to freely control and get to such active status of the brain. 

Therefore, the research on how to reach the alpha status whenever we want to in a short amount of period has been practiced from long time ago. 

After different endeavors, several products were invented. Some of them, even though it is weak, actually succeeded in activating the brain.  Nevertheless, all of them use the method of stimulating either the user’s hearing or sight.  

Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless.  

 Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless. 

Super brain has an outstanding efficiency because it stimulates the brain wave by creating a specific frequency wave in safe and harmless. 

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device.

Unlike a humongous medical machine that uses strong magnetic field.. it is NOT a medical purpose machine..small in size and uses a magnetic field as minute as the terristrial magnestim.. and it is an outstanding brain wave learning device for deep sleep, studying, concentration, and meditation.

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device.

Super brain is an outstanding portable brain wave learning device. Because it directly stimulates the brain wave by covering the magnetic field with frequency and releasing certain frequency, it has an exceptional performance compare to other previous brain wave learning devices that use sound and light.    

Recently, as a depressive disorder therapy using frequency-carrying magnetic field came up, it is being used for many patients who suffer from depression.

 However, even though they want the magnetic field wave therapy, due to the expensive cost, the patients are hesitant about it.  


Depression therapy appliance uses a strong magnetic field to cure. However, our product, since it is NOT a medical appliance, uses single 1.5 voltage battery and has a magnetic field as minute as the terrestrial magnetism. 

Since our product is not a medical appliance, it cannot create a strong magnetic field like the therapy machine. 

However, it has an incomparable performance as a brain wave learning device. 

 With Super brain, instant alpha wave stimulation is possible with single button press. Once the brain wave goes into the alpha wave state, studying, concentration, learning capability, and creativity increase and develop. 


Since our product is not a medical appliance, it cannot create a strong magnetic field like the therapy machine. However, it has an incomparable performance as a brain wave learning device.

With Super brain, instant alpha wave stimulation is possible with single button press. Once the brain wave goes into the alpha wave state, studying, concentration, learning capability, and creativity increase and develop. 

If you choose the sleeping mode of Super brain, your brain wave will change into delta wave and you will fall into a deep comfortable sleep. And if you choose the meditation mode, you will be relieved from any mental stresses and experience relaxation. 

If the brain wave maintains the alpha wave state, it is good for healthy mentality, and you will be free from all mental stress

es.

story:
What Is It?

An intimate two-day conference in Cleveland, Ohio - August 12 & 13, 2016, held by Jim Harold Media LLC. We will feature great speakers on the paranormal. Here's the line up (subject to change):

  • Michelle Belanger - Author, researcher, & psychic (TV's Paranormal State)
  • Micah Hanks - Author, broadcaster, & researcher
  • John B. Kachuba - Award-winning author & speaker
  • Theresa Argie & Cathi Weber - The Haunted Housewives, authors & paranormal investigators.
  • and Jim too!

Unlike huge conferences where you get lost in the crowd, here you will be able to get up close and personal with these paranormal personalities for two full days. We are estimating an intimate group of 50-75 attendees.

What You Get

We are aiming for a goal of $12,000 to make the Campfire Confab a reality, your contribution (at the Gold Level or higher) will include admission to this one of a kind conference and/or access to audio recordings of the sessions depending on the level you select. Here's what you get.

  • Note: Contributions smaller than $99 are appreciated but DO NOT include any perks such as tickets, t-shirts, etc.
  • Ticket(s) to the event (starting at the $199 Gold Level)
  • Cool T-Shirts & Jim's autographed books (Gold, Platinum & Ultimate Levels only)
  • Levels of support are $99 and up.
  • If Jim Harold Media LLC does not meet the funding goal, you get a full refund! 
  • Assuming we hit our funding goal, contributions are non-refundable unless Jim Harold Media LLC fails to hold the conference.
  • Note, your contribution DOES NOT include airfare, ground transportation or hotel accommodations. We are working with our partner hotel to get attendees an advantageous rate (subject to availability). 
Unlike large media organizations, we can only move forward on an event if we know the support is there. Campfire Confab will only happen if we meet our funding goal with your support!

Cleveland Is Cool!

Despite what you may have heard, Cleveland is pretty cool! With average temperatures of 80 Fahrenheit in mid-August, you won't have to worry about snow! 

Make this a mini-vacation! In addition to our conference, the following attractions and more are accessible within 20 minutes driving distance of our tentatively selected hotel (Hilton Garden Inn, Airport Cleveland):

  • Rock 'n Roll Hall of Fame
  • Cleveland Indians Major League Baseball (will be in town this weekend)
  • Jack Casino - Downtown Cleveland
  • World class museums
  • Great nightlife in downtown Cleveland (East 4th Street)
  • Lake Erie and much more
  • We MAY add an optional paranormal outing for an extra charge, and we are looking at options.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about the Campfire Confab - Cleveland on social media and with your like minded friends!

Thanks,

Jim

    Cleveland Is Cool!  Despite what you may have heard, Cleveland is pretty cool! With average temperatures of 80 Fahrenheit in mid-August, you won't have to worry about snow! 
Make this a mini-vacation! In addition to our conference, the following attractions and more are accessible within 20 minutes driving distance of our tentatively selected hotel (Hilton Garden Inn, Airport Cleveland):  Rock 'n Roll Hall of Fame Cleveland Indians Major League Baseball (will be in town this weekend)
Jack Casino - Downtown Cleveland
World class museums
Great nightlife in downtown Cleveland (East 4th Street)
Lake Erie and much more
We MAY add an optional paranormal outing for an extra charge, and we are looking at options.    Other Ways You Can Help Please spread the word about the Campfire Confab - Cleveland on social media and with your like minded friends!
Thanks,
Jim

story:
Dear Reader,

My name is Wesley Gorton. I am an enthusiast hiker, prepper and survivalist.

PICK ONE OF THE 3 PERKS ON THE RIGHT HERE AND GET STUFF FREE>>>

I am trying to raise funds to print copies of my book anyone that donates more then $5 will get a free .pdf copy of my book emailed to them. if you donate more then $30 I will ship you a hard copy of my book and a free shemagh to say thank you once I have reached my funding goal.

And if you donate over $100 I will send you 1 new different color Shemagh per week for six weeks and a hard copy of my book total value of the shemaghs retail is $120 I can only do this as I have already purchased the shemaghs in bulk. 

If I go over budget I can print more copies and I will allso donated Shemaghs and hard copy books to the boy scouts and girls scouts groups in Sydney Australia.

I truly believe that the Shemagh is the ultimate everyday carrying survival tool and is a must have for any hiker, bushman, survivalist, pilot, armed forces personnel or police official.
“Shemagh: The Ultimate Survival Tool And Survival Techniques” By Wesley Gorton, was created to open your mind to the possibilities of thinking outside the box. It was written so that you may create, find or catch anything you need to survive any worst case scenarios solely with the knowledge from this book and a Shemagh.


The Shemagh can be used to keep you either warm or cold; to provide basic protection from all the elements. It is also instrumental in gathering, collecting and purifying water, for hunting, carrying and cooking food, creating traps, as well as for fashioning tools and weapons.
Additionally it can be used to start a fire and is potentially vital in medical emergencies: creating slings, arm and leg splints, sewing up wounds, as a tourniquet or pressure bandage and even for stretchers). It can be used in the creation of shelters, for self-defence and can be utilised as a signalling tool for rescue.


Unlike other survival tools, (such as a knife) one of the most appealing things about the Shemagh is that it is not illegal to carry it, in fact it can be worn anywhere at any time. For this reason, it is one of the most versatile survival tools you could ever have.


I have covered a virtually limitless number of uses for the Shemagh in survival situations by thinking outside the box and creating or finding whatever you may need in survival situation. I have also provided invaluable information that may be critical in surviving difficult and treacherous situations.


In regards to the Shemagh however, the Hitchhiker’s Guide to The Galaxy said it best: “The only thing you will ever need to survive anything the universe throws at you is a towel,” aka a Shemagh.


I hope you find this book useful in many ways, but above all remember you must have the will and conviction to do whatever it takes to survive.

Kind Regards

Wesley Gorton

http://shemaghsurvival.com/

story:
We are in need of:

Hubs, Routers, Switches, Generators=Fuel or Solar, Solar Panels, Electrical Works Major Upgrades, Major Repairs, Internet Service Provider for (WiFi) 1-2 years of paid services for Bijilo Lower Basics School Computer Learning Resource Center (Needs Expansion)-Gambia to remain efficiently updated for daily school community usage and activities.


Afri Black Community (ABC)

Non-Profit Organization

Vocational Technical & Educational Training Program


Project Proposal:

Continuing Education/Bridging the Digital Divide Teaching Basic Computer Literacy Skills for Adults, Youths and Kids in The Gambia


Introduction:

Afri Black Community(ABC) is a non-profit charity based organization based in Chicago, IL and Madison, WI in the United States, and in The Gambia our international affiliate office.  Our Mission: is to promote the sustainable development of sub Saharan Africa by fostering the initiation of real-time socioeconomic development programs in Africa and the African Diaspora.

Our five year plan 2015-2020: ABC 2020 Plan has many objectives. However our primary objective focused for this proposal and our current project is to increase participation in vocational, technical, business and educational training to create jobs and sustain employment and career avenues for youth, women and adults from disadvantaged backgrounds in the United States and The Gambia.

Current Project:

Currently, there are Three Tiers of casework structured for implementation of our vocational, technical, business and educational vocations. The aim here is to help Afri Black Community to achieve positive results with the outcome of educating Gambian participants (students, teachers, children, teens and young adults) from disadvantaged backgrounds with sound computer literacy skills; to be able to compete in the workplace, improve their computer technology and literacy skills for long-term job development, employ-ability, and vocational sustenance for further academic, professional and occupational achievement. With the results of having a solid, sustainable and effective Information & Communication Technology (ICT) Education services available at the most basic and literacy levels.

Tier 1:

Teaching Adult Computer Literacy for Teachers in the Gambia for Professional Development, Course Titled: Computer Basics & Instructional Technology/Design for Teachers Anywhere from 8-16 weeks.

Access:

Afri Black Community (ABC) has a Memorandum of Understanding with Bijilo Lower Basic School, Kombo North, The Gambia, West Africa, which agreed upon by both parties to give full access to the classroom that is used as Computer Lab Learning Center. The lab fits up to 40 desktop PCs for terminals. These computers were donated by a United Kingdom NGO based organizations along local Junior and Senior High Schools and the British Council. The PC’s have not been utilized for its well intent for over 1 year to 2 years of the arrival. And now Project Bijilo is in effect and the PC's are now setup/networked in a proper manner and being prepared for use. However, ABC has reviewed the space and read the report “An Impoverished Gambian School: Bijilo Lower Basics School’s Needs Assessment Report” conducted by MBE Consulting, Inc. (April 2015) concerning essentials that the school will need to assist in keeping Bijilo Lower Basic School productive and sustainable for the next five years.

Staff Recruitment:

ABC have 6 teachers available and ready to instruct. Three (3) of the teachers have Bachelors Degrees in Computer Science/ICT, One (1) has an Associate in Business Administration and Accounting; One (1) has a Bachelor in Teachers Education, and One (1) is Self-Instructed with A Professional Certification in Networking and Web Development & Design.

Estimated Budget:

Subtotal for Tier 1  = GMD 150,000 / USD $5000 + upgrades needed for the
Computer Lab Bldg Expansion/Refurbishing = GMD 150,000/USD $5000 Total for Tier 1 = 300,000/USD $10,000

We are in need of equipment’s and essentials to maintain this ongoing positive sustainable and socioeconomic project for The Gambia, Bijilo Lower Basic School and Afri Black Community 2015-2020 ABC 5 Year Plan.


Affiliates, Contributors and Prior Donors: 


1.) Lomeshaye Junior School, UK donated computer equipment and playground equipment to Bijilo Project November 2014. Bijilo Lower Basics is their Link School in The Gambia

They had a special assembly about the Bijilo Project. In November they donated computer equipment to their link school "Bijilo" and other schools and organizations donated resources too including lots of playground equipment for the children to enjoy. Keith is a volunteer that told school children all about the work he and other volunteers completed to help make a difference to children's lives in The Gambia. 

http://www.lomeshaye.lancsngfl.ac.uk/news/latest/2015-02-04-bijilo-project

2.) Southlands High School, UK 
Southlands High School also had project initiatives that were completed a few years ago 

  • refurbish the solar pump
  • storage tank.
  • repairs to the village ambulance
  • restoration of electricity to 50% of the classrooms  
  • repairs to the computer room roof", treatment of termite infestation to the computer room and replacement of ceiling
  • garden pump repaired and extension hose
  • purchased and replenished first aid supplies    
  • tiled Computer Room Floor 
 ***NOTE*** Unfortunately, the Computer Room, Electrical Works is NOW in need of these costly and necessary updated repairs Again!!! 


http://www.southlands.lancs.sch.uk/Bijilo-Latest-News

Solar Pump and Storage Tank
Figure 1


http://www.mono-pumps.com/  
This is the Refurbished Solar Pump and Storage Tank that serves all of the School water needs for the 1250 Students and 52 Teachers, and for the 3 Teachers and their families who resides on the School-Grounds. 
Current Status of the Solar Pump: Has not worked in the past year is totally In-Operative Needs Upgrades/and Major Fixtures/

School Community Garden 
Figure 2


Bijilo school has a School/Community Garden on the School Grounds, the extension hose and garden pump was repaired with assistance from UK Donors.
Current Status: Garden is functional due to a Positive Raining Season./

Re-Arrangements in Computer Lab-Not Final Yet due to rewiring of the facility. Electrician and Network Engineer met concerning changes again....

Figure 3

Afri Black Community (ABC) Contributions 2015:

Problem: The main problem we see is that the Computers, Lab Space and primary function for the intent of a school having a Computer Lab to improve their computer literacy skills and basic skills learning is underutilized. The Computer Lab needs necessary updates, repairs and proper ongoing maintenance, and qualified Help-Desk Staff available to oversee the lab properly.

Afri Black thus far has already:

·  Re-arranged the entire layout of the facility

·  Purchased and installed some of the network wire cables

·  Ordered New Ceiling Fans (electrical needs rewiring again termites destroyed wires) Computers need proper ventilation to function

·  Contracted a professional Gambian Electrician to do the rewiring maintenance and updates

·  Contracted a professional Gambian Networking Engineer (Cisco Certified, BS Computer Science)

·  Have 1 Server but need another more updated Server with enough RAM/ memory to carry at least 30 Computers

·  Have 1 Switch but not enough ports to carry 30 PCs

·  Teacher Training-“Basic Computing & Instructional and Technical Design for Teachers”

·  Acquired 5 Qualified Volunteers ICT Instructors

NEED:

·  Cable wiring, to complete the entire network capacity

·  We need to refurbish and update the Electrical Wiring of the Computer Lab

·  We need Solar Panels and a Solar Generator, or a Fuel Generator

·  We are still in need of Routers, Switches, and Children Learning Software

·  Painting

·  Window Repairs (Rain Comes Inside the Computer Lab)

Impact: Afri Black is transforming this space into a proper "Computer Learning Resource Center" to help in Closing the Gap of The Digital Divide that this school and community is experiencing, and to help to improve and enhance Computer Literacy of Bijilo Lower Basic School Students, Young Adults, Teachers and the Local Bijilo Community in The Gambia. 

Current Status: Needs Serious Upgrades/Fixtures/Repairs/and Expansion/


3.) The Latest Donation: August 24, 2015

"Past Walk for Warmth t-shirts donated to children in Africa-Gambia Bijilo Lower Basic School"

This year, over 100 t-shirts leftover from past Walk for Warmth events were donated to students in Gambia, West Africa at the Bijilo Lower Basic School.  This opportunity came about from an OLHSA staff member, Fatima Drammeh. She is from the region in Africa were the school is located and she wanted to give back to her community. 

http://www.olhsa.org/past-walk-warmth-t-shirts-donated-children-

Mrs. Jallow, the new Head Mistress of Bijilo Lower Basics School. She just completed her 1st year term. She explained that the school has had 4 different Head Masters in the past 4-5 years. The turnover is very high she is hopeful to remain at Bijilo school for next many years to come  :)  .

4.) UK Couple Donation: March 2014: Unveiling-Built Modern Toilet Facility that will serve over 1250 Students. 
Friday 21st March 2014: Many witness the inauguration of a newly constructed modern toilet facility for Bijilo Lower Basic School financed by a UK Couple, a ceremony held at the school ground. The facility is eight (8) in one with flush toilets, water and washing basins for students to wash their hands with running water

http://mansabanko.blogspot.com/2014/03/uk-couple-built-modern-toilet-facility.html 

This Toilet Facility has a total of 8 Stalls only that serves over 1250 students and 52 teachers.

***Current Status: The Toilet Facility is not working due to the Solar Pump-Not Working and Storage Tank problems. Water cannot be pumped as necessary.
