story:
STEP 1

How it Works

Our simple to use sweat test strips allow you to easily figure out what "body type" you are.  Knowing if your body tends to burn fat or sugar will allow you to follow a diet that is best suited for you.  Your weight loss will be more targeted to fat with overall better cosmetic results.



STEP 2

A Custom Meal Plan Unique For Your Body

There are 3 different meal plans that are geared to the results of your test strip.  The Orange plan is a low carb diet that allows healthy fats such as nuts, and avocados.  The Green plan is a low fat diet that allows plenty of healthy carbs but avoids fats.  The Yellow plan is a balanced carb/fat diet.

STEP 3

Drink FUELSLIM

While the Fuelstrips allow you to customize your food based on your body's natural design, our FUELSLIM Fit Body Drink makes the process easier than you can imagine.  Imagine losing weight without the hunger, and targeting your excess fat at the same time.  Filled with vitamins, superfruits and antioxidants your body will reap the health benefits of this revolutionary superdrink.






ABOUT FUELSTRIP 

My name is Dr. Bo Rosenblat, and I have counseled thousands of weight loss patients at Dr. Bo's weight loss clinics nationally and abroad. So many of my patients had the same problem: 
You exercise, eat well but for some reason, you just can't shed those extra pounds. Sound familiar?
The problem is that not every diet works for every person. How do you say one size fits all? 
I wanted to help my patients lose weight but I knew it had to be customized to each person's specific needs. So I found the secret in sweat.There's lots of things that come out in your sweat that give physicians a clue as to what's going on in your body, including how your body processes food and what you should eat and what you should avoid. So I created a way for people to test their sweat at home.It's called FUELSTRIP. Here's how it works. First, work up a sweat.

Once you're at that point where you're feeling the fatigue and you're sweating, wipe it across your forehead. There's a little square at the end and it will change to one of three colors - orange, green, or yellow. 

Our clients all receive a detailed meal plan but in general, Orange means low carb, Green low fat, and Yellow is a combination of both. 

But from my years of experience I knew that customizing your diet to your unique body was not enough.  My patients still needed a way to keep to their custom diet and avoid those carb cravings. So I searched the globe for the top all-natural fat burning botanicals and combined the top 13 weight loss ingredients into one delicious 10 calorie drink called FUELSLIM .

Hundreds of people have lost significant amounts of weight quickly by drinking FUELSLIM twice a day and following their custom body type diet. But their testimonials are not enough. I need your help to conduct the first ever university study on the amazing results we have seen thus far with the FUELSTRIP body type dieting system by studying our system head-to-head compared with some of the other (sometimes dangerous) prescription based weight loss programs. FUELSTRIP is so important that I have made it my life's work. With your help we can help millions of people finally lose weight and become healthy again. 

Goal 1: $10,000 - A full scale independent university group study on the benefits of the FUELSTRIP and customized body type dieting and it's effect on weight loss as compared to other prescription weight loss programs. Testing will include not only weight loss but also "Before & After" of other important health markers and physiological functions. 

Stretch Goal:  $70,000 - Experiment 2:  First ever university group study on the FUELSTRIP customized body type weight loss program in conjunction with drinking the FUELSLIM Fit Body Drink twice a day and its effects on weight loss over a 6 to 8 week period.

Rewards:  Vial of FUELSTRIPS, The FUELSTRIP diet program, FUELSLIM Fit Drink,  Personal Weight Loss Consultation with Dr. Bo. 





Lisa from Chicago

"Words can't describe how happy I am with my new body. The FUELSLIM  drink gave me the energy boost I needed to get through the day and the custom diet told me what I have to eat. I had tried so many fad diets and nothing worked. But FUELSLIM was different.  I wasn't hungry. And Dr. Bo's diet wasn't just some generic advice - it was my diet for my body. 

I used to be shy but now I am so confident in my own body. Thank you!" 

Josh from Atlanta

"The FUELSLIM Fit Drink really works! I followed the diet for 7 days and I have been drinking the superdrink for two months. It stopped those late night ice cream binges and it was easy to follow my custom green diet.  In 2 months I lost 35 pounds! I highly recommend FUELSLIM to everybody."

Zack from Miami

"I moved here from Toronto 6 months ago, and it's beach season all year round. I had love handles and no muscles and it was tough to compete for the ladies attention. I started the FUELSTRIP program and very quickly I noticed my body changing. The diet and the drink changed my life. My fat converted into muscle and I got motivated to see that 6 pack. I'll never stop taking the FUELSLIM drink."


FIND OUT HOW DR. BO USED THE SAME TREATMENT METHOD AS CANCER DOCTORS TO CREATE THE FUELSLIM FIT BODY DRINK: 



WHAT' S SO SPECIAL ABOUT FUELSLIM FIT DRINK?

Extensive research showed that the issue with other products was the focus on a single “magic” ingredient. So after years of R&D, our physicians designed an advanced weight loss drink that attacks fat in many different ways. So while we all have different reasons for putting on the pounds, the precise blend of 13 all-natural ingredients in the FUELSLIM fat burning superdrink will be sure to provide a solution that works on your body. 

What are the 13 ingredients that will make you shed the weight?

Garcinia Cambogia is a fatburner, appetite suppressant, and mood enhancer. A pumpkin-shaped fruit that grows in Southeast Asia and India, it prevents new fat cells from forming by inhibiting the cirate lyaze enzyme from converting excess carbs into fat.

Forskolin burns body fat, builds lean muscle, and breaks down fatty tissue. A member of the mint family, it Increases the levels of hormone sensitive lipase and cyclic AMP (cAMP) which combined boosts your metabolism and gives you all natural, lasting energy, and burns fat all day long.

L-Carnitine is an amino acid that promotes fat loss by converting fat into fuel and increasing energy levels and lean muscle.

Mucuna Pruriens is a tropical legume that helps control carb cravings and healthy blood sugar levels. Containing the amino acid L-Dopa, it has also been used for centuries as a mood enhancer, aphrodisiac, sleep enhancer, and to control cravings and build lean muscle.

CLA (Conjugated Linoleic Acid) reduces body fat by metabolizing existing fat deposits and increasing the proportion of lean muscle to fat in our bodies.

Fiber is essential to losing those extra pounds because it makes you feel full on fewer calories and promotes the movement of material through your digestive system. It also inhibits the amounts of fat absorbed.

Acai Berry superfruit is an anti-inflammatory antioxidant that reduces appetite and increases Energy. Our Acai also contains polyphenols that neutralize free radicals produced by regular exercise.

Pomegranate superfruit is rich in fiber, antioxidants, vitamin C and polyphenols that together have significant anti-obesity effects. Our Pomegranate also helps to increase blood flow, reduces cholesterol, removes harmful toxins, and boosts energy levels.

Raspberry Ketones cause the fat within your cells to break up more effectively, helping your body burn fat faster. The key compound is adiponectin, which helps your body think it’s thin by regulating yourmetabolism.

BCAA’s (Branch Chain Amino Acids) help reduce cravings and late-night binges, help you exercise harder and longer, make it easier to build muscle, and enable you to burn fat instead of muscle6.

Electrolytes are critical to allow all the cells in your body to operate effectively. They also help flush toxins and oxygenate your muscles, allowing them to become more toned during exercise.

Vitamin B Complex fights against weight gain by metabolizing fat and increasing energy and serotonin levels.

Biotin helps the nervous system use calories more efficiently thereby reducing the feelings of fatigue that usually come with diet restrictions and exercise. It also improves the body’s energy processing and digestion, and helps grow healthier hair, skin, and nails.


   IF YOU BOUGHT ALL THESE IN A HEALTH STORE IT WOULD COST:




WATCH DR. BO EXPLAIN THE SCIENE BEHIND FUELSTRIP SWEAT TESTING


Please tell me more about Dr. Bo?

Dr. Bo Rosenblat is a nationally recognized, board-certified physician with more than 15 years of experience. As the creator and medical director of FUELSTRIP, he has personally formulated all of our nutritional products, weight loss formulas, diets, and workouts. He is also the creator of our proprietary Fuelstrips that provide a custom metabolic profile of your body simply by swiping the test strip with your sweat. 

Famously, Dr. Bo is also Chief Physician for Dr. Bo's Diet Center, responsible for overseeing the medical staff of doctors, physician assistants and nurse practitioners. He is also Chief Emergency Physician at Memorial Healthcare System in South Florida. 

As the founder of FUELSTRIP, Dr. Bo, together with his team of Nutritionists and Dietitians, is constantly researching the latest scientific advancements for obesity-related disease and weight management. Dr. Bo has written articles on numerous medical topics for scientific journals, newspapers, magazines as well as internet blogs and websites. 

Dr. Bo has served in many leadership positions in hospitals and clinics, and has lectured for physician organizations all across the United States.

How does the FUELSTRIP work?

Your body has 3 options to fuel its activity. Depending on your body type and the intensity of your activity it will select between fat, sugar and muscle. Each of these fuel sources has a unique metabolite that is released into the sweat. By testing your sweat for these byproducts after a light workout we can determine what fuel source your body naturally burns. This is key to understanding the best way to feed your body.

Why is it important to analyze your sweat?

When you go to a doctor she examines you and checks your blood work to see what the best treatment options are. He doesn’t prescribe the same pill for all his patients regardless of who they are. When trying to lose weight there is a lot more than calorie counting. The types of food you eat, the timing of your meals, and keeping your blood sugars level all play an important part. There isn’t one best solution for everyone. Depending on your unique genetics and body type different solutions will work better for you. Test your sweat to find out what body type you are and which diet will work for you.

What is in FUELSLIM Fit Drink?

FUELSLIM Fit Drink is the all-natural and delicious way to lose weight and keep it off. It contains 13 all-natural fat burning ingredients including Garcinia Cambogia, Forskolin, CLA, L-Carnitine, Raspberry Ketone, Mucuna Pruriens, Acai Superfruit, Pomegranate Superfruit, and Fibersol. It contains no caffeine and no stimulants.

FUELSLIM Fit Drink is designed to be consumed twice daily by anyone looking to lose weight and stay fit. If you stop drinking it once you have reached your weight loss goals you are likely to increase your calorie intake and put the weight back on. It should change your eating habits forever.

Do I need to workout to lose weight?

Regular exercise is highly recommended in order to achieve your weight loss and fit body goals. However, what you eat is far more important. Even if you don’t exercise, FUELSTRIP products will help you lose weight by suppressing your appetite, increasing your metabolism, and blocking fat absorption. For more information on the different ways FUELSTRIP products help you lose weight click here.

Do I need to diet to lose weight?

Not necessarily. FUELSTRIP products will make you less hungry and so as long as you follow your custom body type diet, without even realizing it you will be decreasing your calorie intake. 

Is it safe?

All FUELSTRIP  products are 100% safe. FUELSLIM contains no caffeine or stimulants and is safe for young and old.

How long do I need to drink FUELSLIM?

FUELSLIM Fit Drink is a 100% all-natural way to lead a healthy and skinny lifestyle. Our research has demonstrated that users who stop taking it once they shed the weight quickly put the weight back on. This is because without the ingredients in FUELSLIM Fit Drink that suppress your appetite, control your carb cravings, block fat absorption, and break down existing fat cells, you quickly resort to your old eating habits and increase your calorie intake.

What kind of diet would help me lose weight?

Good question. Our extensive medical research has shown that there is not one diet program that will work for everyone. Your body is unique. Some people can tolerate healthy fats in their diet and burn it without difficulty, while others seem to consume fatty food and can’t metabolize it well. So our doctors created Fuelstrips – simply do our assessment workout, swipe your sweat on our test strips, and you will be able to create a simple customized diet program that will match your body (for more information please refer to your weight loss meal plan).

What are the different kind of Fuelstrip body types?

Orange:

You can tolerate plenty of healthy fats in your diet

Yellow:

You can tolerate a blend of healthy fats and carbs in your diet

Green:

You can tolerate healthy carbs in your diet.

Check the Fuelstrip after your assessment workout so you know exactly which diet will work for you.

Regular exercise and proper nutrition are essential for achieving your body fit and weight loss goals.These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
story_txt:
STEP 1
How it Works

Our simple to use sweat test strips allow you to easily figure out what "body type" you are.  Knowing if your body tends to burn fat or sugar will allow you to follow a diet that is best suited for you.  Your weight loss will be more targeted to fat with overall better cosmetic results.




STEP 2

A Custom Meal Plan Unique For Your Body

There are 3 different meal plans that are geared to the results of your test strip.  The Orange plan is a low carb diet that allows healthy fats such as nuts, and avocados.  The Green plan is a low fat diet that allows plenty of healthy carbs but avoids fats.  The Yellow plan is a balanced carb/fat diet.




STEP 3
Drink FUELSLIM

While the Fuelstrips allow you to customize your food based on your body's natural design, our FUELSLIM Fit Body Drink makes the process easier than you can imagine.  Imagine losing weight without the hunger, and targeting your excess fat at the same time.  Filled with vitamins, superfruits and antioxidants your body will reap the health benefits of this revolutionary superdrink.






ABOUT FUELSTRIP 

My name is Dr. Bo Rosenblat, and I have counseled thousands of weight loss patients at Dr. Bo's weight loss clinics nationally and abroad. So many of my patients had the same problem: 
You exercise, eat well but for some reason, you just can't shed those extra pounds. Sound familiar?


The problem is that not every diet works for every person. How do you say one size fits all? 

I wanted to help my patients lose weight but I knew it had to be customized to each person's specific needs. So I found the secret in sweat.There's lots of things that come out in your sweat that give physicians a clue as to what's going on in your body, including how your body processes food and what you should eat and what you should avoid. So I created a way for people to test their sweat at home.It's called FUELSTRIP. Here's how it works. First, work up a sweat.

Once you're at that point where you're feeling the fatigue and you're sweating, wipe it across your forehead. There's a little square at the end and it will change to one of three colors - orange, green, or yellow. 
Our clients all receive a detailed meal plan but in general, Orange means low carb, Green low fat, and Yellow is a combination of both. 
But from my years of experience I knew that customizing your diet to your unique body was not enough.  My patients still needed a way to keep to their custom diet and avoid those carb cravings. So I searched the globe for the top all-natural fat burning botanicals and combined the top 13 weight loss ingredients into one delicious 10 calorie drink called FUELSLIM .
Hundreds of people have lost significant amounts of weight quickly by drinking FUELSLIM twice a day and following their custom body type diet. But their testimonials are not enough. I need your help to conduct the first ever university study on the amazing results we have seen thus far with the FUELSTRIP body type dieting system by studying our system head-to-head compared with some of the other (sometimes dangerous) prescription based weight loss programs. FUELSTRIP is so important that I have made it my life's work. With your help we can help millions of people finally lose weight and become healthy again. 
Goal 1: $10,000 - A full scale independent university group study on the benefits of the FUELSTRIP and customized body type dieting and it's effect on weight loss as compared to other prescription weight loss programs. Testing will include not only weight loss but also "Before & After" of other important health markers and physiological functions. Stretch Goal:  $70,000 - Experiment 2:  First ever university group study on the FUELSTRIP customized body type weight loss program in conjunction with drinking the FUELSLIM Fit Body Drink twice a day and its effects on weight loss over a 6 to 8 week period.
Rewards:  Vial of FUELSTRIPS, The FUELSTRIP diet program, FUELSLIM Fit Drink,  Personal Weight Loss Consultation with Dr. Bo. 







Lisa from Chicago
"Words can't describe how happy I am with my new body. The FUELSLIM  drink gave me the energy boost I needed to get through the day and the custom diet told me what I have to eat. I had tried so many fad diets and nothing worked. But FUELSLIM was different.  I wasn't hungry. And Dr. Bo's diet wasn't just some generic advice - it was my diet for my body. I used to be shy but now I am so confident in my own body. Thank you!" 
Josh from Atlanta
"The FUELSLIM Fit Drink really works! I followed the diet for 7 days and I have been drinking the superdrink for two months. It stopped those late night ice cream binges and it was easy to follow my custom green diet.  In 2 months I lost 35 pounds! I highly recommend FUELSLIM to everybody."
Zack from Miami
"I moved here from Toronto 6 months ago, and it's beach season all year round. I had love handles and no muscles and it was tough to compete for the ladies attention. I started the FUELSTRIP program and very quickly I noticed my body changing. The diet and the drink changed my life. My fat converted into muscle and I got motivated to see that 6 pack. I'll never stop taking the FUELSLIM drink."

FIND OUT HOW DR. BO USED THE SAME TREATMENT METHOD AS CANCER DOCTORS TO CREATE THE FUELSLIM FIT BODY DRINK: 






WHAT' S SO SPECIAL ABOUT FUELSLIM FIT DRINK?


Extensive research showed that the issue with other products was the focus on a single “magic” ingredient. So after years of R&D, our physicians designed an advanced weight loss drink that attacks fat in many different ways. So while we all have different reasons for putting on the pounds, the precise blend of 13 all-natural ingredients in the FUELSLIM fat burning superdrink will be sure to provide a solution that works on your body. What are the 13 ingredients that will make you shed the weight?




Garcinia Cambogia is a fatburner, appetite suppressant, and mood enhancer. A pumpkin-shaped fruit that grows in Southeast Asia and India, it prevents new fat cells from forming by inhibiting the cirate lyaze enzyme from converting excess carbs into fat.




Forskolin burns body fat, builds lean muscle, and breaks down fatty tissue. A member of the mint family, it Increases the levels of hormone sensitive lipase and cyclic AMP (cAMP) which combined boosts your metabolism and gives you all natural, lasting energy, and burns fat all day long.




L-Carnitine is an amino acid that promotes fat loss by converting fat into fuel and increasing energy levels and lean muscle.




Mucuna Pruriens is a tropical legume that helps control carb cravings and healthy blood sugar levels. Containing the amino acid L-Dopa, it has also been used for centuries as a mood enhancer, aphrodisiac, sleep enhancer, and to control cravings and build lean muscle.

Raspberry Ketones cause the fat within your cells to break up more effectively, helping your body burn fat faster. The key compound is adiponectin, which helps your body think it’s thin by regulating yourmetabolism.




BCAA’s (Branch Chain Amino Acids) help reduce cravings and late-night binges, help you exercise harder and longer, make it easier to build muscle, and enable you to burn fat instead of muscle6.




Electrolytes are critical to allow all the cells in your body to operate effectively. They also help flush toxins and oxygenate your muscles, allowing them to become more toned during exercise.




Vitamin B Complex fights against weight gain by metabolizing fat and increasing energy and serotonin levels.




Biotin helps the nervous system use calories more efficiently thereby reducing the feelings of fatigue that usually come with diet restrictions and exercise. It also improves the body’s energy processing and digestion, and helps grow healthier hair, skin, and nails.

story:
Thanks for your contribution in Academic Presenter version 2.0


Academic Presenter v2.0 is ready now and you can download it from here.

Why Academic Presenter?

Learning presentation skills will have a significant effect on students’ futures. Traditional presentation software although are not free, they do not teach our students how to organize their presentation in a story-like framework. Students just learn to arrange their presentations in slides linearly which makes it dull and hard to follow. They never learn to be storyteller like our grandparents.


Even though, arranging slides after slides can be suitable for some abstract concepts (e.g. physics and mathematics), but not all topics are abstract. Sometimes, topics need to be shaped into a dynamic Mind-map diagram to be imaginable. 



Mind-map diagram helps audience to memorize and follow the flow of thought easily. It also serves audience to understand interrelation of presented topics. Furthermore, constructing framework of presentation as a mind-map diagram, can help presenters to distinguish major subjects from details. For presenting details, one may still find traditional slides practical.

What can be infered is slide-based and canvas-based products are special case of a general tool. This is exactly where Academic Presenter comes into the picture.



Free Dynamic Presentation Software

Academic Presenter is a free software that harness video-game technology to create spectacular dynamic presentation. It combines capabilities of slide-based software products (such as PowerPoint and Keynote) with a dynamic canvas (like Prezi). Users will have transitions between slides like PowerPoint and a dynamic, scalable, rotatable canvas like Prezi. 

Aforementioned ability can help us to build a dynamic mind-map diagram from raster images or vector-based shapes as a skeleton for the details which can be again another mind-map, media or even traditional slides. 


Some progress has already been made. Academic Presenter version 1.5 is available on internet for free. But refining software to an acceptable level needs more work in  both development and marketing. This is where we need your help and supports.


By helping this campaign, Academic Presenter version 2.0 will be developed: a breakthrough on free presentation products. 

All students in all around the world will have access to a great storytelling software and by that they will learn how to shape their presentations.

Imagine each presentation becomes a great show with different stories. It will be awesome!



Application of Academic Presenter in Literature Review



Writing Formulas in Academic Presenter



Animated Charts in Academic Presenter



Contribution to the Q&A 


Proving theorems in abstract courses 


Last minutes Improvements 



Academic Presenter Features

Some important features of Academic Presenter (version 2.0) are listed as follows but many more excluded to keep it short.

  • Exploiting a dynamic canvas (scalable, rotatable, and movable)
  • Adding transition between frames similar to transitions between slides in the Microsoft PowerPoint.
  • Animating inserted objects in presentation.
  • Embedding vector-based shapes and raster images, simultaneously.
  • Adding background music.
  • Playing audio or video in different frames.
  • Supporting wireless presenters.
  • Exporting presentation to PDF or image.
  • Adding mathematical equations directly into your presentations.
  • Bookmark important frames and jump to them just by one click.
  • Fast and easy to learn.

What We Need & What You Get

By looking at traditional products, you will see name of big companies involving in business software industries. Microsoft and Prezi are just examples of these companies. By looking carefully, size of the market will be revealed. Students are part of this market and as we know, they are treated almost the same as the businessmen; they have to buy the products.

To promote Academic Presenter, we have to compete with very big companies and work on training part. Concurrently, we need to work on the product itself. Therefore, payments for advertising and teaching students to be our ambassadors will be very expensive and time consuming.

Together, we will walk toward this beautiful goal:

“Each presentation, one story.”


Of course our perks won't be comparable with your kindness. If you cannot help us financially, please spread this message to students and people who are interested in being part of this benevolent movement. 

$10 Perk - About Form


In this perk, you will find your name in about form with other people who bought this perk. Your name will be seen and you will be appreciated by students who will use Academic Presenter.

$250 Perk - Exclusive Supporter

By buying this perk, you will have your own submenu with your name under Help\Exclusive Supporters. By clicking on your name, people will be directed to your website. Please be careful because porn or harmful websites will not be included.


$2000 Perk - Super Fan

This is an awesome perk and there is only one position for this perk. The buyer of this perk will be appreciated at the splash screen when the software is loading and also whenever user wants to see the splash screen from Help menu.


$5000 Perk - Customize for Companies

For companies that want a customized version of Academic Presenter, we will add their logo to the ID card, about, and splash screen next to G.A. company logo as producer. The customized version of software (Academic Presenter version 2.0) can be copied and published as many as buyer wants. This perk is limited due to technical difficulties. 

Expenditures 

By your supports, we will try to maximize utility. But roughly, we will spend $10,000 for promotion in universities and recording a new complete set of tutorial videos that explains everything. 


The true beauty is in simplicity; therefore, $20,000 will be spent on refining and simplifying user interface (UI) - It needs to be done very carefully since all elements are interconnected.

The most difficult part is the third part. We need Ambassadors to teach trainees face to face and spread Academic Presenter in educational centers.  In a nutshell, the third phase will need $40,000 at least. We expect some violation in our scheduling in the third phase. Eventually, if we can reach to $100.000, we will work on different platforms including OSX, iOS, and Android.  




How It Happened

Our research and development team consists of three members who are working on different topics for more than 12 years. Right now, all of us are PhD or Master in different fields. But we have never confined ourselves to our study field. We always were curious about different problems. For instance we were working for 8 years on an intelligent mathematical software which can solve requested problems like teachers step by step. Also, we worked on robotic fields and got several national and international prizes.

International Certificates - Danial

International Certificates - Edris

Ostad Mathematical Software

The Idea of inventing Academic Presenter appeared when one of us had to present his PhD proposal. The topic was already complicated and consisted of several sub-elements. By comprehending complexity, we understood by using traditional products, audience will be lost in early stages. They will get bored and ignore the rest of presentation. The worst scenario for any presentation; hence, we tried to build the core of Academic Presenter as a product that creates dynamic presentation. Audience will follow speaker’s thought by observing the mind-map diagram (which plays role of GPS navigators in cars) and they immediately understand the relation of subjects. Finally, we need details that can be presented at each frame as series of slides.

The feedback was promising. All audience emphasized that presentation style helped a lot to convey main message and give enough details simultaneously.


Risks and Challenges

In any project, there are some seen and unseen risks. However, we were successful for the version 1.5; thus, we are in position to tell, it is doable (though hard). 
What will happen if we won't reach to our crowdfunding goal? As you may guess, It will be very difficult to keep the forecasted pace and reach to our aim but we will not be stopped because of students. Their futures and their talents are our motivation to continue and pass every barrier. 
We expect, version 2.0 of Academic Presenter with all those cool features to be ready in April 2015. In the case of any problem, we will let our fans know about the latest changes in scheduling.

$250 Perk - Exclusive Supporter
By buying this perk, you will have your own submenu with your name under Help\Exclusive Supporters. By clicking on your name, people will be directed to your website. Please be careful because porn or harmful websites will not be included.




$2000 Perk - Super FanThis is an awesome perk and there is only one position for this perk. The buyer of this perk will be appreciated at the splash screen when the software is loading and also whenever user wants to see the splash screen from Help menu.







$5000 Perk - Customize for Companies
For companies that want a customized version of Academic Presenter, we will add their logo to the ID card, about, and splash screen next to G.A. company logo as producer. The customized version of software (Academic Presenter version 2.0) can be copied and published as many as buyer wants. This perk is limited due to technical difficulties. 

Expenditures 
By your supports, we will try to maximize utility. But roughly, we will spend $10,000 for promotion in universities and recording a new complete set of tutorial videos that explains everything. 
The true beauty is in simplicity; therefore, $20,000 will be spent on refining and simplifying user interface (UI) - It needs to be done very carefully since all elements are interconnected.
The most difficult part is the third part. We need Ambassadors to teach trainees face to face and spread Academic Presenter in educational centers.  In a nutshell, the third phase will need $40,000 at least. We expect some violation in our scheduling in the third phase. Eventually, if we can reach to $100.000, we will work on different platforms including OSX, iOS, and Android.  








How It Happened
Our research and development team consists
of three members who are working on different topics for more than 12 years.
Right now, all of us are PhD or Master in different fields. But we have never
confined ourselves to our study field. We always were curious about different
problems. For instance we were working for 8 years on an intelligent mathematical
software which can solve requested problems like teachers step by step. Also,
we worked on robotic fields and got several national and international prizes.



International Certificates - Danial
International Certificates - Edris
Ostad Mathematical Software


The Idea of inventing Academic Presenter appeared when one of us had to present his PhD proposal. The topic was already complicated
and consisted of several sub-elements. By comprehending complexity, we understood by
using traditional products, audience will be lost in early stages. They will get bored
and ignore the rest of presentation. The worst scenario for any presentation; hence,
we tried to build the core of Academic Presenter as a product that creates dynamic
presentation. Audience will follow speaker’s thought by observing the mind-map diagram
(which plays role of GPS navigators in cars) and they immediately understand
the relation of subjects. Finally, we need details that can be
presented at each frame as series of slides.
The feedback was promising. All
audience emphasized that presentation style helped a lot to convey main message
and give enough details simultaneously.



Risks and Challenges
In any project, there are some seen and unseen risks. However, we were successful for the version 1.5; thus, we are in position to tell, it is doable (though hard). 
What will happen if we won't reach to our crowdfunding goal? As you may guess, It will be very difficult to keep the forecasted pace and reach to our aim but we will not be stopped because of students. Their futures and their talents are our motivation to continue and pass every barrier. 
We expect, version 2.0 of Academic Presenter with all those cool features to be ready in April 2015. In the case of any problem, we will let our fans know about the latest changes in scheduling.

story:
Chúng em là nhóm học sinh Việt Nam tham dự cuộc thi quốc tế FIRST Global Challenge 2019 tại Dubai, Các tiểu vương quốc Ả Rập thống nhất. Tham dự cuộc thi cuộc thi năm nay, chúng em mong muốn truyền cảm hứng đến các bạn học sinh khác cũng như phụ huynh của họ ở Việt Nam để tham gia nhiều hơn vào các môn STEAM (Khoa học, Công nghệ, Kỹ thuật, Nghệ thuật và Toán học) để không chỉ thu nhận kiến thức khoa học, kỹ thuật, công nghệ và toán học mà đồng thời còn nâng cao khả năng sáng tạo, tư duy logic; hiệu suất học tập và làm việc vượt trội; và có cơ hội phát triển các kỹ năng mềm toàn diện hơn.

Chúng em cần sự giúp đỡ của ANH/CHỊ!

 

Who we are?

We are high school students from various high schools in Viet Nam who is passionate with  robotics. FIRST Global Challenge 2019 is the third continuous year Vietnam Team participates.

In FIRST Global Challenge 2017 held in Washington DC, the United State of America, Vietnam Team received recognition in potential growth (the team ranked 57th among 163 teams, https://first.global/archive/fgc-2017/), possessing the ability to design flexible and highly technical robots.

In 2018, Vietnam attended the 2nd First Global Challenge held in Mexico centering on energy and ranked 12th among 161 countries (https://first.global/archive/fgc-2018/). The team also received bronze medal for robot design.

The goal of this year is to rank at top 10 and receive a medal.

 

Chúng em là ai?

Chúng em là học sinh từ nhiều trường trung học khác nhau ở Việt Nam có cùng niềm đam mê về rô-bốt. Đội Việt Nam đã tham gia cuộc thi quốc tế FIRST Global Challenge 2019 năm thứ ba liên tục.

 

Năm 2017, cuộc thi quốc tế FIRST Global Challenge lần đầu tiên được tổ chức tại thủ đô Wasshington, Hợp chủng quốc Hoa Kỳ, đội Việt Nam được ghi nhận là đội có tiềm năng (đứng thứ 57 trong số 163 đội tham dự, https://first.global/archive/fgc-2017/), có khả năng linh hoạt trong thiết kế và kỹ thuật robot được đánh giá cao.

Năm 2018, đội Việt Nam tham dự cuộc thi quốc tế FIRST Global Challenge lần thứ hai tổ chức tại thủ đô Mexico với chủ đề về năng lượng và đạt được vị trí 12 trong tổng số 161 đội (https://first.global/archive/fgc-2018/). Đội Việt Nam được trao huy chương đồng về thiết kế rô-bốt.

Mục tiêu cho lần tham dự thứ ba năm nay là lọt vào nhóm 10 đội đầu bảng và có huy chương.

Một số bài viết trên truyền thông trong nước trong và sau thời gian cuộc thi quốc tế FIRST Global Challenge lần thứ hai:

  1. https://www.vietnamplus.vn/hoc-sinh-viet-nam-du-giai-robot-the-gioi-first-global-challenge/519673.vnp
  2. https://www.vietnamplus.vn/hoc-sinh-viet-nam-dat-thanh-tich-cao-tai-giai-robot-the-gioi/519898.vnp
  3. https://baotintuc.vn/khoa-hoc-cong-nghe/hoc-sinh-viet-nam-dat-thanh-tich-cao-tai-giai-robot-the-gioi-o-mexico-20180819123846934.htm
  4. https://ictnews.vn/cntt/hoc-sinh-viet-nam-xep-hang-12-161-tai-cuoc-thi-robot-the-gioi-first-global-challenge-2018-171355.ict
  5. https://vietnamnews.vn/society/464133/vn-students-shine-atl-robotics-competition.html
  6. https://vtv.vn/giao-duc/tre-em-say-me-voi-trai-nghiem-lap-trinh-robot-20190322164102194.html
  7. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=at-jDjS6K2k&amp...
  8. https://bit.ly/2HqDYmt
  9. https://vtc.vn/hoc-sinh-ha-thanh-truyen-cam-hung-lam-robotics-cho-tre-em-d464793.html
  10. https://vtv24h.com/viet-nam-dat-thanh-tich-cao-tai-cuoc-thi-robot-the-gioi-danh-cho-hoc-sinh/

 

What is FIRST Global?

FIRST Global is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit public charity based in the United States of America that is committed to inspiring science and technology leadership and innovation in young people from all nations in order to increase understanding, impress the importance of cooperation, address the world’s most pressing issues, and improve quality of life for all.

FIRST Global organizes an annual, Olympics-style international robotics event, the FIRST Global Challenge, where one team of high school students from every nation is invited to participate. Held in a different nation each year, the FIRST Global Challenge seeks to highlight the greatest challenges facing our planet while encouraging the next generation to build the science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) skills required to solve them.

The 2019 FIRST Global Challenge, Ocean Opportunities, brings attention to the importance of preserving the world’s oceans and wildlife.

(For more infomation please visit https://first.global/)

 

Về FIRST Global

FIRST Global là một tổ chức từ thiện công cộng phi lợi nhuận 501 (c) (3) có trụ sở tại Hoa Kỳ, cam kết truyền cảm hứng về lãnh đạo và đổi mới trong khoa học và công nghệ dành cho giới trẻ từ các quốc gia nhằm tăng cường hiểu biết, nhấn mạnh về tầm quan trọng của hợp tác, cùng giải quyết các vấn đề cấp bách nhất trên thế giới và cải thiện chất lượng cuộc sống cho mọi người.

 

Hàng năm FIRST Global tổ chức một sự kiện robot quốc tế theo phong cách Olympics có tên gọi là FIRST Global Challenge, theo đó một đội học sinh trung học đại diện cho một quốc gia được mời đến tham dự. Mỗi năm FIRST Global Challenge được tổ chức ở một quốc gia khác nhau, nhằm làm nổi bật những thách thức lớn nhất đối với hành tinh, đồng thời khuyến khích thế hệ tiếp theo xây dựng các kỹ năng khoa học, công nghệ, kỹ thuật và toán học (STEM) để giải quyết chúng.

 

Chủ đề của FIRST Global Challenge 2019 là Cơ hội đại dương, nhằm hướng sự chú ý về tầm quan trọng của việc bảo tồn thế giới đại dương và động vật hoang dã.

 

(Cần thêm thông tin, vui lòng truy cập https://first.global/)

 

What we need?

 

 

Your support to Team Vietnam would be either by giving money or by sharing this message widely.

Giving money:

We set a minimum amount of $500 to raise. This is to purchase additional tools for building and maintaining our robot, build practice game field, and cover other expenses during event, such as transportation, accommodation and meals.

Sharing this message:

There are more than one way to contribute than just giving donations, please help us spread this message out to the word by sharing on social media and / or telling others with interest in Internet of Things (IoT), STEAM and robotics.

 

Sự ủng hộ của Anh/Chị dành cho đội Việt Nam có thể bằng cách tài trợ tiền hoặc giúp chia sẻ rộng rãi thông tin này.

Tài trợ tiền

Đội Việt Nam đặt mục tiêu kêu gọi tài trợ được 500 đô la Mỹ. Khoản ngân sách đó sẽ được dùng để mua sắm dụng cụ và thiết bị phục vụ lắp ráp và bảo dưỡng rô-bốt, thiết lập đường thi thử nghiệm cho rô-bốt và chi trả phần nào các chi phí khác khi tham dự cuộc thi như đi lại, chỗ ở và ăn uống.

Chia sẻ thông tin

Luôn có hơn một cách ngoài tài trợ tiền, Anh/ Chị vui lòng giúp chia sẻ thông tin này đến càng nhiều người càng tốt, qua mạng xã hội và / hoặc kể với người có cùng mối quan tâm về Vạn Vật Kết nối Internet, STEAM và rô-bốt.

 

The Impact

FIRST Global Challenge isn't just about competing, teams from all over the world will learn about collaboration, engagement, and development of STEM. By making donations to Team Vietnam, you're helping us to be in the Challenge, present our efforts and talents to reach as high as we can and inspire other students domestically and internationally to do the same things.

Tác động

Cuộc thi FIRST Global Challenge không chỉ là thi đấu, các đội đến từ các quốc gia khác nhau trên toàn thế giới sẽ cùng học hỏi về tinh thần hợp tác, cam kết và phát triển STEM. Sự ủng hộ của Anh/ Chị sẽ giúp đội Việt Nam có mặt tại cuộc thi, thể hiện nỗ lực và khả năng để cố gắng đạt thành tích cao nhất, qua đó truyền cảm hứng cho cho các bạn quốc tế lẫn trong nước cùng cố gắng học tập về STEAM.

 

What You Get

  • Donations of $10, you will get a personalized thank-you mail from Team Vietnam
  • Donations of $25, you will get all documents about FIRST Global Challenge we have throughout the event. These include FIRST Robot Kit Manual, Game Design
  • Donations of $50, you will have our official Team Vietnam's T-shirt and the documents
  • Donations of $100, you will get all the documents and video, together with a 3D-printed figure (documents will be translated and delivered in appropriate language to you)
  • Donations of $300, you will have all the above perks, plus a training day at MakerHanoi (training location is in Hanoi, Vietnam), your logo will be showed in Team Vietnam's materials
  • Donations of $500, you will have all the above perks (except for $300's exclusive features) and are invited to join us for dinner where we would talk about robotics and related topics, your logo will be showed in Team Vietnam's materials
  • Donations of $1000, you will have all the above perks, (except for $300 and $500's exclusive features), put your logo on our materials and products showing at event

Quyền lợi của nhà tài trợ

  • Tặng 10 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được thư cảm ơn từ đội Việt Nam
  • Tặng 25 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được tất cả các tài liệu về FIRST Global Challenge mà Đội Việt Nam có trong suốt sự kiện, bao gồm FIRST Robot Kit Hướng dẫn, Thiết kế trò chơi
  • Tặng 50 đô la, đội Việt Nam xin gửi đến Anh/ Chị áo phông chính thức của đội tuyển Việt Nam và các tài liệu
  • Tặng 100 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được tất cả các tài liệu và video, cùng với một hình in 3D (tài liệu sẽ được dịch và gửi bằng ngôn ngữ phù hợp với Anh/ Chị)
  • Tặng 300 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên, và một ngày đào tạo tại MakerHanoi (địa điểm đào tạo tại Hà Nội, Việt Nam), logo của Anh/Chị sẽ xuất hiện trên các tài liệu của đội tuyển Việt Nam
  • Tặng 500 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên (không bao gồm một ngày đào tạo như khi tặng 300 đô la) và được mời tham gia bữa tối với đội, cùng nhau trao đổi về robot và các chủ đề liên quan, logo của Anh/Chị sẽ xuất hiện trên các tài liệu của đội tuyển Việt Nam
  • Tặng 1000 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên, (không bao gồm các tính năng độc quyền của 300 đô la và 500 đô la), đặt logo của bạn trên các tài liệu và sản phẩm của đội hiển thị tại sự kiện

 

Acknowledgement

Team Vietnam would like to say thank you and highly appreciate your support.

Đội Việt Nam xin chân thành gửi lời cảm ơn và biết ơn đến sự hỗ trợ của Anh/ Chị

This is to purchase additional tools for building and maintaining our robot, build practice game field, and cover other expenses during event, such as transportation, accommodation and meals.Sharing this message:There are more than one way to contribute than just giving donations, please help us spread this message out to the word by sharing on social media and / or telling others with interest in Internet of Things (IoT), STEAM and robotics. Sự ủng hộ của Anh/Chị dành cho đội Việt Nam có thể bằng cách tài trợ tiền hoặc giúp chia sẻ rộng rãi thông tin này.Tài trợ tiềnĐội Việt Nam đặt mục tiêu kêu gọi tài trợ được 500 đô la Mỹ. Khoản ngân sách đó sẽ được dùng để mua sắm dụng cụ và thiết bị phục vụ lắp ráp và bảo dưỡng rô-bốt, thiết lập đường thi thử nghiệm cho rô-bốt và chi trả phần nào các chi phí khác khi tham dự cuộc thi như đi lại, chỗ ở và ăn uống.Chia sẻ thông tinLuôn có hơn một cách ngoài tài trợ tiền, Anh/ Chị vui lòng giúp chia sẻ thông tin này đến càng nhiều người càng tốt, qua mạng xã hội và / hoặc kể với người có cùng mối quan tâm về Vạn Vật Kết nối Internet, STEAM và rô-bốt. The ImpactFIRST Global Challenge isn't just about competing, teams from all over the world will learn about collaboration, engagement, and development of STEM. By making donations to Team Vietnam, you're helping us to be in the Challenge, present our efforts and talents to reach as high as we can and inspire other students domestically and internationally to do the same things.Tác độngCuộc thi FIRST Global Challenge không chỉ là thi đấu, các đội đến từ các quốc gia khác nhau trên toàn thế giới sẽ cùng học hỏi về tinh thần hợp tác, cam kết và phát triển STEM. Sự ủng hộ của Anh/ Chị sẽ giúp đội Việt Nam có mặt tại cuộc thi, thể hiện nỗ lực và khả năng để cố gắng đạt thành tích cao nhất, qua đó truyền cảm hứng cho cho các bạn quốc tế lẫn trong nước cùng cố gắng học tập về STEAM. What You Get
Donations of $10, you will get a personalized thank-you mail from Team Vietnam
Donations of $25, you will get all documents about FIRST Global Challenge we have throughout the event. These include FIRST Robot Kit Manual, Game Design
Donations of $50, you will have our official Team Vietnam's T-shirt and the documents
Donations of $100, you will get all the documents and video, together with a 3D-printed figure (documents will be translated and delivered in appropriate language to you)
Donations of $300, you will have all the above perks, plus a training day at MakerHanoi (training location is in Hanoi, Vietnam), your logo will be showed in Team Vietnam's materials
Donations of $500, you will have all the above perks (except for $300's exclusive features) and are invited to join us for dinner where we would talk about robotics and related topics, your logo will be showed in Team Vietnam's materials
Donations of $1000, you will have all the above perks, (except for $300 and $500's exclusive features), put your logo on our materials and products showing at event
Quyền lợi của nhà tài trợ
Tặng 10 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được thư cảm ơn từ đội Việt Nam
Tặng 25 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được tất cả các tài liệu về FIRST Global Challenge mà Đội Việt Nam có trong suốt sự kiện, bao gồm FIRST Robot Kit Hướng dẫn, Thiết kế trò chơi
Tặng 50 đô la, đội Việt Nam xin gửi đến Anh/ Chị áo phông chính thức của đội tuyển Việt Nam và các tài liệu
Tặng 100 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ nhận được tất cả các tài liệu và video, cùng với một hình in 3D (tài liệu sẽ được dịch và gửi bằng ngôn ngữ phù hợp với Anh/ Chị)
Tặng 300 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên, và một ngày đào tạo tại MakerHanoi (địa điểm đào tạo tại Hà Nội, Việt Nam), logo của Anh/Chị sẽ xuất hiện trên các tài liệu của đội tuyển Việt Nam
Tặng 500 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên (không bao gồm một ngày đào tạo như khi tặng 300 đô la) và được mời tham gia bữa tối với đội, cùng nhau trao đổi về robot và các chủ đề liên quan, logo của Anh/Chị sẽ xuất hiện trên các tài liệu của đội tuyển Việt Nam
Tặng 1000 đô la, Anh/ Chị sẽ có tất cả các đặc quyền trên, (không bao gồm các tính năng độc quyền của 300 đô la và 500 đô la), đặt logo của bạn trên các tài liệu và sản phẩm của đội hiển thị tại sự kiện
 AcknowledgementTeam Vietnam would like to say thank you and highly appreciate your support.Đội Việt Nam xin chân thành gửi lời cảm ơn và biết ơn đến sự hỗ trợ của Anh/ Chị

story:
This series of activity textbooks will provide comparative learning between different cultures in a way that is compatible with existing curriculums whilst building in the capability to use new teaching methods such as digital games-based learning, international classrooms, remote learning and more.

The Mission

Histories Compared by Lackbeard - is part of a wider International Learning program that this textbook series will be the foundation for. This learning program seeks to not simply provide students to learn what is necessary for their curriculum's but to broaden their horizons and to learn about cultures beyond their borders.

This is why we seek to produce a series of textbooks that are relevant internationally and will roll out to the United Kingdom, Mexico, The United States, France & Sweden within the first two years of the project.

The program also seeks to bring new learning methods into the classroom by making new digital tools accessible to teachers without the learning program being reliant upon those new tools.

Therefore further learning materials will be produced to incorporate these ideas.

The Content

The project will launch with three editions (see below). All of which will provide a full learning experience for students - not only teaching them about the Mayans and Vikings but encouraging them to compare, contrast and form their own ideas as to the reasons why the two societies developed in the way they did.

Whilst the Mayans and Vikings will get the most attention the courses in the textbooks will also put them into their relevant contexts. How did the Mayan's compare to the Aztecs? How did the Vikings interact with the Anglo Saxons and the Scots? How did this older societies compare to the modern day? What's the difference between Odin and Wodin? And plenty more!

All textbooks come with a years access to new learning materials that will be provided every month.

What periods are covered?

What's Different?

Most textbooks out there do not attempt to incorporate other learning mediums into their structure - meaning that teachers have to chop and change or buy different textbooks for different purposes.

These textbooks are aimed at creating activities that are compatible with in-classroom settings, at-home remote learning and blended approaches. They will also incorporate activities designed to be done in collaboration with schools in other countries.

The games-based learning textbook aims to produce content that also incorporates video-games and associated methods into classroom teaching,

Key Topic Areas:

 

Versions

 

Focused Modules on:

The Aztecs
Pre-Colonial Central America
Scandinavian Culture
The Romans
China, Korea & Japan

Bonus Activities:-

Dig an Archaeological Site
Explore Viking & Mayan Culture
Talk to the Vikings & Mayans!

Sneak Peak!

How will the funding be used?

- Completing Content with hired artists and experts

- Trialling Lesson Plans in classrooms

- Production/Printing Costs

- Distribution

- Proper Formatting

- Proofing

Timeline

*

About Me

Hi there! I'm Alan Lewis - after graduating with an Archaeological Sciences degree in 2010, having worked on major excavations at world renowned site Stonehenge, I ended up producing many games-based learning exercises. Completing work for the Tate Art Gallery, Water Aid and Dig It! Scotland (to name a few examples) I took a break in 2019  and to attain my masters degree.

Throughout my time developing bespoke resources for clients I have always wanted to set out on my own in order to produce my own work as my professional career has convinced me that we can be creating better teaching experiences and establishing improved tools for teachers in the classroom.

My experience working with colleagues from around the world has also shown me just how valuable the sharing of ideas internationally is. Especially with the world becoming a smaller and smaller place as digital technologies continue to develop.

story:
About Us


We are Guillermo, Adeline, Saúl and Léo, four graduated students from the French Engineering School Ecole Polytechnique. 

At London’s Regional Final of the 2015 Hult Prize, we were congratulated and supported by our jury and we finished runner-up of our group. Thanks to their help we have improved our project, that is today ready to be launched.

Gathered around this project we will put all our energy and determination to get rid of early childhood lack of education in slums. We are ambitious about this project and we are sure you will be too. Successful change in urban slums is about to happen with your help.


What Is The Problem?


Life from 0 to 6 years old is one of the main periods of our brain’s development. Access to early childhood education should therefore be possible for every single child in our planet. However this if far from being true for more than 100 million children that age living in urban slums. Monetary and opportunity costs, distance and lack of information are strong barriers for families who wants to give their children the education they deserve.

The only solution parents have is leaving their children with their grandparents, brothers, neighbors or in existing babycare centers. Where someone in the slum keeps the children during working days for an average of 0.3 $/child/day. All these caregivers are not aware of the importance of education during this phase of lifetime, considering that health, food and love are sufficient for their children’s future. Something needs to be done to fight the learning gap created by this lack of early education, which is the main explanation for further high drop-out rates in school.


What Is Our Solution?


Early Childhood Education (ECE) is not a state priority in countries overfloaded with harsh problems that require high investment. The private sector cannot solve them either. Only social enterprises with innovative structures can help eradicate this problem.

e-WaveCommunity will use existing facilities to enable access to quality early childhood education. By using the already mentioned babycare centers and local radio stations, our solution avoids most of the costs engaged in traditional preschool systems and enables the creation of thousands of schools in overcrowded slums.

Through simple, well-focused and interactive radio emissions like the one that follows we will help caregivers become skilled preschool teachers and provide content for cognitive, motor, social and emotional development.

At each stage, local slum dwellers will be the driving element of this new educational system, avoiding intrusive models usually proposed by the private sector. We strongly believe that our responsibility is not to bring education from the outside, but to create the opportunity for early childhood development from the inside.

And do you know what is the best of e-WaveCommunity? It is highly sustainable!

Our business model just needs your help for the kick-off! Help us raise children’s horizons. 

Be part of e-WaveCommunity!


How Is It Implemented ?


e-WaveCommunity will engage several actors in the slums to create a cost-effective solution to ECE problems: 


  • HOW?

A broadcasting team, thanks to the help of early childhood education experts, will create interactive radio educational programs. These programs are adapted for specific age groups following an elaborate curriculum and broadcasted 3 hours per day over the slums.


  • WHERE?

Caregivers will be the interface between the radio educational programs and the young children. In fact, these educational programs are just a tool used by caregivers to become skilled educators. They create the right framework for them to enable efficient interactions with children. This interactions will take place in babycare centers or at home, because locally-made radios will be distributed for the families.


  • WHY?

One of the main challenges is to make families understand the importance of ECE. Our Community Managers will work hard to increase awareness among slum dwellers and our MagicBus will play a key role to involve children in the process. It will travel along slums to record part of the educational programs directly with children. Those moments will create new interactions, laughter and a strong community sense. Because ECE can be real fun! 

Moreover this bus will spend hours helping caregivers to become the best teacher possible. A real interface between the recording team and the certified centers.


How Is It Sustainable?




  From the very beggining, the MagicBus and Community Managers will succeed  to convince caregivers to be certified.

  Certified caregivers are trained regulary, monitored and get premium access to all our educational services in exchange of 10% of their revenues. The fees will be collected by a phone paiement system. Assuming that families pay 0.3 $/child/day to the caregiver for existing babycare centers, this means that families will pay a maximum of  0.9 $/child/month if the caregiver decides to affect all the fees to families, which is highly unlikely.

  Community Managers will promote certified centers along slums and help parents to find the nearest  certified center. They will also indicate to the parents all the services included in these caregiving premium education centers.

  If families cannot afford babycare centers anyway, radios will be provided at very low price for other caregivers -usually relatives- thus allowing early childhood education for every child.

  Additional revenue will be obtained from internationally-sold foreign language learning podcasts.


What Do We Need?


This is an all-or-nothing campaign, which means that if we don't raise the money we need, contributors will not be charged. 

Only 100 000 $ are necessary to fully implement the startup stage in Dharavi (Mumbai, India).

1.  The first 30 000 $, that we would like to raise through this campaign,  will allow broadcasting.

  • Recording material

  • Broadcaster’s salary

  • Curriculum-conception by ECE Experts

2.  Achieving 60 000 $ will allow Community Management.

  • Community Managers Team’s salary

  • Community Managers Team’s facilities

3.  The final goal for Dharavi, 100 000 $, will allow the MagicBus.

  • Bus and Maintenance

  • Team’s salary

  • Babycare center’s monitoring


A successful campaign will also help us continue our Hult Prize Competition trip.



Risks & Challenges

The main challenge will be to to integrate slums, to get the confidence of parents and to create global support. That is why e-WaveCommunity's priority is to involve slum dwellers at each state of the process, thus creating a diffuse ambassador's network.

Another challenge could arise from the assumption that government-led radio stations will be available, which reduces notably on-aire time's expenses. However, advertising could be an easy solution if the use of private radio stations were required.



How Can You Help Us?

You can directly help us raise the 30 000 $, but you can also support us by promoting this page on Twitter, Facebook or other social networks in order to reach the number of people this cause deserves.



Join us! Be part of e-WaveCommunity.

story:
Sani Sistas

Vision

We aim to empower and restore dignity to young school-going girls and disempowered women in our community by providing the necessary support and education around the menstrual cycle as well as a long-term solution in managing it effectively.

Challenge

In South Africa there are currently about 6 million school-going girls from households that generate less than R600 income per month.  These minimal funds are spent on essentials like food and transport with the result that proper sanitary wear is not a priority.

 This has a direct impact on the dignity and confidence of the girls with the result that they potentially miss up to 12 weeks per annum in school attendance.  It has also become apparent that this issue is not only impacting girls, but many women in impoverished metropolitan and rural areas.

Solution

 The Sani Sistas project was initiated by the Business Women’s Association with the aim to provide education on the menstrual cycle and hygiene as well distributing washable re-usable sanitary wear. 

With the assistance of various sponsors, girls in schools as well as females in other community structures are each provided with a personalised carry bag with 3 set of underwear, 9 washable re-usable sanitary wear and 10 ziploc bags.  The cost of this pack is R350 with a lifecycle of up to 5 years.

Periodic monitoring and evaluation sessions are set up with each of the institutions to track the uptake and impact of the project and provide on-going support to the girls and women.

Achievements & Goals

Since inception 12 months ago, we have activated in 8 community structures distributing over 1500 packs.

For 2015 we aim to reach 5,000 girls and women and are looking for the necessary support to make a difference to their lives.

                                                We require 1 .7 Million

Project Manager :  Bongi Mkhize

Website :                    www.sanisistas.org

E-mail :                        csi@bwasa.co.za

Contact Details:       021 442 5600

on essentials like food and transport with the result that proper sanitary wear
is not a priority. 
 This has
a direct impact on the dignity and confidence of the girls with the result that
they potentially miss up to 12 weeks per annum in school attendance.  It has also become apparent that this issue
is not only impacting girls, but many women in impoverished metropolitan and
rural areas.
Solution
 The Sani
Sistas project was initiated by the Business Women’s Association with the aim
to provide education on the menstrual cycle and hygiene as well distributing
washable re-usable sanitary wear.  
With the assistance of various sponsors, girls
in schools as well as females in other community structures are each provided
with a personalised carry bag with 3 set of underwear, 9 washable re-usable
sanitary wear and 10 ziploc bags.  The
cost of this pack is R350 with a lifecycle of up to 5 years.
Periodic monitoring and evaluation sessions are
set up with each of the institutions to track the uptake and impact of the
project and provide on-going support to the girls and women.
Achievements
& Goals
Since inception 12 months ago, we have activated
in 8 community structures distributing over 1500 packs.
For 2015 we aim to reach 5,000 girls and women
and are looking for the necessary support to make a difference to their lives.                                                We require 1 .7 MillionProject Manager :  Bongi MkhizeWebsite :                    www.sanisistas.orgE-mail :                        csi@bwasa.co.zaContact Details:       021 442 5600

story:
Why technology awareness

Technology trend awareness as a skill refers to being mindful of the technology that is recently becoming popular and is readily accepted in the market or industry. It also encompasses one’s ability to recognize and understand the usefulness of any such technology for the success. The acceptance of technology can be seen either as an opportunity or as a threat to people and businesses. When young people learn how science and technology work, they can better use their skills for research and entrepreneurship. Either way, the technology trend awareness skills serve as the most important asset.

Why is technology trend awareness important.

Keeping up with the technology trends is imperative. Following are the areas where technology trend awareness skills play their significant role:

  • Creating chances for young people.
  • Enhancing your business's visibility to the customers.
  • Increasing opportunities with new ideas and new ventures.

How we intend to improve technology trend awareness as a skill

Following are some ways in which pursue to improve your technology trend awareness skills:

  • Reccommend technology related forums and read technology related blogs.
  • Sponsoring documentary sessions in schools, especially universities.
  • Sponsoring seminars.
  • Creating a network of industry experts and students.
  • Sponsoring intellectual property

story:
Short Summary

My name is Howard Carney and I am a Salsa Junkie. I created I Need My Salsa to help other Salsa Junkies around the world. 

I created this campaign to help me to spread the word as far around the world as I can. Your support in any way is very important so I can spread the word and completely connect the Salsa Family!

What We Need & What You Get

I need the following things:

  • Social sharing of everything I Need My Salsa posts. Like and follow I Need My Salsa on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Join our E-mail list at INeedMySalsa.com.
  • Everything is already free but will give Salsa Merchandise to people who contribute money to I Need My Salsa.
  • Even if I don't reach my goal, every dollar counts and will be used to pay the cost I am currently paying out of my pocket. The website and the mobile app cost money even If I can't upgrade my equipment.
 

See you on the Dance Floor!

story:
Short Summary

I am Uwaye Soetan, the Director of Fantasia City School. I am passionate about connected learning and development in education. Having learnt so much virtually from teachers around the world, i believe everyone deserves  an opportunity to learn from highly skilled teachers, using the best curriculum and 21st century technology.
Some students are fortunate enough to use computer aid for lessons, others, not only do not have access to computers but also are deprived of qualified teachers. The solution to their problem is certainly enrolling for virtual lessons with skilled teachers from around the world, web based instructions, enriched curriculum and access to information that will make them more responsible learners.
If you contribute to this course, you would help me promote Computer Aided Instructions (CAI) and better still, Computer Based Training (CBT) amongst teachers and students to engage a changing world. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $690,000 for this project.

The curriculum cost $6,500 per high school student for a period of 2 to 4years depending on the time it takes the student to complete the program. 

Starting with 50 students for the pilot project will be 325,000 for course fees, covering instructions, contents, course materials and delivery.

Other cost are:

One full time administrator/director renumeration for the year. $60,000

Public information - to develop information, marketing materials and programs. This should include publications, a web portal and travel cost. $50,000

Evaluation - customer surveys and needs assessments. $25,000

Administrative supports - to handle clerical and day to day routine operation of the school. $12,000

Technology support -  to ensure hitch free learning 18,000

Teaching support - to facilitate learning $20,000

Equipments, software and materials for staff $16,000

Equipments, software and materials for students $40,000

Unanticipated cost - $4,000

Facilities - place where the virtual school would be set up for extended periods for students whose schools don't have necessary infrastructure  to access learning $120,000.

 Our sponsors will have their profile on our website and marketing materials.

If we do not reach our goal of achieving this, funds raised will be used to maintain a website with free courses and learning materials for teachers, students and individuals we would interest in using technology to learn and connect with others.

The Impact

Today's world is computerized, today's students are big on gadgets, the traditional education is limiting. Virtual schools allow students take ownership of learning while teachers facilitate. Students interest in technology don't wane because teachers fail to acknowledge it, rather, they are put into all the wrong uses when not directed constructively. Lets give technology its place in education, lets show our children how technology can be used to achieve present and future career and life goals.

I am already impacting students at the formative years of life (pre-school). I need to take it further and impact the high school students who are at the point of  making life long decisions.

Why this campaign should be funded

In Nigeria, we do not have as many secondary schools as there are primary schools. The secondary schools are often overcrowded with unqualified teachers. Students who finnish and are lucky to graduate from college are mostly unprepared for the workforce. I have a preschool and have interviewed thousands of graduates, it's disappointing that most are unintelligent, don't speak good english and yet have experience teaching in other primary schools and secondary schools. I often wonder what kind of youths we are producing if we cant at least prepare them for today's global and digitalized world. If this campaign gets funded, we would run a pilot study on a group of students and have a basis to propose to the government/key stakeholders how virtual schools can run successfully, especially for students who are unlikely to get good education. 

This project is unique because there is no structured virtual secondary school in Nigeria. This will be the first and our institution partners, Academica virtual school, have a track record of successes in the United States.

Risks & Challenges 

People especially teachers have little confidence in students taking ownership and responsibility for their learning. It would take a lot of campaigns and enlightenment programs and seminars to gain their trust.  

Our website will be a valuable tool to give feedbacks on how students are doing and to interest teachers and parents into becoming connected learners by taking free courses on our website and connecting each other in a community of technology education lovers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate if you can get the word out for us. You can use Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Summary

    

In 1872 ten year old Nikola Tesla laid bed ridden with malaria, he opened a book about Niagara Falls and envisioned "A great water wheel illuminating distant cities", turning to his uncle he said "One day I will go to America and make this real".  Landing in America with 2 cents, he turned this dream into reality at the Adams Power House; becoming a leading catalyst to the Second Industrial Revolution. The power the world currently uses was due to Tesla's innovation at this building.

After New York took over the hydroelectric power generation at Niagara Falls they destroyed all evidence of earlier pioneering plants. Luckily the "Adams Transformer House" was nominated as National Historic Landmark before they could bulldoze it under, like the other buildings. In 1999 it was purchased by a local contractor from Niagara Mohawk (a privately owned power company) who used it as storage warehouse. Now this private contractor wishes to retire and sell the property.

Our team has historic architectural preservation experience and a self sustaining, feasible business plan based on tourism to renovate this structure into a international destination museum, We wish to restore this LAST STANDING bastion, as a tribute to Nikola Tesla's childhood dream to educate future generations. In order to do so, we need your help raising seed funds so we may register our business allowing us the capital to re-purpose this structure.

Our business plan is available for review, and team ready to answer any questions. Although we can not offer any equity at this time, we do have wonderful gifts for those who donate, some of which are actually manufactured in Belgrade, Yugoslavia.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Our business plan is based on empirical data from government studies showing that of the 8-12 million annual tourist who visit Niagara Falls, that 6-7% would attend a historic museum. To determine the feasibility of this project we took into consideration our capital expenditures, ticket revenue, acquisition cost, and annual operating expenses; allowing us a true market valuation of $2.6 million dollars once we open our doors.

We found out that any serious investors required us to raise at least 10% of our projected company valuation, which is why we started this campaign. All funds will be used to hire a full time administrator, tracking contributions, surveying the property, registering the business, and drafting conceptual plans leading to the purchase and renovation of this historic landmark building.

Beside offering wonderful gifts for your contribution you have the satisfaction of knowing that you saved one of the worlds most important landmark buildings in the world, preserving Nikola Tesla's legacy and childhood dream. He's not here, nor does he have any heirs to thank you-but we are; and every person, regardless of their amount, will be added to our "Wall of Fame" when the museum opens.

 

The Impact

The Impact that this campaign offers is enormous.

-It's RARE that the general public ever gets the opportunity to become involved in preserving a registered National Historic Landmark building.

-It's even more rare that you can tell your family & friends you preserved Nikola Tesla's legacy.

-This is a project that will be preserved in history for generations.

-It will stand out as a crowning achievement at Niagara Falls where everyone visits.

 

Risks & Challenges

We acknowledge that according to the Small Business Administration close to 66% of small businesses will survive their first two years. Meaning that only about one-third of total businesses will fail during the first two years.

Since Elon Musk released the "Tesla" version of cars, interest in the inventor Nikola Tesla has increased exponentially. Yet, as a company we're cautiously optimistic about creating this campaign.

In 1970 the Native Americans created a heritage center at Niagara Falls called "The Turtle" which is an extremely large building in the shape of a turtle. They misjudged that tourist would be interested in visiting their folklore about the earth being held up on the back of turtle. While it was a noble venture, it wasn't attended by many tourist; and as a non-profit, they depended  strictly on state funding to stay open. When state funding stopped 10 years later, the building closed and taken over for back taxes, loosing all their exhibits.

Another pitfall we observed was when New York State refused to renew the water rights of Niagara Mohawk so they could build their own Megawatt Robert Moses Power Plant-during which, they TOOK BY EMINENT DOMAIN over 550 acres of Native American land. After it was built the also obfuscated the remaining historic power plants and bulldozed them into the ground. Which is why we wish to keep this property in private ownership.

We have taken, and will continue to take, every possible measure to mitigate risks so the Adams Transformer House / Tesla Museum will stand for future generations by learning from the above examples. These steps included, but are not limited to creating a Limited Liability Company (sheltering us from frivolous lawsuits), installation of security equipment, providing business insurance and bonds, and any other measures deemed necessary.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Perhaps you just can't contribute at this time, but you can still help keep his legacy alive by:

  • Sharing our campaign to social media using Indiegogo share tools
  • Telling your friends and family about our preservation efforts
  • Book marking this page so you can come back at another time
  • Inquiring about our business plan which lays out how the money will be spent.

And that's all there is to it.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Education is crucial in today's competitive world. With invent of internet education and skill building have become extremely necessary to survive in competitive world.

 

Hectic schedule and extreme cost do not allow pupils to get good education and enhance their competitive skills. Infrastructure cost make job of educator tough as end product cost i.e. fees of education would go high.

 

With digital revolution and mobile technology education, educator and pupils can be bought together which would save lots of important time and cost for all.

 

We intent to develop such technology to learning and development that would be beneficial to all who have quench to learn from any part of this world.

 

Help us to grow and connect the world. Let knowledge flow and civilization prosper.
