story:
Wer wir sind?

To get more information about our project Make-up Institute in English, please scroll to the bottom of this page.

Wir sind erfahrene Make-up Artists, Stylisten, Filmproduzenten und Web-Designer, die etwas einmaliges anbieten: Die erste deutschsprachige Online-Plattform für eine Hair & Make-up Ausbildung. Wir möchten die jahrelangen Erfahrungen weitergeben und anderen mode- und trendbewussten Menschen helfen, ihre Kenntnisse zu verbessern. Mit unserem „Make-up Institute“ ebnen und begleiten wir den Weg für eine professionelle Laufbahn als Hair & Make-up Artist. Wir entwickeln ein  modernes E-Learning-Angebot, mit dem die Ausbildung überall und zu jeder Zeit absolviert werden kann.

Schöpferin von „Make-up Institute“ ist Verena van der Heyden, freischaffende Airbrush - Hair & Make-up Artistin, die mit ihren zehn Jahren Berufserfahrung in Werbe- und Filmbranche professionelles Wissen weitergibt. 

webseite: www.makeup-institute.com


Was uns unterscheidet?

Tausende Bloggerinnen erklären auf Youtube, wie man sich schön schminkt. Zahlreiche Schulen bilden Hair & Make-up Artists aus. Doch zum einen reicht es nicht, sich selbst schön schminken zu können, um Menschen professionell für Werbe-, Film- oder Modeshootings vorzubereiten. Zum anderen sind Make-up Artist Schulen nur in Großstädten zu finden, haben einen festen Zeit- und Lehrplan und sind kostenintensiv.

Mit unseren E-Learning Modulen kann jeder lernen professionell zu schminken und zu stylen und spart dabei Zeit und Geld. 

Wo immer du bist: in Deutschland, Österreich oder in der Schweiz!



Wie „Make-up Institute“ funktioniert

Die Ausbildung eignet sich für Anfänger und Branchenkenner (Friseure, Kosmetikerin), die Grundlagen und Techniken von Make-up und Hair-Styling erlernen und vertiefen wollen. In einem Aufbaukurs "Expert Make-up Artist" können bereits Fortgeschrittene ihre Fähigkeiten auf die nächste Stufe bringen.

Die Kurse können auf dem Computer, Tablet oder Smartphone jederzeit verfolgt werden. Die Studenten können die Lernvideos individuell wiederholen und bestimmen somit selbst ihr Lerntempo. Die professionellen Make-up Dozenten stehen für ein Online-Feedback zur Verfügung. Ein Zertifikat bestätigt die Teilnahme an der Ausbildung und dient als Wegbereiter zur professionellen Arbeit als Hair & make-up Artist. Auch die Prüfung kann von Zuhause abgelegt werden. Dafür sollen die Teilnehmer/innen drei selbst kreierte Looks fotografieren und auf dem eigenen Account für den Make-up Dozenten hochladen. Abgeschlossen werden die Kurse mit einem Zertifikat, das den Teilnehmern/innen nach erfolgreich absolvierter Prüfung zugesendet wird.

webseite: www.makeup-institute.com



Was wir gemeinsam mit deiner Unterstützung erreichen wollen?

Wir brauchen Schulungsunterlagen für die Ausbildungsteilnehmer/innen, Arbeitsmaterial wie Make-up und weiteres Equipment, das den Teilnehmern/innen zur Verfügung gestellt wird.

Außerdem soll eine Werbekampagne auf die neue Ausbildung aufmerksam machen. Bis jetzt arbeiten alle Unterstützer der Idee ohne Bezahlung. Web-Designer und Software-Entwickler sollen das Projekt jedoch noch weiter begleiten und dafür entlohnt werden.

Die 10 000 Euro sollen das Start-up „Make-up-Institute“ auf den Markt bringen. Wir stehen bereits in Kontakt mit großen Make-up und Kosmetikfirmen, wie Inglot und Davines (tierversuchsfrei und vegan), die auch während der Ausbildung für die Studierenden beim Equipment entscheidend sind. Wir werden weiter nach Sponsoren suchen.


Was bekommst du für deine Unterstützung?

Für deine großartige Unterstützung erhältst du entweder 30% auf jede Online Ausbildung am Make-up Institute, oder eine private und individuelle Make-up Beratung via Skype. Letzteres wird von unseren professionellen Dozenten durchgeführt. Bei der „Personal - Skype - Lesson 30“ kannst du bis zu drei Fragen, bei der „Personal - Skype - Lesson 60“ bis zu sechs Fragen stellen, welche du einfach vorab per email an uns sendest. Außerdem solltest du ein Bild von der Person welche beraten werden möchte an indiegogo@makeup-institute.com mitsenden, so kann die Dozentin, bzw. der Dozent eine optimale und typgerechte Beratung geben. Du kannst die Skype - Lessons natürlich auch verschenken oder sie in Vorbereitung auf ein spezielles Event nutzen.

Unsere vier Online Make-up Ausbildungen enthalten jeweils ein Set von hochwertigen und veganen Kosmetikpinseln inklusive Pinseltasche und Pinselreiniger, einen Farbkreis, Schulungsunterlagen und ein professionelles Make-up Kit . Alle Produkte sind tierversuchsfrei. Die Online Ausbildungen „Expert Make-up Artist“ und „Professional Make-up Artist“ umfassen außerdem einen persönlichen und individuellen Support von 6 Monaten. Bei den Online Ausbildungen „Masterclass Hair- & Make-up“ und „VIP Special inkl. Shooting“ erhältst du einen persönlichen und individuellen Support von 12 Monaten. Wir lassen dich nicht alleine, sondern helfen dir im persönlichen Kontakt deine Fähigkeiten Schritt für Schritt zu verbessern.

Unsere Online Ausbildung „Hairstylist“ enthält ein Starter Kit. Im Starter Kit enthalten sind: klimaneutrale Haarpflege Produkte und ein hochwertiges Kamm & Bürstenset.

Ein echtes Highlight stellt das "VIP Special inkl. Shooting" dar: Du erhältst die Online Ausbildung „Masterclass Hair- & Make-up“ im Wert von 4499€ und zusätzlich organisieren wir für dich, nach abgeschlossener Ausbildung, ein professionelles Fotoshooting in Berlin inkl. Übernachtung. Du kannst deine Fähigkeiten an einem professionellen Model beweisen und die entstandenen Fotos für dein Portfolio nutzen!

Hier findest Du die Übersicht der Kursinhalte.



Andere Wege wie du uns unterstützen kannst!

Verbreite unsere Kampagne über Facebook, Instagram und andere soziale Netzwerke. Erzähle deinen Freunden davon. Ermutige alljene, die über eine Ausbildung im Bereich Hair & Make-up nachdenken, sich an die erste Online Hair & Make-up Schule "Make-up Institute" zu wenden.



For our International Supporters


What is Make-up Institue?

Makeup Institute is the first German-language online Hair- and Make-up Artist school, offering an online Hair and Make-up Artist education. You will learn basic principles and practical step-by-step techniques for getting started in a career as a professional Hair and Makeup artist. You will learn what a makeup artist does and how to develop your skills to maintain a scuessful Hair and Makeup artist career. 

All our courses are self-directed, which means you may study and complete lections at times that are most convenient for you - from the comfort of your own home or from anywhere on the go.

Our Makeup Artist courses have been created to allow you to complete it just by using the provided HD video material and detailed textbooks. However, if you have questions or need assistance, you can get help from our professional lecturers anytime you want. Your lecturer is a valuable resource person who can provide you with personal teaching assistance to help you succeed in the course and to help you succeed in being a professional Hair and Make-up Artist.

How can you support us?

For our English speaking supporters, we have the 30 min and 60 min Skype sessions in English: receive personal make-up advice from our professional makeup lecturers. We will answer three / six questions about styling and make-up via Skype within 30 minutes / 60 minutes. For this purpose please send us your questions and a photo in advance. All you need to enjoy your 30 min or 60 min Skype session is a good internet connection and a Skype account. Also perfect as a gift voucher!

You can also support us with the help of the Thank you for your Support – Perk. For just 5 € we will keep you updated while producing our Online Make-Up School.

If we reach more than 50.000 €, we will offer all our courses, our website and the school materials both in German and in English. So please help us to create the best online Hair and Make-up education for everyone.

Do you have further questions or do you need more information about Make-up Institute? Please watch our video presentation with English subtitles on YouTube or contact us indiegogo@makeup-institue.com
story_txt:
Wer wir sind?
To get more information about our project Make-up Institute in English, please scroll to the bottom of this page.
Wir sind erfahrene Make-up Artists, Stylisten, Filmproduzenten und
Web-Designer, die etwas einmaliges anbieten: Die erste deutschsprachige Online-Plattform für
eine Hair & Make-up Ausbildung. Wir möchten die jahrelangen Erfahrungen
weitergeben und anderen mode- und trendbewussten Menschen helfen, ihre
Kenntnisse zu verbessern. Mit unserem „Make-up Institute“ ebnen und begleiten
wir den Weg für eine professionelle Laufbahn als Hair & Make-up Artist. Wir
entwickeln ein  modernes
E-Learning-Angebot, mit dem die Ausbildung überall und zu jeder Zeit absolviert
werden kann. 
Schöpferin von „Make-up Institute“ ist Verena van der
Heyden, freischaffende Airbrush - Hair & Make-up Artistin, die mit ihren zehn
Jahren Berufserfahrung in Werbe- und Filmbranche professionelles Wissen
weitergibt. 
webseite: www.makeup-institute.com




Was uns
unterscheidet?

Tausende Bloggerinnen erklären auf Youtube, wie man sich
schön schminkt. Zahlreiche Schulen bilden Hair & Make-up Artists aus. Doch
zum einen reicht es nicht, sich selbst schön schminken zu können, um Menschen
professionell für Werbe-, Film- oder Modeshootings vorzubereiten. Zum anderen
sind Make-up Artist Schulen nur in Großstädten zu finden, haben einen festen Zeit- und
Lehrplan und sind kostenintensiv. 
Mit unseren E-Learning Modulen kann jeder lernen
professionell zu schminken und zu stylen und spart dabei Zeit und Geld. Wo immer du bist: in Deutschland, Österreich oder in der Schweiz!Wie „Make-up
Institute“ funktioniert
Die Ausbildung eignet sich für Anfänger und Branchenkenner
(Friseure, Kosmetikerin), die Grundlagen und Techniken von Make-up und
Hair-Styling erlernen und vertiefen wollen. In einem Aufbaukurs "Expert Make-up Artist" können bereits Fortgeschrittene
ihre Fähigkeiten auf die nächste Stufe bringen.

Die Kurse können auf dem Computer, Tablet oder Smartphone
jederzeit verfolgt werden. Die Studenten können die Lernvideos individuell
wiederholen und bestimmen somit selbst ihr Lerntempo. Die professionellen Make-up Dozenten stehen für
ein Online-Feedback zur Verfügung. Ein Zertifikat bestätigt die Teilnahme an der
Ausbildung und dient als Wegbereiter zur professionellen Arbeit als Hair &
make-up Artist. Auch die Prüfung kann von Zuhause abgelegt werden. Dafür sollen
die Teilnehmer/innen drei selbst kreierte Looks fotografieren und auf dem eigenen
Account für den Make-up Dozenten hochladen. Abgeschlossen werden die Kurse mit einem
Zertifikat, das den Teilnehmern/innen nach erfolgreich absolvierter Prüfung
zugesendet wird.
webseite: www.makeup-institute.com


Was wir gemeinsam mit deiner Unterstützung erreichen wollen?

Wir brauchen Schulungsunterlagen für die
Ausbildungsteilnehmer/innen, Arbeitsmaterial wie Make-up und weiteres Equipment, das
den Teilnehmern/innen zur Verfügung gestellt wird. 
Außerdem soll eine Werbekampagne auf die neue Ausbildung
aufmerksam machen. Bis jetzt arbeiten alle Unterstützer der Idee ohne
Bezahlung. Web-Designer und Software-Entwickler sollen das Projekt jedoch noch
weiter begleiten und dafür entlohnt werden.
Die 10 000 Euro sollen das Start-up „Make-up-Institute“ auf
den Markt bringen. Wir stehen bereits in Kontakt mit großen Make-up und Kosmetikfirmen, wie Inglot und Davines (tierversuchsfrei und vegan), die auch während der Ausbildung für die Studierenden beim Equipment entscheidend sind. Wir werden weiter nach Sponsoren suchen.

Was bekommst du für deine Unterstützung?


Für deine großartige Unterstützung erhältst du entweder 30% auf jede Online
Ausbildung am Make-up Institute, oder eine private und individuelle Make-up
Beratung via Skype. Letzteres wird von unseren professionellen Dozenten durchgeführt. Bei der „Personal - Skype - Lesson 30“ kannst du bis zu drei
Fragen, bei der „Personal - Skype - Lesson 60“ bis zu sechs Fragen stellen,
welche du einfach vorab per email an uns sendest. Außerdem
solltest du ein Bild von der Person welche beraten werden möchte an indiegogo@makeup-institute.com mitsenden, so
kann die Dozentin, bzw. der Dozent eine optimale und typgerechte Beratung
geben. Du kannst die Skype - Lessons natürlich auch verschenken oder sie in
Vorbereitung auf ein spezielles Event nutzen.




Unsere vier Online Make-up Ausbildungen enthalten jeweils ein Set von
hochwertigen und veganen Kosmetikpinseln inklusive Pinseltasche und Pinselreiniger,
einen Farbkreis, Schulungsunterlagen und ein professionelles Make-up Kit . Alle Produkte sind tierversuchsfrei. Die Online
Ausbildungen „Expert Make-up Artist“ und „Professional Make-up Artist“ umfassen
außerdem einen persönlichen und individuellen Support von 6 Monaten. Bei den Online Ausbildungen „Masterclass
Hair- & Make-up“ und „VIP Special inkl. Shooting“
erhältst du einen persönlichen und individuellen Support von 12 Monaten. Wir lassen dich nicht alleine, sondern
helfen dir im persönlichen Kontakt deine Fähigkeiten Schritt für Schritt zu
verbessern.
Unsere Online Ausbildung „Hairstylist“ enthält ein Starter Kit. Im Starter Kit
enthalten sind: klimaneutrale Haarpflege Produkte und ein hochwertiges Kamm
& Bürstenset.
Ein echtes Highlight stellt das "VIP Special inkl. Shooting" dar: Du erhältst die Online
Ausbildung „Masterclass Hair- & Make-up“ im Wert von 4499€ und zusätzlich organisieren wir für dich,
nach abgeschlossener Ausbildung, ein professionelles Fotoshooting in Berlin
inkl. Übernachtung. Du kannst deine Fähigkeiten an einem professionellen
Model beweisen und die entstandenen Fotos für dein Portfolio nutzen!
Hier findest Du die Übersicht der Kursinhalte. 



Andere Wege wie du uns unterstützen kannst!
Verbreite unsere Kampagne über Facebook, Instagram und andere soziale Netzwerke. Erzähle deinen Freunden davon. Ermutige alljene, die über eine Ausbildung im Bereich Hair & Make-up nachdenken, sich an die erste Online Hair & Make-up Schule "Make-up Institute" zu wenden.

You can
also support us with the help of the Thank
you for your Support – Perk. For just 5 € we will keep you updated while producing our Online Make-Up School.
If we reach more than 50.000 €, we will offer all our
courses, our website and the school materials both in German and in English.
So please help us to create the best online Hair and Make-up education for
everyone. 

Do you have further questions or do you need
more information about Make-up Institute?
Please watch our video presentation with English subtitles on YouTube or contact
us indiegogo@makeup-institue.com

story:
Я не могу петь, рисовать, придумывать, но я много работаю.
15 часа в сутки в $ 1,20 в час.
Я живу в России, но у меня есть огромная мечта! См свободную Америку, если она есть.
Мое образование строитель, и я не имею родителей.
Всегда хожу на курсы, и не знаю , что делать дальше.
Иногда мне кажется , что я был обречен бегать по кругу.
Мне нужна ваша помощь, она будет срабатывать в моей жизни. Для вас это дешевле чашка кофе, но для меня это будущее развитие.
Я не знаю , что я могу предложить взамен, но я обещаю , чтобы придумать.
Возможно , если бы я собрать необходимую сумму, я приду и лично поблагодарить всех.
/
\
  \
    3$ Thanks my Dear friends
   /
/

story:
Join us on this enlightening Journey

 

I am currently a 4th year law student.

While i grade 8, i noticed that many of my colleagues were leaving school and i decided that i would find the reason for their leaving. I realized that it was due, in part, to their failing grades. This was as a result of their limited access to the books necessary for their learning. At that time i had neither the finances nor the time to undertake such a task, nor did i have a solution.

This year i realized that the books i used at that time were on my shelf doing nothing, furthermore, upon inquiry, the books used currently at school are the same books i used during my time there. 

I determined that the way to deal with the lack of books at school was to find a way to get books like those on my shelf and get them to those who needed them most.

I called people i remembered, but they wished payment for the books.

It is my belief that if i am able to pay these past students for their books, i will be able to get them to the new students who will be able to benefit from them.

story:
WHAT IS THE ONLINE CLASSROOM?

The Online Classroom offers lifelong learning and self development regardless of age, skillset or circumstances. It's a place where learning comes to life.

The Online Classroom will be THE place to learn something new online and on-demand.  Our aim is to offer a large selection of e-courses which will be available to purchase worldwide and on a vast variety of topics. This includes but is not limited to;

  • Technology
  • Gadgets
  • Business
  • Marketing 
  • Social Media
  • Networking
  • Creative Crafts
  • Blogging
  • Website Design
  • Photography
  • Yoga
  • Pregnancy
  • Baby Care
  • Dog Training
  • Bee-Keeping

Learning something new can provide you with the confidence and skillset to achieve more in life, business and even a new interest. When you take a course with The Online Classroom it doesn’t end there - you’ll also be invited to join our friendly online community where others will share, engage and help support you through the process.

 

WHAT’S IT’S AIM?

Our aim is to bring you relevant, helpful and engaging content which helps with your self development and is delivered on-demand to suit your busy lifestyle.

The Online Classroom clearly understands that the right learning experience & resources means you can achieve more. That’s why we will only work with well respected experts and aim to bring you content which is;

  • Engaging: Promoting the value of learning online and engagement by encouraging all our learners to be active within our community which offers helpful guidance, support and motivation to succeed.  
  • Relevant: Providing learning opportunities and practical learning tools in a simple, resourceful & easy to use format.
  • Equipping: Supporting people to achieve self development in their business, life and interests.

There will be a mix of free and paid for e-courses on a variety of topics, live training events, a library of relevant resources and even a book club too! The aim is that this friendly community becomes part of YOUR lifestyle, YOUR business or YOUR hobby.

 

WHY?

As I mentioned in the project video, I wasn’t fortunate enough to go to University or leave school with excellent qualifications, but I am a passion advocate of self development and learning in a way which works for you.

I'm extremely proud to have studied online with e-courses, workshops and tutorials to achieve the necessary skills to build and sustain a number of successful businesses.

I have done a vast amount of research and there is nothing quite like The Online Classroom.  We will not only offer a place for business skills and hobbies, but it will also be a place where you can send loved ones and relatives to learn new tips and tricks or even join our book club!

Unique. Bespoke. Personalised.

We will create and build a 'community spirit' where everyone helps one another to achieve and succeed. Offering you a place where you feel supported and part of something special. Your 'go-to' place where you want to learn more.

New technology will be at the forefront of The Online Classroom, so we’ll be utilising platforms like Facebook Live to offer question time and support calls. There will be live webinars to offer you taster sessions of some our upcoming courses and the free resource library will provide additional help and support.

 

WHO IS THIS FOR?

The Online Classroom welcomes anyone who is looking for non-accreditated informal learning where you studying online, on-demand and at a time that suits you.

The Online Classroom also helps business owners who would like to create their own courses and deliver them via our purpose built learning platform. 

Learn. Teach. Inspire.

 

WHY DO I NEED YOU?

To say this project is BIG is an understatement, it's....

HUGE! MASSIVE! HUMONGOUS!

and I can't do this alone.

My aim for The Online Classroom is to make everyone feel like they are part of a community. Somewhere you feel part of something special. Therefore I want YOU to be part it and be part of its progression, launch and future success.

By supporting this campaign, you will help ensure it succeeds in marketing the right courses, to the right people and delivering relevant content via a sleek, easy to use website.

It will also allow me to grow the business worldwide and offer content from global leaders and international experts at fair prices to you. Providing you with the best resources and affordable pricing available.

If the funding target is achieve, you are also helping grow the team which will include;

  • Customer Services
  • Technical Support
  • Marketing & PR
  • Advertising
  • Social Media Management
  • Legal Representation 
  • Accountant
  • Broadcast Production
  • Graphic Design
  • Administration

I'm sure you'll agree, this is the reason I can't do this alone.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP?

If you want to help, get involved or show your support - there are a number of ways which could help see this project succeed. You could:

  • Kindly BACK IT and pledge an amount of your choice via the pink button. This will help towards the target of reaching £20,000 by 25th January 2017.
  • You can pledge to purchase a pre-launch PERK incentive from as little as £5 which will help towards the target of reaching £20,000 by 25th January 2017 and be available from February 2017.
  • You could share this project link on social media, with friends, family, work colleagues and potential backers to help raise awareness of what I am trying to achieve. The success of this project replies on LOTS of people being part of it.  
  • You can do all three and feel great knowing you're helping create something amazing for 2017!

 

WHAT DOES MAKING A PLEDGE MEAN?

By making a pledge, backing the project or taking advantage of the pre-launch perk incentive (payment pledge), payment will only be taken if the project reaches the target amount by 25th January 2017. 

Only at that point this payment pledge processed and taken from your Paypal account / chosen payment method at the time of making the pledge. 

No monies will be taken if the project is unsuccessful. However, the launch of The Online Classroom will still take place at no further cost to you.

 

WHAT DO YOU GET?

I have created a number of different pre-launch perks which are incentive rewards if you decide to make a pledge / back the project. They start from as little as £5 and can be seen in the PERKS section. The types of incentives available are;

  • For a £5 pledge you'll receive a lifelong discount code for future use.
  • For a £25 pledge you'll receive a £50 course credit.
  • For a £150 pledge you'll receive a headshot photography package for your business startup
  • For a £500 pledge you'll receive 6 months bespoke mentoring and access to all our e-courses
  • For a £1,000 pledge you'll become dedicated sponsor and become an "Ambassador of The Online Classroom" - you'll also receive a personal invite to the Exclusive VIP Event where you'll be amongst other Ambassadors and VIP's.

Everyone who makes a pledge will automatically be invited to our online community and you’ll be the first to know about future developments, special discounts and have the opportunity to be part of our focus group where we’ll decide what to offer in the future. You can be involved as much or as little as you choose.

 

THE IMPACT.

It's a hard slog to get something like this launched, especially when you're doing it alone and with limited resources. I am fully committed to doing whatever it takes to make this project a success and bring you a community driven online learning platform where people can self develop and learn on-demand.

However, with your support and by making a pledge - this mean YOU believe in this too! That means so much and will result in offering you more. More courses, more free content and more of what YOU really want to see. 

Finally, should you decide to back this project, I hope you agree that this is an investment in a new skill, your self development or even a new hobby.

Your support means everything and I’d love you to be part of something special.

Thank you.

Sarah x

For a £5 pledge you'll receive a lifelong discount code for future use.
For a £25 pledge you'll receive a £50 course credit.
For a £150 pledge you'll receive a headshot photography package for your business startup
For a £500 pledge you'll receive 6 months bespoke mentoring and access to all our e-courses
For a £1,000 pledge you'll become dedicated sponsor and become an "Ambassador of The Online Classroom" - you'll also receive a personal invite to the Exclusive VIP Event where you'll be amongst other Ambassadors and VIP's.

Everyone who makes a pledge will automatically be invited to our online community and you’ll be the first to know about future developments, special discounts and have the opportunity to be part of our focus group where we’ll decide what to offer in the future. You can be involved as much or as little as you choose.
 
THE IMPACT.
It's a hard slog to get something like this launched, especially when you're doing it alone and with limited resources. I am fully committed to doing whatever it takes to make this project a success and bring you a community driven online learning platform where people can self develop and learn on-demand.
However, with your support and by making a pledge - this mean YOU believe in this too! That means so much and will result in offering you more. More courses, more free content and more of what YOU really want to see. 
Finally, should you decide to back this project, I hope you agree that this is an investment in a new skill, your self development or even a new hobby.
Your support means everything and I’d love you to be part of something special.
Thank you.
Sarah x

story:
Hello, the Workis team is Ruslan, Maria, and Shahruh. A year ago we decided to create a simple online platform that would help people find jobs using a messenger. 

 

 

 

We’ve been running a pilot program of our Telegram service in Uzbekistan (Central Asia) for six months. Present job search  websites such as superjob.uz, rabota.uz, headhunter.uz, ishkop.uz, uzjobs.uz lack interactive services to their users. Everyone who is in search of a job facing one or more of the following problems: 

1) Your resume needs to be constantly adjusted or updated. 

2) Or if you are an employer, your vacancy needs to be placed on several different job sites. This requires spending a lot of time. 

3) You often get applications from not-qualified candidates.

4) The functionality of several websites is limited to desktop version of your browser or simply outdated.

@Workis is a solution to these problems.

- Its completely free. Place your resume ➡️ https://telegram.im/@workis_bot

 

GENERATION Z WANTS MOBILITY

Timing is a valuable asset not only for the employers, but also for the job seekers.  The next generation is looking for a simple, quick tool that helps them minimize the time spent searching for a job and maximizes the results, i.e., job offers!

 

Workis helps to build an impressive resume simply with the help of a smartphone.  It is a Telegram-based bot, which allows job seekers to effectively connect with potential employers. Workis is a cloud-based Telegram messenger service, so you cannot download it.  All data is kept secured in the cloud. In Workis, anyone can write a resume or create a job vacancy.  With several taps on your smartphone, you can immediately begin receiving job offers or resumes from potential candidates.

 

 

 

WHY CHOOSE WORKIS?

People are choosing Workis because it is user-friendly and mobile.  People can now perform job searches in messengers. 

The vast majority of smartphone owners use messengers. They can check messages, chat with friends, and read news.  With the help of a messenger, anyone can have job information with the click of a few buttons.  Your job vacancy won’t get lost in junk mail because statistics show that people read everything they receive via messengers. Searching for potential employees powered by Workis in messengers is the most efficient tool for filling job vacancies!

 


The potential users of the project are 200 million Telegram users and 1.3 billion Facebook messenger users.

 

Workis is designed not only for active job seekers, but also for working professionals looking for a career change.

Those who are employed or continuing their job search in a passive way normally follow a specific company or industry in order to not to miss a promotion or a better job environment. With Workis,  anyone can find a vacancy in practically industry.

Everyone wants to be efficient, and Workis gives you the edge you need to be efficient.

It allows you to:

1) use the messenger for a job search.  61% of human resources managers and recruiters in Uzbekistan named the Workis messengers ”more effective than job search websites, emails or social network announcements.” (The survey was conducted by the Telegram channel @trudmarket with 5125 subscribers.)

2) assess the qualification of a potential candidate.  Workis can check the skills of any candidate for a job vacancy. This saves employers time and energy and increases the quality of the potential job candidates. Simply add a test to the job vacancy, and Workis will help you "filter" out unqualified candidates.

3) upload a resume conveniently with the help of Workis or a template.

4) use various qualification tests to check the work proficiency and job skills that potential employers need.

 

EMPOWER THE SEARCH FOR JOB CANDIDATES

 

There are a lot of smart solutions to help you select qualified candidates based on the information contained in job resumes. However, this sometimes is not enough to make the right decision. When hundreds of applications are received for one vacancy, it is not easy to make the best selection.

Workis can also help employers in this situation. Employers are able to assess the job seeker’s competence and experience automatically.  The auto-testing function speeds up the pre-selection process because only competent job applicants will be selected. It’s easy! Each vacancy can be applied after potential employees pass the test. Based on the test results, the employer decides whether the candidate is qualified or not.

 

WHY DO WE BELIEVE IN OUR PROJECT?

 

Today, our total users in Telegram exceed 15,000 active users including employers, job seekers, and recruiters.

 

What results have been achieved in 3 months?

 

 

 

WHAT WILL WE SPEND YOUR DONATIONS ON?

We have a proposed budget of $55,000.  This budget will be divided as follows:

-  To connect the Workis platform to the Facebook messenger: 10%.

-  To create the web platform: 15%.

-  To market the product: 50%.

-  To build the Workis team: 25%.

 

If you are eager to support the Workis project, your donation is greatly appreciated.  Please donate by clicking on one of the following types of donations and receive the following benefits.

story:
The Learn Or Teach Story

 

My name is Clever Mukori and yes, my folks are still trying to figure out the distinction between an adjective and a noun, love 'em though! I was born in Zimbabwe and consider myself very fortunate for divine providence and parents that had the means to afford me a top tier education. At present, i'm a Chemistry & Biology graduate of Concordia College in Moorhead, MN, an institution that not only deserves credit for my recent medical school admission, but for teaching me to Be Responsibly Engaged in the World (BREW).

Through study, research, and my experiences living in Africa and now the United States, I've become deeply aware of the unique academic and non-academic learning challenges that various institutions and communities worldwide are facing and have founded Learn Or Teach to address these:

Problem  Scenario 1

Global societies are transitioning from the industrial age to the information age, of which the former society's labor pyramid consisted of the physical labor class at the base, mental labor in the center and the innovative class at the top level. Due to increasing automation and technological advancements, the global labor pyramid has been upended, with the base becoming the creative class, the middle being a shrinking mental labor class, and the top level being the physical labor class. Needless to say, these changes are more pronounced in developed nations but are significantly shaping labor pools worldwide. 

Challenge: Our education systems have not been adjusted to address these dynamic newer age labor requirements. Educational institutions and employers require training and learning systems that equip learners with the fundamental, practical, and experiential tools required to take advantage of the jobs of the future i.e. the innovative and creative sort

 

 

Problem  Scenario 2

  • 1 in 5 children are not in school worldwide, which translates to 263 million young people aged 6-17 yrs, with 20% more out-of-school girls vs boys. This is a steep waste of human capital
  • Africa has a starker picture on this issue, with 1/5 of 6-11 year olds out of school, 1/3 of 12-15 year olds out of school, and 60% of 16-19 year olds out of school, according to the United Nations Educational and Scientific Cultural Organization (UNESCO).

Challenge: With a median age of 19, Africa, the world's youngest continent is severely squandering human capital by not making the necessary investments in public education. Investing in Africa and the world's youth not only creates new markets to sell high value goods and services to, but it also increases political stability by creating an informed populous that holds leaders more accountable, and influences the enacting of pro-development legislation and more equitable democratic processes.

 

The Learn Or Teach Solution

Learn Or Teach is project and experience based cloud LMS provider, whose pedagogical strategy is to take the learner through a three phase process: 1. Learn fundamental concepts 2. Engage in real world practical projects 3. Take part in volunteering, internship, entrepreneurial, and job placement experiences.

Our software provides a discussion board, projects blog, and experiences blog, all of which are social tools that foster a practical and communal approach to learning. These tools enable employers to increase productivity through scenario based learning through projects and deliver career advancement opportunities through experiential training. With respect to academic learners, the Learn Or Teach way facilitates a practical approach to learning, giving learners custodianship of their learning, equipping them with skills most desired by employers, and matching them with placement opportunities. Welcome to the future of learning!

Learn Or Teach generates revenue primarily through SAAS subscription sales of our LMS and its workforce training services. Users can select from a variety of plans that cater to varying amounts of user masses and feature requirements. Each plan comes with a free trial period and also offers free demos prior to signing up. The LMS plans each have basic and advanced versions, as well as yearly and month to month plans which differ in pricing and specifications. Learn Or Teach not only offers an innovative and industry standard LMS but presents more affordable pricing than the highest rated LMS providers by renown rating services such as Capterra.

With respect to addressing barriers to educational access, we intend to set up a foundation in the future that provides a free cross-disciplinary e-learning platform, as well as establishes physical learning centers in needy communities. This we do by forming public and private partnerships with primarily local institutions and leveraging existing systems such as libraries or schools and providing technological resources that students can use to access our content. In addition, we are partnering with Facebook on their Free Basics platform, which is a limited free version of the internet available through mobile connectivity in about 50 developing countries presently. By submitting our website to their platform, we will be able to reach millions of the world’s neediest learners, from tender first graders to small business farming women eager to learn new marketing and production skills.

 

What We Need....

We began software development of our application this summer on June 1st, 2018 and are scheduled to be done by January 31st, 2019 (8 month process).  Our total project costs are $42,774 and we have paid $19, 270 to date. We are in need of roughly $23,504 more to complete development. Furthermore, we will need to raise funds to cover operational expenses such as server costs, payrolls costs for sales and customer service employees, maintenance, and R&D for future software updates. However, we have kept our fund raising goal relatively conservative, to reflect immediate financing needs for software development. Shown below is our estimated yearly budget for all costs associated with developing, launching our MVP, and operating from February 2019 until December 2019. The breakdown is as follows:

Budget Breakdown

 

Total budget for 2019: $70, 000

Software Development: $43,000

Marketing: $5,000

Legal Proceedings: $2,000

Miscellaneous:  $20,000 ( cloud services, operational, technical services etc)

 

 

If the campaign does not succeed as expected, we will seek V.C. investment and combine the campaign funds with future investment dollars.

Learn Or Teach is a product for and by the people, so it is up to us the people to spread the word far and wide to everyone who will lend and ear. Please back us, follow us on facebook, twitter, instagram, linkedin, and snapchat, and share our campaign on these platforms and via email! Let is spread like a fire! 

 

Our gift to you

We are absolutely thrilled to inform you about our unique and fashionable perks which are outlined below. We would like to emphasize that each campaign backer will have a broad choice of offerings, will reserve the right to accept or deny their perk, and will receive their perk regardless of how the campaign turns out. Needless to mention, each backer can give any dollar amount they would like.

$20-34 contribution - Your choice of 2 Learn Or Teach wristbands & a Keychain

$35-49 contribution - A Learn Or Teach notepad + earphones

$50-99 contribution - A premium Learn Or Teach Coffee Mug + stress ball

$100-149 contribution - Your choice of a t-shit & tote/drawstring bag

$150-499 contribution -  Your choice of a Learn Or Teach baseball cap & hoodie

$500 + contribution - Your choice of a premium Learn Or Teach watch

Here are a few samples, available to order in White, Blue, Black, and Grey

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Some of the main risks that we face during development and after launching include the following:

i.) Receiving a below par product from the development team we are contracted with

Response:  We are contracted through a free-lancing company that performs vetting services of the free lancers who are on the platform and gives extensive reviews about their prior work including examples of projects they have worked on. Learn Or Teach has obtained a mutually agreed upon detailed and legally binding proposal including detailed and quoted specifications. The developers are being compensated on a hourly basis, with lump-some weekly  payments that can be halted in the event of any concerns.

ii.) Running out of funds before completing development or before our one year budget time

Response:  As stated in the point above, Learn Or Teach has obtained a mutually agreed upon detailed and legally binding proposal including detailed and quoted specifications. The developer cannot change the costs of the project midway and we will not begin before raising the necessary funds for development. As for operational costs, in the event that we fall short, we will pursue V.C. funding, loan options, and continue to contribute personal funds

iii.) Failing to find content contributors

Response: We have already begun signup and reviewing potential content contributors, who are already under review. We will continue with this process, advertising also to increase brand awareness   

Still have additional questions? Click here to watch answers to some FAQ's.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to give us a monetary contribution at this time? Hakuna Matata! Here is how else to help:

  • Spread the word far and wide! Use Indiegogo sharing tools, share on all social media platforms!!
  • Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, and Snapchat!!
  • Subscribe to our email list on the Learn Or Teach Website
  • Share our campaign with your email contacts, export them on Linkedin and email them directly to share the good news of Learn Or Teach, they will appreciate it!

Still have additional questions? Click here to watch answers to some FAQ's.

story:
We're Langojango, publishers of foreign language phrasebooks and dictionaries - available in 30 different languages.

Our books (print and ebook) are unique in that they allow you to instantly hear native speakers pronouncing each word and phrase, on demand. 

If you have traveled and tried to use traditional foreign language phrasebooks, you know that the biggest draw back is trying to determine the correct pronunciation of an unfamiliar foreign language from written hints alone. You're not a native speaker and bold and italic font only go so far in conveying the subtlety and cadence of a new language. 

What if it were possible to hear all the words and phrases in your phrasebook spoken by a native speaker - without even having to download a special app to your phone? 

Jangobot connects the messaging app you already use, like Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Telegram, and Wechat to your print or ebook Langojango phrasebook. 

Visit a link on our website provided in your book and Jangobot will be added as contact in the messenger app you choose. You only need to do this once. 

After adding Jangobot as a contact, the next step is to ask it what you want to hear. Every word and phrase in your phrasebook is assigned an index number. For an example in German: 

146. Where is the nearest train station? Wo ist der nächste Bahnhof?

Simply message Jangobot in your messenger app with the index number in your phrasebook. Jangobot will deliver the audio of the native speaker for you to play in just a few seconds. You can do this with all 3,000 words and phrases in your phrasebook. 

Jangobot works on your phone, your tablet, or your computer - basically anywhere you can access your messaging application.

Jangobot is included for free with your phrasebook purchase and requires no monthly subscription.

With your Langojango phrasebook and Jangobot, you will read and hear 3,000 essential words and phrases you need as a tourist, business traveler, or student. Learn to get around, express your opinions, and communicate effectively. 

Every Langojango phrasebook includes in-depth coverage of topics related to socializing, practicalities, food, safe travel, general reference, and a two way dictionary covering English and the language you are looking to learn. You can view the full table of contents here. 

By reading your phrasebook and listening to native speakers with Jangobot, you'll retain more of your new language, and learn to speak with a proper accent.

Our partner translators are all ready hard at work producing text and audio translations.  We plan to have all 30 titles released in print and ebook formats and Jangobot live by the end of October 2021. 

Whether you order a single title or all 30, you will receive the digital version of the phrasebook of your choice in unlocked .ePub format and PDF format. As there are no digital restrictions on these files, they can easily be loaded on to what ever ebook device or ebook software you prefer. 

For backers that also desire a printed copy, we are providing the option to order physical books for the cost of printing and shipping. We anticipate the cost of print titles to be around $8-$12 per title, shipped to your home, almost anywhere in the world.

We are a team of foreign language professionals who are working create innovative language learning experiences that will stimulate people around the world to learn new languages.   

Every book is edited and recorded by native speakers of the language who work professionally as  as translators, interpreters, university professors, and other foreign language educators. 

With a referral program powered by Kickbooster, you can refer friends to pre-order on Indiegogo. You can earn 20% Cash Back on each friend referred.

Table of Contents: View Here.

Number of words and phrases: 3,000

Print Book Dimensions: 5x8

Number of pages:  513 pages

Ebook:  unlocked ePub and PDF

Jangobot: Searchable audio of all 3,000 words and phrases. 

Compatible Messenger Applications: Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Telegram, and Wechat
story_txt: We're Langojango, publishers of foreign language phrasebooks and dictionaries - available in 30 different languages.Our books (print and ebook) are unique in that they allow you to instantly hear native speakers pronouncing each word and phrase, on demand. If you have traveled and tried to use traditional foreign language phrasebooks, you know that the biggest draw back is trying to determine the correct pronunciation of an unfamiliar foreign language from written hints alone. You're not a native speaker and bold and italic font only go so far in conveying the subtlety and cadence of a new language. What if it were possible to hear all the words and phrases in your phrasebook spoken by a native speaker - without even having to download a special app to your phone? Jangobot connects the messaging app you already use, like Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Telegram, and Wechat to your print or ebook Langojango phrasebook. Visit a link on our website provided in your book and Jangobot will be added as contact in the messenger app you choose. You only need to do this once. After adding Jangobot as a contact, the next step is to ask it what you want to hear. Every word and phrase in your phrasebook is assigned an index number. For an example in German: 146. Where is the nearest train station? Wo ist der nächste Bahnhof?Simply message Jangobot in your messenger app with the index number in your phrasebook. Jangobot will deliver the audio of the native speaker for you to play in just a few seconds. You can do this with all 3,000 words and phrases in your phrasebook. Jangobot works on your phone, your tablet, or your computer - basically anywhere you can access your messaging application.Jangobot is included for free with your phrasebook purchase and requires no monthly subscription.With your Langojango phrasebook and Jangobot, you will read and hear 3,000 essential words and phrases you need as a tourist, business traveler, or student. Learn to get around, express your opinions, and communicate effectively. Every Langojango phrasebook includes in-depth coverage of topics related to socializing, practicalities, food, safe travel, general reference, and a two way dictionary covering English and the language you are looking to learn. You can view the full table of contents here. By reading your phrasebook and listening to native speakers with Jangobot, you'll retain more of your new language, and learn to speak with a proper accent.Our partner translators are all ready hard at work producing text and audio translations.  We plan to have all 30 titles released in print and ebook formats and Jangobot live by the end of October 2021. Whether you order a single title or all 30, you will receive the digital version of the phrasebook of your choice in unlocked .ePub format and PDF format. As there are no digital restrictions on these files, they can easily be loaded on to what ever ebook device or ebook software you prefer. For backers that also desire a printed copy, we are providing the option to order physical books for the cost of printing and shipping. We anticipate the cost of print titles to be around $8-$12 per title, shipped to your home, almost anywhere in the world.We are a team of foreign language professionals who are working create innovative language learning experiences that will stimulate people around the world to learn new languages.   Every book is edited and recorded by native speakers of the language who work professionally as  as translators, interpreters, university professors, and other foreign language educators. With a referral program powered by Kickbooster, you can refer friends to pre-order on Indiegogo. You can earn 20% Cash Back on each friend referred.Table of Contents: View Here.Number of words and phrases: 3,000Print Book Dimensions: 5x8Number of pages:  513 pagesEbook:  unlocked ePub and PDFJangobot: Searchable audio of all 3,000 words and phrases. Compatible Messenger Applications: Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, Telegram, and Wechat

story:
Fruitamals®️ is a registered brand. These soft and cuddly plush toys were created out of love by a grandparent.  By funding this project you will help us get our safe & approved plush toys made. You can choose one or both of the Fruitamals plush toys to sponsor, detailed in the Perks.

How can you Help?

Plush toy production is very expensive. We can't do it alone! 

They have to be manufactured in bulk and we are hoping you can help us achieve our goal. Once we reach our goal, Fruitamals plush toys will go into production. It's a lengthy process and your patience is much appreciated.  We have two prototypes, Munkin and Ottermelon.

Meet "Munkin"

Munkin is 6 inches wide and 4 inches tall, made from polyester soft fabric and with features expertly embroidered. Not only is Munkin super soft but is easy to toss around like a football. 

 

Meet "Ottermelon"

Ottermelon is also about 6 inches wide and 4 inches tall. Made from polyester soft fabric with features expertly embroidered and huggable.

 

Meet The Fruitamals Team

Frequently Asked Questions

  • When will I receive my product?

Plush toy production is a lengthy process and are made in bulk. It takes 45 - 60 days from the end of the campaign to receive your product. Your patience is much appreciated!

  • What happens when you reach your goal?

Both prototypes, Munkin and Ottermelon plush toys will be manufactured and certified.

Helping The Homeless

We wan't to give back to the community. 10% of our campaign funds will be donated to the Tenderloin Neighborhood Development for the homeless https://www.tndc.org

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, you can help in other ways:

  • Get the word out and help us make some noise about our campaign through email, text or even word of mouth.

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

Help us get these cuties made and spread the love to other children!

story:
I am Lisa. My friend Tanya lived ten years with illness. We talked while she was in the hospital about doing something to create a legacy that was us. Two girls, the greatest of friends who are moms, wives and hard workers. 

With the help of my family and friends, we formed the Pink Panthers. It's a team of 12 boys who play volleyball. They are working in the community to earn $10,000 for the cancer center where Tanya received her treatment. In return, a sponsor business matched the money earned for the center in tournament fees, uniforms, travel expenses – everything – to play volleyball. No fundraising. Working, earning and giving. And playing. We started in earnest with work in February, It is now the end of April, by mid July we will have met our goal.

The goal of this campaign is to fund Pink Panther Pilot Team #2.

Empowering Kids.

The sneaky part about this project is that it's about empowering kids with the skills to lead – self confidence, durability, creativity and philanthropy. As a mom, I work to give those qualities to my kids. With this project, I hope teamwork will instill those qualities into entire communities. 

I have learned that this isn't for every kid or parent. Some are too busy. Some  have worked and earned well past their commitment. Some lead and motivate and hold their pals accountable. Two have talked about starting their own businesses because of the ideas and confidence they've built working as a Pink Panther. 

Making a Difference.

With $5,000 I can take on one role, the sponsor, with another team of kids and build on what I've learned. I will introduce them to the Pink Panthers, and the idea of rallying behind a friend. The work they do and the money they earn for charity will be returned in grants to fund their team. 

I will  update you on Pink Panther Team 2 via this page. I will also update you on the development of the IT infrastructure. It automates the process and roles of each member of a team – from the sponsor to the coach, team mom, team captains and team families. It includes an app – a personal database for kids as they apply to colleges and universities or employment that logs their community service of working, earning and giving.   

Thanks for Reading.

I really do appreciate you taking the time. 

Sincerely,

Lisa

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of Singaporean with a heart for kids living in impoverished condition in Cambodia. We have organized yearly trips to Cambodia to bless them with daily necessities, learning programs and most importantly, our love.

Refer to our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/giveusyourlove for more information on what we do and our past activities in Cambodia.

What We Need & What You Can Give

This year, we are more focused in our mission. Seeing how run down the condition of their classrooms are, we are trying to raise fund to do some minor refurbishment of their classroom. As such, we are aiming to raise USD$2000 to purchase floor mats and other basic necessities to improve the learning conditions for the kids. 

In case we do not reach our targeted amount, we will still use the money to bless the impoverished kids by organizing food hampers giveaways or other meaningful activities.

You can monitor our progress there through our Facebook updates. We will be going for this mission in November 2015! 

The Impact

This will be our fourth year running such similar campaigns. We have established Cambodian contacts to make sure that your contributions go directly to truly deserving orphanages and organizations.

The difference that you can make is real. Let these Cambodian kids living below the poverty line have a real shot at a better future by contributing towards their education.

 Other Ways You Can Help
  • If you do not wish to contribute money, just like us on our Facebook page and help us spread what we are doing
  • You can even contact us and donate other goods in kind that you feel is going to benefit the kids in Cambodia

story:
Live webcast! Live on facebook. Live from the street! Live from homes. Lives from offices! Everybody is doing it. Everyone’s live now. But how many of them are really nailing it? 

A smart man once said “every great speaker was first a bad speaker”. So, if practice leads to perfection than that’s exactly what you’ll be doing during the classes: practice and more practice.

If you have already practiced going live, than you are our ideal student. If you haven’t, don’t you worry. By the end of the first level, you’ll be transmitting your first live-webcast intervention and we’ll have fun doing it.  

For 1 day, you’ll be developing your live-webcast skills for the final examination by receiving continuous live feed-back from your dedicated teachers and from your 5 fellows boot-camp students.

There are 6 lessons you’ll be attending on communication, psychology and acting. For a fully immersive learning experience, everything is happening exclusively online using a dedicated application.

You’ll learn to harness the power of spontaneity but also take calculated risks when it comes to setting appropriate limits between your private and your public life. 

Your training program actually start as soon as you enrol. You’ll be taking a personality test prior the live-boot camp. Then, our psychologist will harmonize your group and tailor your exercises for the most efficient group learning dynamics. 

So, charge your smartphone, check the camera, the microphone and the internet connection. You’re now all set for doing something new. 

Every weekend, our academy teaches live-webcast. And, with our students, we see the creation of beautiful, live moments. Digital moments that can transcend our times. Moments that can become a reflection of our present reality for our grand-grand-grand sons and daughters to watch and maybe get to know a part of who we are. 
We are now an ever expending team of 10 teachers from all over the world and we will be teaching in English, Spanish, Portuguese and Romanian.


Are you the person that will support the world's efforts to learn how to communicate better there ideas, feelings or thoughts? If you feel that someone around you would benefit from learning how to present better their story, please support our school?

25% of the funds  will be invested in developing and communicating this educational program and try to integrate it in public schools as well.

75% of the funds will be invested in continuing the research on online education technology and how can we connect bio-rate data (e.g.: Fitbit) from students towards teachers's  during online classes in order to increase the efficiency of the learning process. We wil also be experimenting with augmented and even virtual reality.

Please visit www.goliveondigital.com for more details

story:
Dr. Claudio Coronel Sanmartin, creador de la Campaña  Ecuador Unido Por la Salud y la Vida.

La Organización Mundial De La Salud, realizó un clamoroso llamado a los gobiernos de América Latina y del Mundo, en Febrero de 2015, debido a que el sobrepeso, la obesidad y la desnutrición son un problema de la Salud Pública Mundial, ya que traen consecuencias mortales y prematuras como lo son los problemas cardiovasculares, la diabetes y la hipertensión. Solo practicando la alimentación saludable se puede prevenir miles de muertes prematuras y esa es la misión de ECUVIDA, frenar ese gran problema que existe en Ecuador y en el mundo.

Desde hace 25 años junto con mi familia practicamos y predicamos una alimentación saludable, basado en el consumo de frutas y vegetales; mi familia esta compuesta por mi esposa de 46 años de edad, mis dos hijas de 21 y 23 años y yo Claudio Coronel de 62 años nunca he estado enfermo, no se lo que es un examen de sangre, ni de ninguna otra clase, somos una familia saludable.

CAMPAÑA

La campaña Ecuador Unido Por La Salud y La Vida, busca motivar que la gente consuma mas frutas y vegetales, porque tener una alimentación saludable, es la mejor manera para prevenir la salud. Ecuador es primer productor del mejor banano del mundo, somos exportadores de esa maravillosa fruta, ademas de mango, piña, melón, frutilla, brocoli, aguacate, entre otros. En Ecuador somos productores de frutas y vegetales en abundancia, consecuentemente son muy baratos. Nuestro objetivo con esta campaña es crear una cultura de alimentación saludable, en conjunto con el presidente del Ecuador, Lcdo. Lenin Moreno Garces, con el Ministerio de Salud, Ministerio de Educación, con los Alcaldes, entre otras instituciones.

La ayuda de ustedes ciudadanos del Ecuador y del Mundo será extraordinaria, porque tendremos la extraordinaria oportunidad de iniciar esta campaña de incalculables beneficios para la salud y la vida de mas de 16 millones de Ecuatorianos y de billones en el mundo. Con esta estrategia de campaña motivaremos al Gobierno del Ecuador y demás gobiernos del Mundo, ya que se ahorraran miles de millones de dolares y con el Sistema de Salud Preventiva evitaremos millones de muertes prematuras.

LO QUE NECESITAMOS:

Lo que necesitamos para realizar una agresiva campaña utilizando todos los medios de comunicación y crear estrategias para motivar a las personas, son por lo menos $485.000 (Cuatrocientos ochenta y cinco mil Dolares). El dinero recaudado sera encausado para la constitución de la Fundación ECUVIDA, la misma institución será la encargada de administrar los recursos obtenidos de esta campaña de recaudación de fondos, para poner en marcha la Campaña Ecuador Unido Por La Salud y La Vida. Con esto contribuiremos con una de las mas grandes obras sociales, nunca antes realizadas.

En caso de no conseguir la gran meta de los fondos, igual continuaremos con nuestro propósito, aunque nos toque demorar un poco mas esa Gran Campaña Nacional e Internacional. Igual iniciaremos la campaña Ecuador Unido Por La Salud y La Vida.

IMPACTO:

Esta Campaña causara un impacto extraordinario, único, que será de transcendental importancia para la gente mas pobre del Ecuador y del Mundo, porque es de salud, pero también busca crear ahorro para las familias y para los gobiernos, ya que los gastos en salud son millonarios, porque no existe salud preventiva que motive la alimentación saludable.

Es valioso para quienes colaboren porque estaremos contribuyendo al inicio de una Campaña Nacional e Internacional, única en la historia del Ecuador y del Mundo, ya que gracias a la tecnología, las redes sociales, contribuiremos con la Campaña ECUVIDA, para tener mayor alcance a los demás países del mundo.

Esta Campaña de motivación busca dar a conocer las maravillas de las frutas y vegetales, las mismas que están al alcance de nuestras manos,que no conocemos o no les damos el valor que en realidad tienen. y que pueden cambiar nuestras vidas de forma muy positiva.

Aquellas personas que no puedan colaborar económicamente, si nos pueden ayudar informando, dando a conocer nuestra campaña a mas personas, para que se motiven a contribuir.

Recuerden replicar esta Campaña Única Ecuador Unido por la Salud y la Vida, que lanzamos desde la mitad del mundo:ECUADOR, para el Mundo con: Pasión Por La Vida.

Estimados y Queridos ciudadanos de Ecuador y del mundo, para el éxito de esta Campaña mas grande del Mundo, contamos con su apoyo.

Muchas Gracias.

story:
Bottom line - Our vision is simple:
By supporting independent tourism,
you support a social economy and a
multi-cultural co-existence in Israel.

We ask for your support to make it happen! 

More Hostels = More Collaborations = More Tourists = Economic Prosperity

 

WHY PEOPLE TRAVEL?

Everyone knows the benefits of traveling: the adventure, the personal development and learning, the cultural exposure… And, let's admit – it's just fun!

But why do people REALLY travel? Think about it – why going half way around the world when 5 minutes away from your house there must be plenty of new things for you to see…

 

We believe travel is a value on its own.

We believe that traveling is the right thing to do.

We believe in travel, and its power to change the world.

We believe you can help make a difference, one step at a time.

 

WHO?

 

ILH – Israel Hostels, is Israel’s first independent hostel network, gathering over 30 of Israel’s finest hostels.

Our members provide quality accommodations at affordable prices from the Golan Heights in the north to the Red Sea down south.

Our mission is to support independent travelers in Israel and to provide them with a high-quality, unique and safe travel experience.


At the photo, you can have a small glance into our community,
showing hostel owners, workshop graduates & lecturers.

From left to right & top to bottom:
IRIS - Jericho Inn, AHMED - Juha's Guesthouse, SHOVAL - Florentine Hostel, DAN - Jerusalem Hostel (ILH Workshop graduate), SHIMI - Kibbutz Inbar Country Lodging, ZIV - Old Jaffa Hostel, ​OMER - Overstay & Tiberias Hostel (ILH Workshop graduate & lecturer), ARNON – Jerusalem Hostel & Old Jaffa Hostel, AMEER – Fauzi Azar Inn, ORI – ILH manager (ILH Workshop graduate), ALON – Golan Heights Hostel, YARON – Abraham Hostels (ILH Workshop lecturer), LIAD – Golan Heights Hostel (ILH Workshop graduate), MILOU & ALON – Golan Garden (ILH Workshop graduates), KENYA – Milk & Honey (ILH Workshop graduate), AMALIA – Old Jaffa Hostel, EFRAT (& LITTLE TAMAR) – ILH previous manager, LEE – The Green Backpackers Hostels (ILH Workshop lecturer), EMMA – Abraham Hostel TLV, NETA – Juha's Guesthouse (ILH Workshop graduate & lecturer), VALERIE – Tiberias Hostel, ODED – Clil Guesthouse (ILH Workshop graduate), GIL – TripTouch

WHAT?

 

Our ideology stands behind our project of Independent Tourism Workshops: professional courses by lectures from the tourism industry aimed at helping independent entrepreneurs to open & operate their own hostel. In accordance with a Social Business's point of view, our hostel owners and tourism experts help opening successful (and at times competing) businesses.

It is a new kind of capitalism that serves humanity's most pressing needs: using a money-propelled industry,  in order to build a shared social and economic interest, boosting small independent businesses and cross-sectoral collaborations.

 

 

That's how it works:

  1. A backpacker / traveler – stays in a hostel. His money spent per night starts a trickle-down effect throughout the community, which supports an ever-growing economic circle:
  • The hostel staff: owners, reception staff, cleaning staff.
  • Outsourced staff: laundry, food & beverages suppliers, maintenance & kitchen.
  • Basic local services: transportation, post office, money exchange, kiosks & grocery shops. 
  • Local food & beverages: food stands, coffee shops, restaurants and bars.
  • Leisure activities & attractions: Clubs & nightlife, sport attractions, museums, workshops, exhibitions and festivals.
  • Tourist services: Shuttles, tour guides, information centers and local souvenir shops.
  1. The touristic experiences keeps developing by the support of the money trickle-down effect.
     
  2. The shared economic interest generates wide spread collaborations, which encourage cultural co-existence.
     
  3. These developments mature into a better touristic product, which in turn attracts more travelers.
     
  4. The social and economic development – entwined into the touristic product of an entire community – keeps developing together.

 

 

Imagine what we can achieve by amplifying our already successful workshops to a wider scale. Imagine an industry based on independent businesses, supported by independent people – without any governmental involvement.

Imagine that industry being one which serves to host foreign independent travelers in the best travel experience possible, in the Middle East in general, and in Israel in specific.

 

Our workshops cover the following aspects:

  • ILH – Israel Hostels' association agenda and activities.
  • Opening a Hostel from the group up.
  • Challenges of operating a small Hostel out of the "must see" touristic areas.
  • Day to day Hostel management.
  • Hostels industry worldwide.
  • Sales & Marketing, PR and online bookings.
  • Building a business plan.
  • Business registration.
  • Open panel for questions between entrepreneurs and Hostels owners.
  • Meeting with operating entrepreneurs in the field of independent tourism.

 

 

HOW?

 

We turn to you for support in our vision. As a noon profit organization, we wish to expand the effect of our workshops in three manners:

  1. People: We want our affect to reach a wider crowd, adjusting it to minority crowds in Israel which can benefit from independent tourism: Kibbutz accommodations, Bedouins, traditional-religious neighborhoods, Druze and Baha'is.
     
  2. Location: We wish to bring our experience and guidance to the peripheral areas of Israel where the tourism potential is huge yet unapplied, specifically in Akko and the north shore, Haifa and the Druze villages on Mount Carmel, the Dead Sea, the Bedouin and agricultural villages in the Negev desert and the Arava desert around Eilat.
     
  3. Professionalism: Nowadays' workshops depends on lectures participating on voluntarily basis. We wish to hire paid lectures as well in order to give a wider and more in depth coverage to the professional lectures given today.
     
  4. Frequency: Nowadays the workshops are either annual or biannual at best – according to funds we gather in order to set up a workshop. We need your help in order to run between 4 to 5 workshops a year.

 

WHERE?

 

Anywhere and everywhere in Israel!

           

 

HOW MUCH?

 

In order to do so we need to gather 29,300 $ - according to the following estimated costs:

5 extended workshops per year: 8,500 $

  • The estimated cost per each extended workshop will be 1,700 $ (today's workshops costs to the NGO is 1,100 $ - without salary for lectures). The cost is divided into the following categories:
    • Lectures fee
    • Classroom rent
    • Food & drinks
    • Accommodation for 20 entrepreneurs

Building the layout for workshops on a regular basis: 20,800 $ 

  • A part-time NGO employee as a Director of Workshops.
  • Building programs for target crowds in Israel.
  • Building programs for target areas in Israel.
  • Workshops marketing.

 

WHY?

 

In the last 4 years we had 7 successful workshops, out of which 13 hostels came to operate – most of them outside of the major cities in Israel: In small villages in the Golan Heights, Tiberias, Nazareth, Cana village, Jisr Az Zarqa, the Yehuda Desert and Arad.

The success of our workshops is felt around Israel in areas where till now foreign tourism was... well - foreign. The successful entrepreneurs who made it keeps on developing the touristic product of their areas for travelers to come and experience, and thus inspire others to take this route as well.

 

 

Israel is a challenging environment, especially when it comes to tourism. No matter what you political view might be, the success of sharing interests in order to create a sustainable economy – no matter what the cultural background might be – is proving itself.

Perhaps, it is precisely that cultural diversity which contributes the most to the success of this endeavor in specific, and to Israel's appeal as a touristic destination in general.

This socio-business structure can be imitated anywhere else on earth: harnessing the economic power of tourism in order to yield social development. Just like travel is a universal value on its own, so can be its manifestation into a social tool.

 

 

WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN?

 

ALL PERKS given for a donation can be for your own plesure or as a gift for a friend, a family member or a lover visiting Israel.

 

We also invite you to donate perks for Lone Soldiers and "Birthright" / "Taglit" participants who stay to travel in Israel.

 

Check out the perks menu on the right [-->] for details


ILH offers you to enjoy the fruits of the Land of Milk & Honey! As a non profit organization, we collected all of our local supporters in order to give you a worthy value for your support, whether be it Products & Services for your own pleasure or Benefits & Donations for helping others in our community.

 

 

ACCOMMODATION

In return for backing our campaign ILH - Israel Hostels offers a wide range of accommodations in several of our high quality Hostels throughout the country: 
 

  • Private Rooms, Double Rooms, Dorm Beds and Full Weekends in a hostel!


 

  • Special Deals & Unique Accommodations! 

​

  • The hosting Guesthouses and Hostels include: 
    • Genghis Khan in the Golan (Givat Yoav)
    • Kurlender Guesthouse (She’ar Yashuv)
    • Kibbutz Inbar Country Lodging (Inbar)
    • Galilee Bedouin Camplodge (Hilf Tabash)
    • Fauzi Azar Inn (Nazareth)
    • Juha's Guesthouse (Jisr az Zaqra)
    • Gordon Inn (Tel Aviv)
    • BeachFront (Tel Aviv)
    • HaYarkon 48 (Tel Aviv)
    • Abraham Hostel TLV (Tel Aviv)
    • Abraham Hostel JER (Jerusalem)
    • Jerusalem Hostel (Jerusalem)
    • The Post (Jerusalem)
    • Dead Sea Adventure Hostel (Arad)

​* Check out our full list of Hostels throughout Israel.
 

TOURS & ACTIVITIES

Alongside our operations, we offer More than a bed to sleep in! For your pleasure - a wide range of hostel-operated and independent enterprises' tours across Israel, offering their high specialization services in the field of independent tourism:

 

  • ABRAHAM TOURS:
    Abraham Tours - as part of Abraham Hostels - operate tours across Israel, the West Bank, Jordan, and Egypt designed for the independent traveler seeking to experience the spirit and atmosphere of the region. 



 

  • WILD TRAILS:

    Are you a nature lover? Do you like wilderness and get “high” on nature? Are you afraid of being outdoors but want to learn how to befriend nature? Are you adventurous with love for extreme activities? Are you scared of being lost somewhere and lack survival skills? Do you love the wildness and you’re never bored of wandering around endless trails? If you checked positive with any of the above then WILD-TRAILS is the right place for you - for a life-time experience!

    Check out our perks on the rightside menu [-->] for the EXTREME SALT CAVING TOUR IN THE DEAD SEA

​

 

  • TLV NIGHTS:  
    With the highest standards in hospitality, we will make your experience in Tel Aviv one you won’t forget for a long time. Choose one of our products to discover what is all the fuss about. Join other travelers and locals on a crazy pub crawl or take a private night life tour with your own personal guide that will take you to the places most suitable for you.



 

  • BE PART OF THE HEART - TEL AVIV GRAFFITI TOUR: 

    Tel Aviv is becoming one of the most culturally rich cities in the Middle East. Join us on this magical tour through the side streets and alleys of the urban scenery. We will show you the best works of the street art and graffiti that color the walls of our public lives. We will go through the arts & crafts market, enjoy the lovely atmosphere and amazing street performances. The tour will cover the history, philosophy, styles and different meanings of the art constantly changing around us.
     


     

  • TLVEG TOUR:
    TLVEG TOURS is dedicated to show you the wide variety of vegan food in one of the top vegan cities in the world! Your guide have hand picked some of the best dishes in the best vegan restaurants in Tel Aviv, and gathered all the information you need to know about the vegan hot-spots. Whether you are already a vegan or not, get a taste of the best Tel Aviv have to offer! Come hungry - and you're guaranteed to leave satisfied and with a smile!


 

ISRAELI PRODUCTS

We also offer a wide range of high quality local Israeli products:
 

  • AHAVA - Elemental beauty from the​ Dead Sea:

    As the leading Israeli cosmetics company - AHAVA is the only beauty company located on the shores of the Dead Sea, founded in 1988 by members of 3 Kibbutzim. AHAVA’s factory and advanced in-house research and development are native to the Dead Sea region and merge within its natural scenery. AHAVA is known around the world for its award-winning formulas, multiple patents & technologies.




    As a renowned Israeli product AHAVA offers 2 kits - at affordable and discounted prices! Check out our perks on the right [-->] for details 

    SPA Kit:
    -     Caressing Body Sorbet 350ml
    - Liquid Dead Sea Salt 200ml
    - Softening Butter Salt Scrub (Salt) 220g
    - Luxury AHAVA Bag 

    Travel Kit For Men:
    -     Men Soothing After Shave Moisturizer 50ml
    - Men Exfoliating Cleansing Gel 15ml
    - Mineral Shower Gel Men 100ml
    - Men's Travel Bag

 

  • SOURCE - Israeli travel gear:
    "Source" (שורש) is Israel's leading travel gear company, producing high quality hiking equipment for the last 20 years.

Supporting our vision, we offer you their trio of must-have travel gear, designed and manufactured in Israel by SOURCE:

  1. Source Fuse 8L Hydration BACKPACK
  2. Source original HIKING SANDALS (Man & Woman)
  3. 2L HYDRATION BLADDER​

     

    • TUBI60:
      What better way to taste Israel - than by a locally made liqueur? "Tubi60" is an originally made Israeli drink, which tastes like nothing you've ever tried before. The authentic independent enterprise from the downtown of the port city of Haifa - is nowadays the rising star of Israel's nightlife. Locals and travelers alike, mainstream or off the beaten track - all find the experience of drinking Tubi60 to be exactly what alcohol is made to be - just... try it.

     

    CHARITY

    As an effort to make a social difference, we want you to become a part of our community - and offer you a channel for philanthropic donation of any of our perks to others who can be assisted:

    • LONE SOLDIERS:
      Whether Israeli-born or foreign – those serving in the IDF without the support of family and/or community. Our nights all across Israel can be given to any in need for a bed to sleep in, or any other activity for their plesure in their time off service.
       
    • GRADUATES OF HERITAGE TRIPS TO ISRAEL:
      All perks can be donated to participants of programs such as "Taglit" / "Birthright-Israel" and their and the like who remain in Israel for a while (be that several days, weeks or months) - for a safe way to travel and enjoy everything the land has to offer for independent travelers.


     

    • A SPONSORED WORKSHOP:
      Support an entrepreneur on his path for bringing his dream to life. 
      Sponsor his / her / their place in the next workshop, or even help us to create a designated workshop for specific crowd in Israel.
      Help creating a small business with social, cultural and economic difference to it's community. 

     

     

    HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP?


    We thank you for reading all the way through - whether you donate or not! There are other ways in which you to help us, and perhaps just as important - based on a common saying which goes like that:

    "Sharing Is Caring"


    So please - SHARE, SHARE, SHARE! Be it by e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube or any other social network - your caring counts! Send to some friends, show you co-workers while you've got some spare time at the office, help your mom see it on her screen... 


    WHO, again?


    Thanks to the wonderful Hostels on our campaign videos & photos!

    VIDEOS:

    • Tiberias Hostel

    • Galilee Bedouin Camplodge

    • Fauzi Azar Inn

    • Green Backpackers

    • Simsim Guesthouse

    • Abraham Hostels & Tours

    • Juha's Guesthouse

     

    ​* Thanks to the Israeli Ministry of Tourism for allowing usage of video clips within the film. 

    ​* Special thank to the Friedman Brothers for the campaign video - filming, editing & producing.


    PHOTOS:

    • Golan Heights Hostel
    • Abraham Hostels & Tours
    • HaYarkon 48 Hostel
    • Fauzi Azar
    • Beach Front Hostel
    • Galilee Bedouin Camplodge
    • Genghis Khan in the Golan
    • Dead Sea Adventure Hostel
    • The Post Hostel

story:
