story:
Short Summary

About me (Alisa C.)

 

I have worked as a USPS postal carrier some years.I have also successfully earned my CDL licenses.I had to resign from my job as a CDL tractor trailer driver due to the pandemic. Mother of two children. I also have 10 years of experience of taking care children for working families. I am passionate about helping families with their children so that they can work.

About my company

Our goal at Non-profit LisaFaye’s Agency is to offer employ nannies and tutors so that parents do not have to pay a company to look for one.  Our company will run thorough background checks, fingerprints, etc.  We want to offer our services to all families who are essential workers and families who are not.  I feel that no person should have to be put in a situation of choosing between their job or their child.  This is why so many people are at home now due to the pandemic.  We want to offer our services to companies to offer to their workers, but the workers pay for it. Our company will also provide surveillance for each person who signs up for our services.  We want to ensure the safety of the child(ren), the parents, and our workers.  This will protect everyone, but mostly the child(ren). We will also offer monthly plans to parents so no more paying by the hour we will have packages so that we can meet their needs.  We will also offer tutoring in-person or virtual.  The tutor services will be an added-on service for families who need it.  Or they can purchase a bundle deal with tutors in the package deal.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need a total of $350,000. All funding raised will go towards all cost to hiring people at least 5-10 people, the funding will also go towards purchasing more surveillance so that each client can have them and pay someone to install them.  This funding will be used for more marketing and a better website.  It would also help us fund a better location for our office and make sure that we have it up to state and federally regulated. Once we get the things, we need I would be glad to show proof of where the money went.

 

  • The perks of helping fund our non-profit is that you are helping us help families with the best childcare for families.  You are going to helping children stay safe while their families are at work.  So many children get abused and if we have a chance to do something about it why not.  I believe anytime you do something good for children you get blessed on top of blessings.  You will also help the economy, by funding our company because we will not only be supplying jobs to nannies and tutors but also providing affordable childcare to families so that they can work.  We will also help companies offer our services to their workers so their workers can work at their best and not have to miss or quit their jobs due to them not having someone they can trust to care for their child.

 

  • If we do not reach our entire goal all funding raised will still be put towards the company.  

 

The Impact

  • My company will help to add more jobs. My company will provide safe and affordable childcare so parents can work.  We will also be helping companies offer our services to their employees so that these companies can stay in business because with more people working that means more spending in the economy

Risks & Challenges

  • What qualifies me for this company is the fact that I was one of those workers who had to make a choice between my job or my children.  The caretakers for my kids, while I was away on the road driving trucks, got sick due to the pandemic and are considered high risk.  This broke my heart because I loved my job, but I love my children more.
  • Anytime a person is dealing with a child(ren) they are taking a risk, but the reward is greater than the risk.   That is why I will provide surveillance with video/audio.  We will also provide contracts for our workers and parents.  The workers will also have emergency pendants to wear so in case if something does happen they can press it and it would alert the authorities to come and know where to go without them having to make a phone call. I will also have someone monitoring surveillance.  The parents will also be able to monitor, too.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out to help fund our company. Even if you just share it that is helpful. 
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! To get the word out about my non-profit.

Anytime a person is dealing with a child(ren) they are taking a risk, but the reward is greater than the risk.   That is why I will provide surveillance with video/audio.  We will also provide contracts for our workers and parents.  The workers will also have emergency pendants to wear so in case if something does happen they can press it and it would alert the authorities to come and know where to go without them having to make a phone call. I will also have someone monitoring surveillance.  The parents will also be able to monitor, too.


Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out to help fund our company. Even if you just share it that is helpful. 
Please use the Indiegogo share tools! To get the word out about my non-profit.

story:
NEA Charitable Fundraising Services has been raising money for major charities for 27 years.  We are opening a new 501(c)3 to raise money for our fundraising efforts.

We need to raise $450,000 to fund the expansion of our fundraising services. All contributions will be tax deductible.  We can accept IRA distributions and like kind contributions. In addition each contributor will receive a receipt for a tax deductible donation equal to 3% of their contribution, every year for the rest of their lives.  Over time, your IRS deductions will slowly return your generous contributions.

These funds will expand the services for NEA Charitable Fundraising Services.  NEA recruits and trains independent contractors to work with social groups like Parent Teachers Associations (PTA), the Boy & Girl Scouts, Sports Teams and even Large Corporations.

This strategy has allowed NEA Charities to raise funds for major charities at a cost of 14%.  According to the National Fundraising Foundation, Social Fundraising costs average 27%.  NEA helps get more money directly to the charity.

The major risk for our company and its contributors is that the federal government changes its tax code as it relates to non-profits. 

Our challenge and NEA's calling is to train and recruit individuals to take up a career in professional fundraising.

NEA provides the fundraising tools and audits all fundraisers to make sure the funds go to the charities they should.

If you can not contribute I hope you will share this fundraiser with your friends and family.  Your participation may help thousands of people.

story:
Simply put - we think we have come up with an excellent t-shirt design. 

We have chosen the glitziest and most over-the-top character out of the host of such Americans competing for the Republican nomination - in an election that promises to be, even in its early stages, the most entertaining race in recent memory. We have selected a moment that captures his inimitable political and rhetorical style. We have hand-crafted a design that captures the irreverence and hilarity of all of this - and we have created this masterpiece. 

We neither created this shirt for the bastions of liberalism and political correctness that exist in the world today, nor is this shirt in support of any of the current candidates who have become an increasingly poor and misleading representation of this country. 

This shirt is for the free spirits, the conscious critics, the independent thinkers. This shirt is for you. 

Join us.

We need $1,000 to produce our first run of shirts.
With luck, there will be more.

For $20 you get your very own "Trump CHINA T".

story:
Black Belt Investments is a newbie-friendly investment research tool. Its main goal is obvious: to help you to start your investing with good understanding what you are doing and without reading a huge pile of books. The secondary goal is less noticeable, but not less important: to help you to gain all the knowledge needed down the road. And, opposed to many other resources about investments you can think of, educational part of Black Belt Investments is practice-centric and allows you to stick to the bare minimum of theory needed in practice.
The project is 80% ready and the development heads into the homestretch.

Why?

Let's imagine a situation: you came to school and you want to learn maths. You pay tuition fees and you are offered different courses: algebra, geometry, integral calculus etc. But all of these is too advanced for you. You ask: "Guys, do you have something simpler, like arithmetic for newbies?" But they say no. And you have choice: either to learn arithmetic yourself and then proceed with more advanced stuff or to dump the idea of learning maths. Ridiculous?

But when you want to learn about investing, you face pretty much same problem! Look at investment research tools: they are built by professionals for professionals. And they are either extremely newbie-unfriendly or you will have to blindly trust some artificial gauges created by some experts (and they will never tell you how!).

And Black Belt Investments is going to solve this problem.

How?

You will get a simple, newbie-friendly investment research tool which will allow you to start investing right away, without reading a pile of books. And if you would like to learn (which is very natural, since you invest money earned in your sweat, blood and hard work!), Black Belt Investments will help you to learn with ease with emphasis on most important practical aspects.

What?

Now let's delve into more details. At the figure below you can see the main use case scenario: a user wants to know about some publicly traded company X, and he/she finds out how it is good or bad fundamentally (and, of course, the user can verify if the system's results are correct!). After that he/she can assess if it is cheap enough to buy (or, alternatively, to define the threshold when to buy).

Main Usage Scenario - Unhappy Case
Within 5 minutes you will be able to examine all of these and other aspects: dividends reliability, business's financial statements, most important ratios, performance, capital structure etc.
Main Usage Scenario - Happier Case
This, combined with a simple and powerful screener (where you will literally ask the system to show you good enough companies with a possibility to add some more specific confinements on the search), will become the main usage scenario. In our happy path shown at the animation above we have omitted some important steps, like scrutinizing the state of things in the appropriate sector and industry, prospectus, risks involved etc. But, of course, you will be able to use other modules of the system, like settings, education, user profile etc.

Other Screenshots

What You Get

For a contribution of $1+ you will immediately get a thousand thanks from us and a feeling that you have just done the right thing! Other perks are described in the table below:

Contribution Membership Bumper Sticker Handwritten Postcard T - Shirt 1 Hour on Skype A Day With Alex1
$1+ - - - - - -
$12+ Green Belt - - - - -
$25+ Black Belt - - - - -
$50+ Black Belt - - - -
$100+
Limit of 1,000 		Black Belt - - -
$250+
Limit of 100 		Black Belt - -
$1,000+
Limit of 10 		Black Belt - -

[1] Must be able to come to Toronto, ON and must agree on a date before arriving.


What if we don't reach our funding goal?

The project is going to be delivered anyway, even if we don't reach the entire goal.

Our Team


Why do we care?

We do care because:

  •  we started building this system for us and for our friends;
  •  it is our passion to share this knowledge with more people;
  • we evolved a lot down the road as investors;
  • Alex is an entrepreneur striving to prove that he is able to build a viable business for the second time in his life;
  • we already invested a year of our lives into this project, and the project is now 80% ready.

Budget

The project is 80% done and the budget of $3,500 needed to complete it and launch. 

Cost Breakdown Structure

As you can see from the figure above, the lion share of this sum (approximately 70% of it) is going to cover the data providers' fees. The remainder is Indiegogo and credit card processing fees and the cost of perks plus minor miscellaneous expenses.

Risks & Challenges

Some minor risks/issues possible while integrating the website with external data sources and billing services providers (the latter should not affect the contributors from Indiegogo). Such impact I would assess as low: it maximum can slightly extend the timespan before delivery.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you very much for sparing your time to us and to this project. The last, but not the least: if you believe what we believe, please tell other people about this project. Even if Black Belt Investments is not a right fit for you, probably, you may know someone who will be interested. Please, help us to meet each other.

Cheers! And may Indiegogo share tools and word of mouth be with you!

story:
Where is Mardin?

Mardin is a city in southeastern from Turkey. The capital of Mardin, province, it is known for the Artuqid (Artıklı or Artuklu in Turkish) architecture of its old city, and for its strategic location on a rocky hill near the Tigris River that rises steeply over the flat plains.

Where is Sehit Öğretmen Fasih Söğüt School? About school..

The school  is in Ömerli from Mardin. The school has 7 classrooms, 5 primary classrooms, 2 pre-classrooms. The poor and neglected the education given at school very difficult. Writing materials, heating, cleaning products needed to help schools that are missing.

Firstly, I spoke with the teacher Mrs. Zengin. She said "16 kindergarten student need to help".

The most immediate way they need stationery, heater, cleaning equipments, 16 pieces of children's jackets and winter shoes.. 

If the limit is exceeded it will be given the same support as other classes.

Some photos from Sehit Öğretmen Fasih Söğüt Schools;

Pre-School Classroom Students Name List;

- Ayhan Nur Kaymaz

- Berçem Erdem

- Eda Demirkıran

- Gülnaz Özgün

- Muhammed Eser

- Nesrin Gültekin

- Nurhan Demirkıran

- Ramazan Erdem

- Yakup Özdemir

- Yasin Bulut

- Yusuf Eser

- Yusuf Koç

- Yusuf Özgün

- Zeynep Öncü

- Nehir Erdem

- Ahmet Özüm ( Ahmet is a new student.)

Official Student List Photo

Please do not be quiet..

We can not offer anything other than to thank.

 

Everyone has the right to study in good conditions.

Thanks for donation or sharing.

story:
Viaje asks a simple question: What would happen if we left a piano unattended on a public space?

 

 

Why a piano?

Because it is considered one of the most elitist instruments. In today's world, especially in third world countries, finding a real piano can prove to be an extremely strenuous task. Due to their high prices, and bulky sizes, pianos can mostly only be found in luxurious places like hotels or theaters. And, even when one comes across one, its enormous and intimidating size along with its complex look will scare most people away. It is almost as if all pianos had this imaginary "Do Not Touch" sign on top of them at all times. We want to challenge this. We want to get rid of the notion that there is such a thing as something unreachable or exclusive. We want everyone to be given the same opportunities and chances. 

 

Viaje in Sololá

Earlier this year we had the opportunity to share our dream for the first time. We took a piano which we received as a donation, had a a professional artist give it a friendlier makeover, and set out on our first adventure.

We chose Sololá as our first destination because it is one of Guatemala's most culturally diverse regions. We were intrigued to see the reaction of the people, most of which we were sure had never gotten the chance to see or play a piano during their lives. The doubt existed in in all of our team members' hearts. Most people born and raised in Guatemala have this preconceived belief that it is impossible to leave something valuable on the street, and not having it vandalized or stolen. It is this exact form of prejudice which has created the gap between the population of Guatemala.

 

     

 

But we were extremely surprised when we saw the first individuals approaching the piano. Out of nowhere, and completely spontaneously, the whole area surrounding the piano got filled with people from all over town, who came to listen and play with the piano. Everyone, from small children, to town leaders, came near the site to experiment with the instrument. Our goal was met, and the message was heard loud and clear: If the piano is there, we are allowed to play it.

 

     

 

This is exactly what Viaje is looking to do. To provide the communities with safe social spaces where the prejudice and fear get thrown away, and people who have never been given a chance can come together to share and enjoy with others.

 

 

 

Goals Of Viaje 

      We have divided the project into 2 different phases

Phase 1 will bring the piano to the main town of each of the 22 departments (or regions) of Guatemala.  The piano will be placed on a public space during three days and three nights for anyone to come close and experience it. To be able to do this, we are looking for the support of individuals and companies, both locally and internationally. 

 

Phase 2 will be even more ambitious and impactful. We want to be able to provide a select group of people from each of the different departments in Guatemala with our vision and resources, so that they can be the ones that carry our movement to each of the 340 municipalities in the country. This is a movement made by souls for other souls. We want to spread the message of faith, love, happiness and hope to every single person regardless of their  race, social  or economic status.

 

 

 

Denise Menes

Denise is a renowned Guatemalan pianist and teacher. She studied at an early age in New York at the Juilliard School of Music, and later on moved back to Guatemala were she became one of the most respected musicians in the country. It is Denise's dream and vision to turn Viaje into her legacy.

     "I had the chance to study in one of the most prestigious musical universities in the world, Julliard. Being there, I would always feel frustrated whenever I saw my guitarist, violinist, saxophonist, or else classmates carrying their instruments everywhere they would go, while I was bound to play in theaters or concert halls. I always dreamed of a traveling piano.

About a year ago, I decided to turn my dream into a reality."

 

 

Edy Béhar

       “After twenty one years working in marketing, doing campaigns and commercials for brands like Coca-Cola, KFC, Sprite, YPFB, among many others, I realized that I was tired of creating models to provide a false sense of happiness. I decided to start this trip to generate and document real emotions.

Real emotions that will generate real changes.”

 

Viaje has already started and is on its way to its second location. Every new step the project takes will be fully documented and backed by media.  We invite you to follow us on our Facebook page for any immediate updates on the status of our project. 

 On behalf of all the team at Viaje,

thank you for your support.
story_txt:
Viaje asks a simple question: What would happen if we left a piano unattended on a public space?
 

 
Why a piano?
Because it is considered one of the most elitist instruments. In today's world, especially in third world countries, finding a real piano can prove to be an extremely strenuous task. Due to their high prices, and bulky sizes, pianos can mostly only be found in luxurious places like hotels or theaters. And, even when one comes across one, its enormous and intimidating size along with its complex look will scare most people away. It is almost as if all pianos had this imaginary "Do Not Touch" sign on top of them at all times. We want to challenge this. We want to get rid of the notion that there is such a thing as something unreachable or exclusive. We want everyone to be given the same opportunities and chances. 

 
Viaje in Sololá
Earlier this year we had the opportunity to share our dream for the first time. We took a piano which we received as a donation, had a a professional artist give it a friendlier makeover, and set out on our first adventure.
We chose Sololá as our first destination because it is one of Guatemala's most culturally diverse regions. We were intrigued to see the reaction of the people, most of which we were sure had never gotten the chance to see or play a piano during their lives. The doubt existed in in all of our team members' hearts. Most people born and raised in Guatemala have this preconceived belief that it is impossible to leave something valuable on the street, and not having it vandalized or stolen. It is this exact form of prejudice which has created the gap between the population of Guatemala.
 
     
 
But we were extremely surprised when we saw the first individuals approaching the piano. Out of nowhere, and completely spontaneously, the whole area surrounding the piano got filled with people from all over town, who came to listen and play with the piano. Everyone, from small children, to town leaders, came near the site to experiment with the instrument. Our goal was met, and the message was heard loud and clear: If the piano is there, we are allowed to play it.
 
     
 
This is exactly what Viaje is looking to do. To provide the communities with safe social spaces where the prejudice and fear get thrown away, and people who have never been given a chance can come together to share and enjoy with others.
 
 
 
Goals Of Viaje 
      We have divided the project into 2 different phases
Phase 1 will bring the piano to the main town of each of the 22 departments (or regions) of Guatemala.  The piano will be placed on a public space during three days and three nights for anyone to come close and experience it. To be able to do this, we are looking for the support of individuals and companies, both locally and internationally. 
 
Phase 2 will be even more ambitious and impactful. We want to be able to provide a select group of people from each of the different departments in Guatemala with our vision and resources, so that they can be the ones that carry our movement to each of the 340 municipalities in the country. This is a movement made by souls for other souls. We want to spread the message of faith, love, happiness and hope to every single person regardless of their  race, social  or economic status.
 
 
 

Denise Menes

Denise is a renowned Guatemalan pianist and teacher. She studied at an early age in New York at the Juilliard School of Music, and later on moved back to Guatemala were she became one of the most respected musicians in the country. It is Denise's dream and vision to turn Viaje into her legacy.
     "I had the chance to study in one of the most prestigious musical universities in the world, Julliard. Being there, I would always feel frustrated whenever I saw my guitarist, violinist, saxophonist, or else classmates carrying their instruments everywhere they would go, while I was bound to play in theaters or concert halls. I always dreamed of a traveling piano.
About a year ago, I decided to turn my dream into a reality."
 
 

Edy Béhar
       “After twenty one years working in marketing, doing campaigns and commercials for brands like Coca-Cola, KFC, Sprite, YPFB, among many others, I realized that I was tired of creating models to provide a false sense of happiness. I decided to start this trip to generate and document real emotions.
Real emotions that will generate real changes.”
 
Viaje has already started and is on its way to its second location. Every new step the project takes will be fully documented and backed by media.  We invite you to follow us on our Facebook page for any immediate updates on the status of our project. 


 On behalf of all the team at Viaje,
thank you for your support.

story:
I want to dedicate one year to sailing Americas Great Loop and Record pertinent information to help future sailors and promote Americas Great Waterways.

 

Expenses will range from Recording Equipment and Computer to Marina Costs, Fuel, Provisioning the Boat, Food and any unforeseeable expenses for 1 year.

 

I will be taking an unpaid leave of absence to accomplish this goal, But I feel confident it will be well worth it.

 

PLEASE CONTRIBUTE/DONATE IN ANY AMOUNT AND ANY FASHION YOU CAN. AND PLEASE SHARE MY STORY WITH EVERYONE YOU CAN.   THANK YOU

story:
Short Summary

With many a distinction in school, and a degree in hand, I set out to work as a Management Consultant, first at the IT giant Accenture, then on to Ernst & Young Advisory, and ended with the highly impactful McKinsey & Company. I have a pretty attractive LinkedIn profile. All this, and yet it took me a long time to know how to actually work, and get a product that I could be proud of.

I am Verushka! My roles have been diverse, but always focused on one thing: The improvement of people and processes. Which is why I created Highered, a division of my company that is focused on the people, and quickening the time that it will take them to know what to do in order to get their product and succeed.

Through my coaching I have noted that the ability of people to translate what they have studied into what is needed in the work space is missing. Through over a decade of assessment of what is stopping graduates and early tenure employees from being top achievers, I worked out a practical based programme to boost their potential:

  1. Get them to know what problem to solve
  2. Help them break down the problem and plan for its solution
  3. Teach them how to build relationships that will further their solution being realised
Read more about the offerings here.
With those individuals that I have worked with, they are finding it easier to get jobs that they want, and are succeeding at it. They are making a difference in society.
Problem is, students are the current market that I am focusing on, and they live on a shoe string budget. While I have come to the party with a significantly discounted rate for students, even R300 per person (~$21) for one of the 3 hour workshops is too costly. Which is why I need your support to make this a reality for the students in South Africa.
Your support will help a student in South Africa boost their ability to get a job in a country where jobs are limited. Every individual in South Africa who has a job can help support a much larger family. You will therefore be helping far more than just the student that you sponsor.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get 320 unique students through the 3 workshop programme over a 4 month period, I require your assistance with funding of these workshops. The cost per student for the full package is $80, and will cover transport, learning materials, delivery location, staff costs incurred and the IndieGogo fee.

This is a social action, and therefore the perks will largely be in kind such as a mention on our website www.highered.co.za for your contribution, feedback on the progress of the student that you sponsor and their successes from the workshops.

Coach Verushka going through the practical feedback with a candidate
For sponsoring a full class of 20 people, on top of the above perks per student, we will put your details on the back of each pack as the key sponsor of that class. 
All funds earned will go towards delivery. Even if we do not make our full target, we will endeavour to deliver as much as possible with the funds that we do receive. We will only setup the workshops once the funding is received.
The Impact

I have seen the impact of what I have already delivered. The eyes of the people I have coached shines bright. It is for this, and the impact that they make post the workshops, that I want to ensure students have access to this programme.

Candidates with their dictionaries and demo kits and getting essays done

To further ensure impact, I have initiated the Student Ambassador programme. Through this I work with ~5 students a year who I will personally coach and develop, and considerably impact their career success. The role of each ambassador will be to:

  • Source students for the programme who are serious about their careers
  • Mentor and coach these students (under my guidance)
Through my coaching, over 50 people have already been employed, and some have even received considerable raises. Others have seen a general improvement in their work and home lives. Your support will have an impact on 320 more individuals.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk I will face is in finding the right people to coach and ensure the continuity of their success. The Student Ambassador programme reduces this risk.

The ambassador will interview each candidate prior to enrolling them on to the programme. They will check the aspirations, and what the student will do with this knowledge.

The ambassador is also responsible for maintaining a mentor and coach role with these candidates through their own unique (and private) forum. Here the students can share their successes and what they did to achieve it; they can ask questions for guidance; and the ambassadors can interact with me to get feedback on how they can best solve these problems. Which means impact does not stop in the classroom.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of people that are passionate about education and building up the potential of people, please do forward on this campaign to them. The more you share using the IndieGogo tools, the more people will get to know about it.

If you would like to get in contact with me to help people on a bigger scale, or if you would like to have this coaching brought to your country for a week and would like to sponsor it (or have sponsors) contact me on verushka@connect4purpose.com.

story:
Short Summary

I’m raising money to go on an educational trip with Midtown International School to Japan for a fresh new cultural experience. This will be my first international trip without a parent. While I’m doing all I can to raise money for this trip, I just can’t do it without you.
 

What We Need & What You Get

To start with, I’ve wanted to go to Japan since I was 10 years old and hope to live there one day. In preparation, over the last 2 years I even started teaching myself Japanese using foreign language apps on my cell phone. My interest started out for superficial reasons like my admiration for anime and vocaloid. However, as I learned more about Japanese history and culture, my fascination for the island grew, and I need 50,000 USD to achieve my goals.

The Impact

did you know Japan was until recently (relatively speaking) completely isolated from the world by a government policy called Sakoku (country in chains)? Sakoku didn’t let anyone leave or enter Japan under penalty of death.  When the country opened to the world an interesting culture was revealed.
There are a few things that are unique to Japan that I hope to experience should I receive the required donations:50,000 USD

Risks & Challenges

Delicious rice cakes called Mochi, that are mostly eaten on the Japanese New Year but are available year-round.
Shintoism are three different sets of characters used in writing.                       
Ikebana (the art of arranging flowers inspired by Shintoism)               
Waka (a form of poetry)                                                                         
Nanga (painting with less color)

Other Ways You Can Help

Hopefully, while I’m there I can learn some art tips and get a better grasp on drawing human and animal anatomy.
Language immersion, including slang, so I can have regular conversations with my Japanese peers.
To show my appreciation, I will send each person who donates a piece of my original artwork. I assume you know that art is my passion and I want to share a little bit of me with all of you.

Thank you again for your support.

story:
Short Summary

In the years before becoming an owner of Hope Academy I have had a long career in the field of early childhood education.  My roots in the field of education and working with young children go back more than two decades.  I have been a teacher, early intervention teacher, behavior therapist, school director, small business owner and regional for major childcare companies.  I have had the opportunity to work in schools of different sizes and with many different services and curriculum.  I am excited to be building Hope Academy to meet the needs of children and parents on the South Shore of Long Island.  Hope Academy will be a small Montessori-inspired preschool and daycare.  We will offer access to technology and quality education in a small setting at affordable rates. Hope Academy will offer a safe and clean environment with professional cleaning services onsite at all times.  I am excited to offer "HOPE" for children's future through quality education in a safe and clean environment.  

What We Need & What You Get

To reach our goal and open Hope Academy before the end of 2021 we are asking for funding and community support. The three main areas we are raising funds for are: 

  • Playground build out 
  • Interior set up and build out 
  • Curriculum materials

In order to achieve our vision of an exciting and educational outside environment we are asking for funding support.  Our fully built and equipped outside learning environment is going to require about $30,000 to achieve.  We are aiming to have three separate spaces outside.  The infant and toddler play area, a preschool and pre-K play area and our outside learning and picnic area.  With these spaces we can provide more outside time in the clean fresh air.  Those who contribute $50  dollars or more to the outdoor build out will have their name or business name displayed on our fence or playground space. We want this playground to reflect community support.  

Our interior space is being built out as an open concept preschool/pre k space with three self-contained toddler and infant classrooms.  Inspiration for Hope's interior design is being taken from the beautiful mural on the outside of our building. This mural depicts an idyllic Long Island beach town and was painted by local high school students back in 1996.  Hope Academy will have a light nature inspired interior with hard-wood floors and light sandy beach colors.  Those who contribute funds to the interior renovations will receive their name or business name on a new mural/display in the school.  (We plan to work with local students to have them paint a new mural inside for us.)  

Help a Child Go To School: If you would like your contribution to impact a local family your donation of $100 dollars or more can be designated for the registration fee for a future Hope Student. You would be giving the gift of education to a child who may not otherwise have access to a comprehensive preschool/pre-K education. Hope Academy will have about 50 students from ages 6 weeks to 6 years old. 

Parents & grandparents who contribute can have their child's registration fee waived for the first year of school .  

The Impact

Quality education has a life-long impact in a community.  By working with Hope Academy to help us achieve our goal of a bright new school in West Babylon NY you will truly be part of bringing "Hope" for the future of this community.

With what the world has experienced over the last year with the Covid19 pandemic families are concerned about traveling far from home for their children's preschool and daycare needs.  Offering a small, clean and local place for families to bring their children is needed in this community .  

Risks & Challenges

Opening a school and daycare is always a challenging process.  However, as veterans in the field of Early Childhood Education Hope Academy leadership has done this before.  Owner Sonia Montigny is experienced in state OCFS regulations and school and daycare management and is ready to take the challenge on.  Many exciting schools and daycares have faced challenges with Covid19.  Hope Academy will be built to address the concerns of parents with regard to Covid19 and will also have a state of art curriculum that will allow parent and student access to the school even when health needs and concerns require students to be out of school.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are unable to contribute financially and we understand that.  Hope Academy asks that if you are unable to donate with a financial contribution that you help us spread the word.  Hope Academy coming 2021/22!  Share our Indiegogo link, check our page often for our fundraising events and enrichment activities.  We will be having community fairs, family picnic days and drop-in learning classes as we work towards our goal.  Spread the word! Cheer us on!

story:
Hello!

First off, thank you tons for stopping by and taking the time to check out my Indiegogo page for this project!

This fundraiser is for a packer program I would like to start!

So I've sat on this a awhile trying to figure out the best, most efficient way to go about this and I've decided to start the program off through opening this Indiegogo campaign in support of the project. 

There are several reasons for this, 

1. So people who donate can keep up to date and see what is happening in real time as far as money raised goes, 

2. To showcase my mission statement/what I am doing and why, 

3. It will allow folks, trans or not, to donate towards the program even if they can't afford the whole cost of a packer + shipping ($25 per packer/guy). 

I want to give 30 guys a packer completely free to them, so 30 packers plus shipping. 

I've decided to give Doc Johnson Lite packers because each of them are under $15, they come in white/caramel/black skin tones, and are a little more durable than the Mr. Limpy's plus the vendor I'll be getting them from offer free shipping if the total is over $35, so I'll have them shipped to my house and then ship them out individually as parcels to minimize shipping costs.

I think that, like binders, it is imperative to make packers available to transmen who are otherwise unable to have one. Dysphoria is a horrible nightmare to deal with and for some transmen in the community bottom dysphoria is just as bad as chest dysphoria. 

One of the goals behind this program, besides providing free packers to 30 transmen in need, is to begin a cycle of paying it forward. Each of these men that receive one of these packers will later be in the position to help out another guy in need, thus paying it forward.

Another thing that I would like to showcase is that if someone is able to put out the courage to ask for help (it takes a lot of courage to ask for help, am I right?) then there will always be someone there willing to help them.

If you are at all able to donate towards this program, it would be very much appreciated by myself, my partner, and the 30+ guys that will benefit from the efforts of this program and all of its supporters.

Please feel free to watch the video on this page, write to me with any questions or concerns (contact information will be down below), and if you are unable to donate then share the heck out of this so we can get these packers out to those men who need them!

Thank you so much in advance!

Peace, love, and post vibes,
Rafael Cermeño (Rafael is my preferred name, though it may show as Skylar for legal purposes on this page)

imsorrycameron.tumblr.com
@imsorrycameron (instagram)

So people who donate can keep up to date and see what is happening in real time as far as money raised goes, 2. To showcase my mission statement/what I am doing and why, 3. It will allow folks, trans or not, to donate towards the program even if they can't afford the whole cost of a packer + shipping ($25 per packer/guy). I want to give 30 guys a packer completely free to them, so 30 packers plus shipping. I've decided to give Doc Johnson Lite packers because each of them are under $15, they come in white/caramel/black skin tones, and are a little more durable than the Mr. Limpy's plus the vendor I'll be getting them from offer free shipping if the total is over $35, so I'll have them shipped to my house and then ship them out individually as parcels to minimize shipping costs.I think that, like binders, it is imperative to make packers available to transmen who are otherwise unable to have one. Dysphoria is a horrible nightmare to deal with and for some transmen in the community bottom dysphoria is just as bad as chest dysphoria. One of the goals behind this program, besides providing free packers to 30 transmen in need, is to begin a cycle of paying it forward. Each of these men that receive one of these packers will later be in the position to help out another guy in need, thus paying it forward.Another thing that I would like to showcase is that if someone is able to put out the courage to ask for help (it takes a lot of courage to ask for help, am I right?) then there will always be someone there willing to help them.If you are at all able to donate towards this program, it would be very much appreciated by myself, my partner, and the 30+ guys that will benefit from the efforts of this program and all of its supporters.Please feel free to watch the video on this page, write to me with any questions or concerns (contact information will be down below), and if you are unable to donate then share the heck out of this so we can get these packers out to those men who need them!Thank you so much in advance!Peace, love, and post vibes,Rafael Cermeño (Rafael is my preferred name, though it may show as Skylar for legal purposes on this page)imsorrycameron.tumblr.com@imsorrycameron (instagram)

story:
Our immune system is essential for life!

  • I am Juan Aldave, a Clinical Immunologist, that is, a physician who helps people affected by disorders of the immune system such as allergies, immunodeficiencies and autoimmunity. Immunology is a fundamental science to understand and alleviate diseases in our modern world. Scientific advances in Immunology cure people worldwide every day.
  • Our immune system is fantastic! It permanently protects us against microbes and cancer. Without immune system we would not be able to survive!

Learning Immunology is usually hard

  • As an Immunology professor, two years ago I realized that classic Immunology educational resources are hard to understand for non-expert people. Even worse, if teaching lacks clinical application, most students quickly forget what they learn. The final result is a physician with insufficient knowledge about Immunology.
  • So, we started the project "Funny Immunology", with the aim of producing high-quality, easy-to-understand, funny educational material to teach everyone about the importance of our immune system in health and disease.

Making Immunology easier!

  • The first step of our "Funny Immunology" project was to publish educational books about the immune system written in a simple language style and full of pictures. So far, with the support of Jeffrey Modell Foundation, we have published eleven books of the collection "Funny Immunology to Save Lives". You can download them without cost at the following webpages:
    • http://www.savingagammaglobulinemiapatients.org...
    • http://www.info4pi.org/library/educational-mate...
  • Due to the success of our books, our next idea was to fabricate toys representing immune cells: the amusing Immunocytes! These wonderful toys motivate Immunology learning, not only for physicians and medical students, but also for children who love playing with them. Below you can see Moli, the B lymphocyte, our antibody-producing cell (you can view more characters in the 'Gallery' section).

Now we need your support!

  • Now we have a new idea in mind! We want to publish an innovative book: "The magic Interleukins: essential proteins for life".
  • Interleukins are essential proteins for communication between immune cells. We have more than 38 different interleukins, all with several functions. For example, interleukin 17 is necessary to protect our body against infections by the fungus Candida albicans. Knowledge about interleukins has allowed scientists to develop targeted therapies for patients with immune diseases such as immunodeficiencies, allergies, autoimmunity and cancer.
  • Every physician and medical student should learn about interleukins. However, due to the large number of distinct interleukins and their complex functions, it is one of the hardest topic in Immunology. Help us publish a funny, enjoyable book about them!

Characteristics of our book

  • Simple language style, easy to understand, full of clinical applications.
  • 80 pages
  • 38 chapters, one for each interleukin.
  • Full color.
  • Hard cover
  • Size: 148 x 210 mm.
  • 114 pictures, please see an example below (you can view more pictures in the 'Gallery' section).

story:
Hello, my name is Nick and I have a story for you. I received a grant to get the Microsoft HoloLens from my college and thus began this journey. Mixed Reality was never possible until now, I mean truly bringing the computer into the real world.  In my whole education career I have always found technology helpful but in the way still. With HoloLens my previous statement becomes untrue.   It is too bad for me as I already graduated college but its not too late for the current High School students of New York. 

We saw the lack of resource and cutting edge tools inside the education system of New York and we began to figure out a solution. After many hours of research and development - we came to the realization that the Microsoft HoloLens was amongst the many tools we feel that will completely disrupt the entire education system. After a full beta with 2 schools we knew this was the answer, but how do we do such an impossible task? I'll tell you how - with your help!

There will be many risks and challenges that I will face. Creating a curriculum is a tough job - just ask any educator. Tools, resources, examination and all the planning is on the teacher. We have to  create a WHOLE NEW curriculum.

If you can't contribute, you can still help! Get the word out to your school, share my mission to others on Indiegogo and other sites, follow me on Facebook and Instagram /subscribe on Youtube, or simply just share any thoughts you might have to help me achieve my mission.

story:
PiShell: A unique 3-in-1 case for Raspberry Pi and Camera

The story for the development for the case goes back to January 2018 where we were browsing for various cases for the Raspberry Pi. We went through many open and closed cases and even camera cases and felt something was lacking. The closed case didn’t give any access to GPIO pins or camera mounting. Open cases have no protection for camera and camera cases again denied us access. So, we thought, why not incorporate all of the good features of all these cases to make a unique and remarkable case. And we did! Now, we need your help.

What is PiShell?

  • PiShell is a unique case made out of three parts; The base-bumper, body-cover, camera-cover.
  • The material is made out of ABS plastic with dual-shot injection molding.
  • When fully assembled, PiShell gives full protection from the elements as well as give an attractive look to your Raspberry Pi setup.
  • Easily access the GPIO pins by sliding the top cover, mount the camera in the designated slot and close the top cover again, securing the setup.
  • It also has 3 vents that double as the heatsink so you don’t have to worry when you’re overclocking your unit. PiShell got you covered.

How to assemble PiShell?

Why do you need PiShell?

PiShell is here to turn gazes! With a wide variety of color combination available, there’s a PiShell for everyone. You can even mix and match different colors to make a unique case for yourself! Just open up the cover with easy to use plug and play and assemble it back with different colored parts. Its as easy as 1 2 3! The money raised from here will be used in material and mass production cost. We’ve been making cases before so you can rest easy knowing that there won’t be any delay or disappointment when you get your perk-reward. So back us now and help us turn it into a reality!

How compatible is PiShell with Raspberry Pi models?

PiShell is designed in such a way that it incorporates every Raspberry Pi model and allow the user to use the device without any worries. The icing on the top is the shielded camera case which again makes it stand out from the crowd.

Rewards

 

 

 

 

 

 

The way it goes..!

Thank you..!

Thanks a ton for reading the campaign. Your interest in our product is highly appreciated. This gives us the energy to grow better with our every product and campaign.

Risks and challenges

Although being the largest manufacturer and seller of the Raspberry Pi cases, the main risk in this project is that this case fulfills all the desired needs of a user using the Raspberry Pi. Our aim is to provide the consumers the best of the products we manufacture. Our team constantly works up on the latest technological challenges to make sure that we always stay updated with the technology and engineering.
Fortunately, we have been trying through many prototypes over the last 6 months and were able to finalize a classic design for you. We have been able to make the final products without any roadblocks at all and our methods for producing the cases are consistent and solid. The only concern we have is if we get more orders that we can produce in a timely manner.

story:
Vaiyo.io is already LIVE for you to try with ease

Team    
This team is working already at another project and delivers real teamwork.
Bringing expertise in leading and development together

Short Summary    
Vaiyo is an easy to use conference platform fully encrypted by unhackable blockchain technology. The platform is ideal for Classrooms, Business and Private calls.

The Business
Highly secured Conference platforms with a whiteboard which you can use with multiple persons as Kanban board.

Progress/Proof    
These Features are currently live:
- Video conferencing
- Personalized Rooms
- Digital Whiteboard
- Recording
- Custom Designs
- User Authentication
- Desktop sharing
- Polling
- Private chat
- Multiple rooms
- Breakout rooms
- Emojis
- Notebook export
- Delegated Moderator

Objectives/Future    
- Blockchain security 
- Editable text 
- Meeting scheduler
- Open Source
- Android and iOS app
- MS desktop app
- Kanban boards
- AI face enhancement
- Virtual background
- Plugins
- Sharing documents
- Premium account
- Enterprise account
- 3D Avatar 
- To Do List
- Out of room chat
- Document storage
- Extensions
- Affiliate link
- Quick Notes

story:
Meet Elizabeth, a young lady around 19 preparing to sit for the annual Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) who said “Sir, am scared of this coming exam. I saw your post on using MyExam to practice for Jamb UTME which I believe is the only way out for me. I have heard stories of many people who read very well but later failed. Even brother Razaq in our area committed suicide after checking his Jamb score to be 148 on the third attempt.” This story is what can be identified by most students taking this annual test.

Every year, 1.85 million Nigerian students take the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) and every year mass failure and frustration with the exam dominate headlines. A key reason students are unsuccessful is a lack of access to realistic test practice and preparation. The UTMEs is administered in public test centers on computer, but most test preparation materials provided by schools are in book and paper form. While large tutorial centers for the exam exist, they are largely unaffordable or inconvenient for students to utilize their services.

I am Opeyemi Adekunle – a web developer and founder of MyExam.com.ng. MyExam.com.ng is a platform built to serve as a place where students can prepare for their upcoming exam through a realistic test taking approach to previous questions on that exam and a 100% resemblance to the original test itself. Our findings have shown that the students practice with a realistic test environment, the less their fear on the real exam day. In 2016, when we did a prototype at a public university in Nigeria (Obafemi Awolowo University), a student (Efe Blessing) came to me and said “When taking the practice exam at OAU, I felt as if I was already doing Jamb. At the original exam, my confidence was +1 and I got 273. Thank you TryJambCBT!”

Note: MyExam is formally called TryJambCBT. We changed the name to be able to add more major exams students need to pass to the portal

Confidence is one major key MyExam instills in students preparing for any exam. We believe that if this can reach a number of Nigeria students, the frustration rate, suicidal rate, and uncertain career rate will be reduced to the bearest minimum.

Within few weeks of the first launch, over 1000 students registered to use the platform but we couldn’t take all in as we do not have the needed resources yet which I believe with your help we will have soon. To show high demand for this solution, we haven’t started campaigning for MyExam before students started inviting their friends and colleagues to the portal to take a practice test.

The average number of students every year taking this test is around 1.7 million students! TO build a website that can take this huge number of people in at once will require a lot. We currently need more programmers and analyst to handle some section of the website. We are in-talk with schools to get their past questions and getting scholars that will solve them. And we need to reach out to students on the availability of this portal.

All the points are above are why we are raising a fund of $20,000. With this, we will be able to get the server on a big capacity server, employ more people to gather past questions, solve the questions, type in the questions and answers, code the website, analyze and announce the website to the public. We will also use part of this fund to create a test center where students can go in to take the test for the majority of the student that doesn’t have access to a computer set.

What do you get in return

By joining me in this huge project, you will be taking away tears from many family in Nigeria and more intelligently focused students will be breed into our ecosystem.

We will also be announcing you (if allowed) on our project page as one of our backers and if you donate above $500, you will get a space to showcase your service/product on the website.

Giving out the money is not the only thing we ask for but that you also help us share this crowdfunding with your friends that can fund the project.

At a later week, Elizabeth called me, “Sir, I got 301 in my exam. I still can’t believe it. Thank you so much! Thank you for giving me access to your software. God will bless you greatly”. I said Amen.

As the platform now includes other exams that frustrate students, we now have a market target of over 5 million students.

I have been able to reach over 300 students with this software and had great testimonies,  join me to reach the next five million (5,000,000) students that will have testimonies too.

story:
ABOUT KINGDOM OF DIAMONDS

Chronicling the adventures of Princess Carolina, Peter of Notting Hill, and Captain Wonderbird, the Kingdom of Diamonds book series is a colourful, vibrantly illustrated set of stories that seek to inspire children to have a positive impact on the world around them. Lessons like the importance of volunteering, kindness, and solving problems the right way go hand in hand with advice on how to tackle issues like fear, anger, and frustration.

OUR LATEST MISSION

Kingdom of Diamonds needs your help to complete its first-ever charity project. We want to start 2019 off by donating several hundred copies of our The Mission children's book and Book of Ideas colouring book to students at the St Mary’s RC Primary School, schools, and charities. Funds raised from this campaign will be used to cover printing costs for the books.

A thousand copies of The Mission and five hundred copies of Book of Ideas will be printed.

By supporting our campaign, you can also get your own copies! Check out our reward tier for more information!

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

Brazilian-born educator and missionary Carolina Alves Teixeira authors books meant to teach kids what it takes to create a better future. 

Please consider sharing our campaign via Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram to help us reach our goal faster!

story:
A SPARK IGNITES 

As with all great ideas, the concept for the Spark came from another kind of 'spark' ignited long ago in the minds and hearts of the entire Protosmith team. To understand how, we must first travel back in time to the 'olden' days of bad haircuts, Synthwave on the radio, and RadioShacks on every corner.

It was during this era that a young curious kid would stumble upon a series of DIY kits (from RadioShack!) not dissimilar to the Spark and fall in love with the concept of building, coding, playing, and sharing alike.

Years later, these kits would become the foundation for his illustrious career in the tech industry and inspire him to 'pay it forward' in some small sense by sharing his love for tech with other young people across the world.

Along with a likeminded team also inspired by these 'kits from the past', the Spark would be born, and with it an entirely new generation would be impacted forever–or so we hope!

Be sure to click on the videos and pictures below the main video to see all the cool stuff included with the Spark Kits!

 

 

BUILD.

The Spark can be assembled in under 2 hours with our easy to follow step-by-step instruction guide. With clear pictures, generous steps, and video guides, you'll always have a helping hand if you need it. The design of the Spark is laid out intuitively, with clearly-defined markers for each component; No guessing. Feel confident when you assemble the Spark.

 

 

CODE.

After the Spark is assembled, there are pre-built games to choose from. However, the real power of the Spark is that you can take those games and customize them, or even make your own! The only limit is your imagination!

 

 

PLAY.

The Spark can play countless games, only limited by the builder's imagination. Three games are included with this release.  There is also a community repository of sharable games!  Furthermore, you can join 2 Sparks together for multiplayer fun!

 

 

SHARE.

The goal of the Spark is to lay a foundation for builders, tinkerers, and future engineers to have a rich ecosystem to share and inspire each other. Make or modify games and share them for others to download, play, and modify as well!

 

 

Details... Details... Details...

The Spark consists of many surface mount components that work together to display images on the screen, play sound on the buzzer, read button presses and communicate via the multiplayer jack. Here are the major Spark features:

  • 48 x 60 White on Black OLED Illuminated Display
  • Custom OLED Ribbon Cable Adapter
  • Piezo Speaker / Buzzer
  • CR-2032 Battery & Holder
  • 3.5mm Serial Port
  • 7x Programmable Buttons
  • 1x Reset Button
  • USB Programming Port
  • Arduino Compatible Microcontroller
  • Pre-installed Arduino Bootloader

 

 

Patent-Pending Design

The Protosmith team has developed a unique "Protoguide" soldering system. With Protoguide compatible stencils and PCB holder, beginners can easily solder surface mount components in the correct position without years of practice!  This is a fundamental leap in technology for hand soldering surface mount components! Be the first to try Protoguide!

 

For more information click on the video gallery above, it looks like this:

 

 

Games

Our team has developed three game "templates" for you to start your coding adventure with Spark.  The goal of the Spark Kit is to provide something interesting and cool to build while still being simple enough for beginners to understand and modify.  We believe we have hit that mark!  The game templates along with the vast Arduino examples make modifying and experimenting with the Spark fun and rewarding!

 

 

Hacking

The primary function of the Spark has always been a game console.  However, the Spark can be expanded with the use of the multiplayer port which can be a general-purpose serial port.  You can even add other circuits to the multiplayer port such as an IR transmitter for controlling TVs or as a remote control for other projects!

 

 

Documentation

We have spent many, many, many hours developing the unique Instruction Guide and Spark Parts Kit to help you succeed in building the Spark with modern surface mount components.  Surface mount components and the skills needed to design, prototype, and build with them are the future!  Through-hole electronic components are going the way of the dinosaurs, and modern makers and engineers alike need to learn to work with surface mount electronics.  The Spark is the perfect kit to start learning!  The included manual clearly guides you through soldering each component and if you get stuck you can scan the QR code for a quick video tutorial.

 

 

What's Included?

 

Stickers

Cool stickers... Need we say more?

 

 

Spark PCB

The printed circuit board (PCB) is the foundation for all electronics projects. The Spark PCB has been engineered and tested to the limits.

 

 

Parts Kit

All the parts needed to build your very own Spark. Each unique component is in its own separate labeled compartment to avoid confusion and to make each one easy to find.

 

 

​Instruction Manual

Explains how the Spark goes together, how to solder, and much more.

 

 

Protoguide System

Our unique system allows for easy positioning and soldering of the components. See the demo video to see how it works!

 

 

Tool Kit

Great starter electronics kit with everything you need to assemble the Spark, and then to continue with your own projects! (shipped colors may vary)

The Spark is available in a few configurations for a wide range of skillsets, from beginner to professional.  

 

Spark Perks

 

Spark Bare PCB

The most basic form is just the "Spark Bare PCB". This is just the PCB for advanced makers who can order the parts and have the experience and tools to solder surface mount components without aids.  All documentation is available online only.

 

 

Spark Bare Bones

The next step up is the "Spark Bare Bones". This kit includes just the PCB + the Parts Kit, every part needed to build the Spark. This is for advanced makers who have the experience and tools to solder surface mount components without aids. All documentation is available online only.

 

 

Spark Pre-assembled

For the makers who just want to be coders the "Spark (Pre-assembled)" is for you!  This is a pre-assembled and tested Spark ready for coding.

 

 

Spark Kit

The "Spark Kit (Early Bird)" and the "Original Spark Kit" are our standard kits.  They include all parts, documentation, and soldering aids such as the Protoguide needed to build a Spark from scratch.  These are for makers that already have basic soldering tools.

 

 

Spark Kit + Tools

The "Spark Kit + Tools ( Early Bird )"  and the "Spark Kit + Tools" are the standard Spark Kits with an included electronics tool kit + helping hands + safety glasses + nitrile gloves.  All tools and parts are included for the maker who has never touched electronics before! They include all parts, documentation, and soldering aids such as the Protoguide needed to build a Spark from scratch + all the necessary tools! 

asdf

STEM or STEAM or maybe STREAM... SCHOOL?

Packages with an increasing discount are available for group builds! See the STEM perks.

 

Funding

The Protosmith team has done everything possible to develop a unique electronics kit that is simple to build yet interesting enough to continue hacking after it is put together.  We believe the Spark has hit this mark.  We need funding to start production and give the Spark a life of it's own.  Tooling for the Box, PCB's, Instruction Manual, and the Protoguide are needed.  These molds, dies, stencils and guides cost a few thousand dollars.  We also want to continue to develop new kits with the same spirt as the Spark.  We hope that with your help Protosmith will grow into a place for the next generation of makers to learn and hone their craft!
story_txt:
A SPARK IGNITES As with all great ideas, the concept for the Spark came from another kind of 'spark' ignited long ago in the minds and hearts of the entire Protosmith team. To understand how, we must first travel back in time to the 'olden' days of bad haircuts, Synthwave on the radio, and RadioShacks on every corner.It was during this era that a young curious kid would stumble upon a series of DIY kits (from RadioShack!) not dissimilar to the Spark and fall in love with the concept of building, coding, playing, and sharing alike.Years later, these kits would become the foundation for his illustrious career in the tech industry and inspire him to 'pay it forward' in some small sense by sharing his love for tech with other young people across the world.Along with a likeminded team also inspired by these 'kits from the past', the Spark would be born, and with it an entirely new generation would be impacted forever–or so we hope!Be sure to click on the videos and pictures below the main video to see all the cool stuff included with the Spark Kits!  BUILD.The Spark can be assembled in under 2 hours with our easy to follow step-by-step instruction guide. With clear pictures, generous steps, and video guides, you'll always have a helping hand if you need it. Feel confident when you assemble the Spark.  CODE.After the Spark is assembled, there are pre-built games to choose from. story:
On a quest to democratise STEM education in the Industry 4.0 era.

Watch trailer with captions in English - click on CC

El trailer tiene subtítulos en Español - haz click on CC

Sound starts after 20 seconds

 

A THIRD OF THE GOAL REACHED

 

CHECK OUR UPDATES

 

We are DATAWorkout!

 

A year ago, DATAWorkout set out on a mission to democratise the world of science and technology learning.

Our films use literary metaphors such as superheroes, medieval knights, and Jumanji adventures to entertain as well as illustrate concepts and practical applications of new technologies, including:

  • Blockchain,

  • Artificial intelligence,

  • Big data analysis,

  • Quantum computing.

We use state-of-the-art motion graphics and animation to create visually engaging stories, demystifying complex concepts, models and advanced analytics practices.

DATAWorkout offers a cinematic and engaging experience aimed at college and university students who are eager to start learning the what, why and how of tech-centric business strategies.

Also, our films are created to inspire and inform the new generation of entrepreneurs and business leaders with no technical background or computing science studies. Our films focus on the application of these technologies and the strategies and governance in enterprises.

DATAWorkout’s first film on AI, The Quest for Super Intelligence, is already available to rent on our website, and is gradually getting traction after a bumpy start during Covid. Check our website www.dataworkout.com

Having started with AI, which provided a creative framework, we have ventured into the mysterious world of blockchain.

Our second film, The Lord of the Blocks, is currently in production and we need your support and feedback to help us provide an even better cinematic experience!

After watching our films, we would value your honest feedback:

Is our method of learning effective by:

  • Reducing hours of lecture-style content into feature-length films using metaphors and visuals to stimulate the imagination and strip away the fear factor? 
  • Sparking a new generation of business-savvy leaders who are also passionate about the value creation of new technologies? 

 

Why Do We Need Your Support?

We need your support to create the first ever cinematic educational film on blockchain using storytelling to make learning entertaining and engaging, demystifying the magic of this amazing technology and its value creating potential for business and society. 

In a world of rapid change, surrounded by everyday AI, it seems puzzling that there is such a huge skills gap for STEM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering & Maths).

A recent study by IBM reported the demand for technology-centric business skills at 120 million professionals. 

We aim to bridge that gap, but we can’t do it without your help.

 

What is the Novelty?

 

 

"Block-chain" is an encryption and date-stamping technology that allows data records or blocks (e.g., bitcoin transactions, medical records, parcel tracking) to be linked, creating an immutable secure chain - hence the name.

Blockchain technology, along with artificial intelligence and data analytics are already here and are becoming essential skills to have in the new digital economy. 

Our educational films benefit the next generation of professionals studying in colleges and universities who need to develop STEM skills in context to business, and 

Business leaders who need to upgrade their knowledge and skills about digital transformation in a friendly cinematic format.

The Lord of the Blocks: Blockchain Unchained, takes viewers back to a medieval setting of castles, wizards and knights to explain this revolutionary new technology. 

Our educational films use a cinematic format, with memorable stories based on fictionalised scripts bringing to life factual knowledge.

 

 

What You Get

DATAWorkout films are created to inspire and inform the new generation of entrepreneurs and business leaders with no technical background or computing studies. Our films focus on the application of these technologies and the strategies and governance in enterprises. 

Interested in supporting our creative work and help democratise education?

For those contributors looking for a tangible reward to remember their role in the production, we're offering many great PERKS which include the following:

A Big 'Thank You' 

Film Pre-Release

Get Blockchain and AI Films

Behind The Scene & Signed Poster

Thank-you Credit

Exclusive Film Script

Meet The Creative Team

Associate Producer Credits

Executive Producer Credits

 

 

 

 

 

Below are all the details of the the exciting perks you could get your hands on today!

 

A Big Thank You! £5 GBP

Any contribution helps us tenfold. Thank you for helping get THE LORDS OF THE BLOCKS up and running. We couldn't do this without you!

 

Film Pre-Release £15 GBP 

You'll get to see THE LORDS OF THE BLOCKS before anyone else! We'll send you a link to the finished film a month before it premieres on our own website, and probably over a year before it is available in major movie platforms. Link to view the film for a whole month.

 

Get Blockchain and AI Films £30 GBP ​

Besides getting to see THE LORDS OF THE BLOCKS before anyone else, you will get access to our AI in Business film, The Quest for Super Intelligence: From Automation to Hyper-Connectivity. You will have access to both films for a whole month.

 

Behind The Scene & Signed Poster £50 GBP

If you donate £50 or more,  in addition you will also receive behind the scenes storyboards, footage and photos as we work on the film and signed poster.

 

Thank-you Credit £100 GBP

For £100 or more,  in addition your name will be included in the credits of THE LORDS OF THE BLOCKS as a backer to the film! After all, the public should know your contribution to the project!

 

Exclusive Film Script £250 GBP

For £250 or more you donate,  in addition you will receive a printed copy of the original film script adapted as a medieval story. 

 

Meet The Creative Team £450 GBP

For the generous contributions you've made to this film,  in addition you'll receive an invitation to meet our creative team online and talk about the whole production process of THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS.

 

Associate Producer Credit £750 GBP

For the big contributions you've made to this film,  in addition you'll receive your own special Associate Producer Credit on THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS. Link to view the films for a whole year.

 

Executive Producer Credit £1500 GBP

For the huge contributions you've made to this film, in addition you'll receive your own special Executive Producer Credit on THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS. Link to view the films for a whole year.



Updates

We will keep you updated with the progress of our campaign and the production of our awesome film. Please don't forget to share the campaign link with your friends in social media.

After all, the public should know your contribution to the project! Exclusive Film Script £250 GBPFor £250 or more you donate,  in addition you will receive a printed copy of the original film script adapted as a medieval story.  Meet The Creative Team £450 GBPFor the generous contributions you've made to this film,  in addition you'll receive an invitation to meet our creative team online and talk about the whole production process of THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS. Associate Producer Credit £750 GBPFor the big contributions you've made to this film,  in addition you'll receive your own special Associate Producer Credit on THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS. Link to view the films for a whole year. Executive Producer Credit £1500 GBPFor the huge contributions you've made to this film, in addition you'll receive your own special Executive Producer Credit on THE LORD OF THE BLOCKS. Link to view the films for a whole year.
