story:
This is our key to your success

Your contribution and investment will help us to support the high Italian costs of opening and managing the activity.

 

1) Our newsletter​

Receive Effe Capital content by email

The Newsletter that underpins your investment decisions

 

Effe Capital team provides monthly articles and analysis of macro trends and market scenarios, from stock exchanges to government bonds, from currencies to commodities, from indices current point to where they aim to arrive, according to technical-analysis point of view.

We will also provide report on potentially undervalued stocks, companies whose stock price is traded below its "fair" value, stocks on which hedge funds and “value” investors like Warren Buffett count on.

 

Another important subscription newsletter service is the weekly update on the “Posizioni Nette Corte” (short pressure level on Stocks by big investors) of the italian MIB. Both the updated value (%) and the historical data will be provided, to sense if the short positions are increasing or decreasing, allowing so useful decisions on trades. Data regarding the Short position on stocks from the great financial operators are fundamental, to decide how to operate: if a specific Stock has an high (or increasing) short pressure it’s rather logic to avoid “Long” trading positions, and to opt to a short strategy.

 

EFFE CAPITAL Newsletter offers qualified analyses and forecasts on global and local markets, with the aim of training, guiding and helping investors to be always up-to-date on market topics.

 

2) Pratical guides

We are now proud to present you our highly condensed mini-guides on different financial themes, based on trusted scholarly publications.

We prepare them to be key tools for a successful market trading operativity.

Don’t miss any of it!

Guide to fundamental analysis

What is the meaning and the purpose of the of fundamental analysis? Why it is so important?

What is observed and studied by the fundamental analysis ?

What you don't have to forget when performing the fundamental analysis of stocks?

 

The fundamental analysis goal is to study the market trends, starting from a financial-economic analysis of the companies in which we want to invest, and the evaluation of macro and micro-economic data that affect directly or indirectly the asset itself.

In this mini guide you will find out how the fundamental analysis works, activity that made Warren Buffett one of the richest man world-wide. You will get some extra elements to select the best titles in the market.

 

 

Guide to techincal analysis

What’s the technical analysis for?

The fundamental principles of Charles Dow

Which are the most reliable indicators when analyzing the market?

Why technical and fundamental analysis make up your best opportunity to operate in financial markets?

 

Charles Dow (1851-1902, Wall Street Journal  founder and inventor of the Dow Jones Industrial Average index) is universally considered the father of Technical Analysis.

Technical analysis allows to study and estimate possible price changes in financial markets through statistics studies on historical prices charts and market trends. This is fundamental to define/set-up specific entry and exit prices, with the aim of earning as much as possible from buy and sell transactions.

In this mini guide you will discover the basic principles of this discipline, and the best techniques that investors around the world use on a daily basis to build effective operational strategies, thus creating useful section for traders, by giving solid benchmarks criteria.

 

Financial Planning and Asset Allocation

This mini guide addresses personal financial planning, a systematic approach whereby an individual maximizes existing financial resources through a proper management of his/her finances resources, to better achieve their own financial goals and objectives.

Asset Allocation is a set of techniques of great importance, that derives from the Markowitz studies, demonstrating  that portfolio diversification improves the return while reducing the risk for the investor.

 

Portfolio Management

To wisely build up a portfolio you have to answer to these simple questions:

What is your investment goal?

How long do you want to invest / keep investment?

Which level of  risk can you afford?

 

This is a mini guide on portfolio management, on appropriate planning  of an investor’s financial assets.

In such a way to reduce risk and maximise return, with suggestions of techniques and secrets for the best outcome.

 

Exploring options

This mini guide shows how the options features make these tools suitable not only for directional trading strategies but also for hedging and arbitrage strategies.

Hedging is a strategy aimed to protect a forward investment from possible unforeseen events, such as currency fluctuations or stocks price fluctuations.  The options are a kind of derivatives, useful tools for hedging strategies.

Arbitrage is a financial transaction that aims to "get a risk-free profit by performing simultaneously transactions in two or more markets". This trading technique requires a high level of experience and requires the trader to follow many markets at the same time. Therefore, it is not appropriate for casual, beginners or inexperienced operators.

 

3) Excel for Certificate Analysis and Management

Premise: it is useful for the class of "Conditionally Protected" Certificates (mainly for "Worst Of" Cash Collect), which issue conditional periodic coupons.

It`s a tool allowing you to keep an eye on one or many Certificates at a time, and to decide therefore by yourself possibile any actions to be taken. It has been conceivde for Certificates currently traded on Borsa Italiana (Sedex and Certx).

It collects the fundamental data of the certificates themselves (Various deadlines, Thresholds, Coupon Values and Maxicoupon...) and the underlying Basket of Titles on which they are based.

It allows you to update (semi-automatically) the current values of basket of titles, and provides visual evidence (cell colors) for specific conditions (benefits, losses, risks...).

It also allows you to see quickly the Profit/ Loss of each single Certificate present in your list.

 

Thanks to your support we'll start to provide you useful, practical and worth-while guides and services!  

Join us in this Project!

Receive Effe Capital content by emailThe Newsletter that underpins your investment decisions Effe Capital team provides monthly articles and analysis of macro trends and market scenarios, from stock exchanges to government bonds, from currencies to commodities, from indices current point to where they aim to arrive, according to technical-analysis point of view.We will also provide report on potentially undervalued stocks, companies whose stock price is traded below its "fair" value, stocks on which hedge funds and “value” investors like Warren Buffett count on. Another important subscription newsletter service is the weekly update on the “Posizioni Nette Corte” (short pressure level on Stocks by big investors) of the italian MIB. Both the updated value (%) and the historical data will be provided, to sense if the short positions are increasing or decreasing, allowing so useful decisions on trades. Data regarding the Short position on stocks from the great financial operators are fundamental, to decide how to operate: if a specific Stock has an high (or increasing) short pressure it’s rather logic to avoid “Long” trading positions, and to opt to a short strategy. EFFE CAPITAL Newsletter offers qualified analyses and forecasts on global and local markets, with the aim of training, guiding and helping investors to be always up-to-date on market topics. 2) Pratical guidesWe are now proud to present you our highly condensed mini-guides on different financial themes, based on trusted scholarly publications.We prepare them to be key tools for a successful market trading operativity.Don’t miss any of it!Guide to fundamental analysisWhat is the meaning and the purpose of the of fundamental analysis? Why it is so important?What is observed and studied by the fundamental analysis ?What you don't have to forget when performing the fundamental analysis of stocks? The fundamental analysis goal is to study the market trends, starting from a financial-economic analysis of the companies in which we want to invest, and the evaluation of macro and micro-economic data that affect directly or indirectly the asset itself.In this mini guide you will find out how the fundamental analysis works, activity that made Warren Buffett one of the richest man world-wide. You will get some extra elements to select the best titles in the market.  Guide to techincal analysisWhat’s the technical analysis for?The fundamental principles of Charles DowWhich are the most reliable indicators when analyzing the market?Why technical and fundamental analysis make up your best opportunity to operate in financial markets? Charles Dow (1851-1902, Wall Street Journal  founder and inventor of the Dow Jones Industrial Average index) is universally considered the father of Technical Analysis.Technical analysis allows to study and estimate possible price changes in financial markets through statistics studies on historical prices charts and market trends. This is fundamental to define/set-up specific entry and exit prices, with the aim of earning as much as possible from buy and sell transactions.In this mini guide you will discover the basic principles of this discipline, and the best techniques that investors around the world use on a daily basis to build effective operational strategies, thus creating useful section for traders, by giving solid benchmarks criteria. Financial Planning and Asset AllocationThis mini guide addresses personal financial planning, a systematic approach whereby an individual maximizes existing financial resources through a proper management of his/her finances resources, to better achieve their own financial goals and objectives.Asset Allocation is a set of techniques of great importance, that derives from the Markowitz studies, demonstrating  that portfolio diversification improves the return while reducing the risk for the investor. Portfolio ManagementTo wisely build up a portfolio you have to answer to these simple questions:What is your investment goal?How long do you want to invest / keep investment?Which level of  risk can you afford? This is a mini guide on portfolio management, on appropriate planning  of an investor’s financial assets.In such a way to reduce risk and maximise return, with suggestions of techniques and secrets for the best outcome. Exploring optionsThis mini guide shows how the options features make these tools suitable not only for directional trading strategies but also for hedging and arbitrage strategies.Hedging is a strategy aimed to protect a forward investment from possible unforeseen events, such as currency fluctuations or stocks price fluctuations.  The options are a kind of derivatives, useful tools for hedging strategies.Arbitrage is a financial transaction that aims to "get a risk-free profit by performing simultaneously transactions in two or more markets". This trading technique requires a high level of experience and requires the trader to follow many markets at the same time. Therefore, it is not appropriate for casual, beginners or inexperienced operators. 3) Excel for Certificate Analysis and ManagementPremise: it is useful for the class of "Conditionally Protected" Certificates (mainly for "Worst Of" Cash Collect), which issue conditional periodic coupons.It`s a tool allowing you to keep an eye on one or many Certificates at a time, and to decide therefore by yourself possibile any actions to be taken. It has been conceivde for Certificates currently traded on Borsa Italiana (Sedex and Certx).It collects the fundamental data of the certificates themselves (Various deadlines, Thresholds, Coupon Values and Maxicoupon...) and the underlying Basket of Titles on which they are based.It allows you to update (semi-automatically) the current values of basket of titles, and provides visual evidence (cell colors) for specific conditions (benefits, losses, risks...).It also allows you to see quickly the Profit/ Loss of each single Certificate present in your list. Thanks to your support we'll start to provide you useful, practical and worth-while guides and services!  Join us in this Project!

story:
Greetings friends,

Here's the quick scoop, I am Melissa Irene,  a mother of 4 beautiful daughters.  I created "Planets of the Week," and now excited to announce the completion of the second essential kids book entitled "ABC Affirmations" with Juliette, one of my daughters, to help encourage the youth with positivity while they learn the alphabet. Both of these books are now exclusively available at the Amazon marketplace on Kindle! We introduce positive daily affirmations with Sacred Geometry through the manifestation of the Flower of Life. It is created page after page by adding a new circle with each new letter of the alphabet. Showcasing the Seed of Life on the 7th letter G and the full Flower of Life design by the letter Z. These affirmations are powerful life-affirming statements that inspire the readers' human experience.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $1,331.00 to print & ship 500 copies . 

  • Every last penny is strictly going towards the publication of the first 500 copies. (Take a look at the quote above in the photo album.)
  • Every donor/ contributor will receive their own copy!

The Impact

It would be a dream come true to get this information out to the masses in an effort to help raise the overall vibe & sense of well being in our youth. We are proud to announce the ABC Affirmations book is now ready for print!  We already self-published one book, and we ware currently accepting pre-orders, which will help with the initial costs. We will greatly appreciate your contribution and we love to share these inspiring messages with you. 

  • We will be including a FREE copy of the first book "Planets of the Week" to the first 25 blessed beings who decide to donate.
  • For all contributions exceeding $250 we will provide a detailed 1hr Natal Chart Reading, 1hr Life Path Analysis, & 1hr Mayan Oracle Revelation.
  • For all contributions exceeding $500 we will pull up & host a workshop/seminar going further in detail with Sacred Geometry, Universal Laws, & Astro-theology.

Risks & Challenges

There are many printing options, and even the local shops are more expensive, I have done research and found the best prices. (Also open to help in this dept.)

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

The Perks!

We will be including a FREE copy of the first book "Planets of the Week" to the first 25 blessed beings who decide to donate.

Silver: For all contributions exceeding $100 we will provide both books, "Planets of the Week," & "ABC Affirmations PLUS a detailed: *1hr Natal Chart Reading, *1hr Life Path Analysis, OR  *1hr Mayan Oracle Revelation

Gold: For all contributions exceeding $250 we will provide a detailed 1hr Natal Chart Reading, 1hr Life Path Analysis, & 1hr Mayan Oracle Revelation.

Platinum: For all contributions exceeding $500 we will pull up & host a workshop/seminar going further in detail with Sacred Geometry, Universal Laws, & Astro-theology.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please ask folks, friends, and family to get the word out to help us make some noise about this humanitarian campaign.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
BIT.LY/BTWdollar

 

Alright So,

  • I've always liked treasure hunts and the idea of hidden worlds if you just knew where to look.
  • Doing this will give me the ability to give possibly thousands of people a little bit of that.
  • Also, I think maybe if kids heard that their library might have hidden money in it they'd be spending a little more time in there.

 

What I Need To Do This

Phase 1: Acquisition (Complete)

  • I have to be able to pay for the cards but they're relatively cheap.

Phase 2: Money For The Books

  • I'm a college student.

 

Who Are You Anyway?

There's some info here... bit.ly/KeenanNunezPortfolio 

but feel free to email me for more information: Keenan.Nunez@gmail.com

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Send this page around so I can get started.

story:
HOW IT WORKS?

Each card has:

  • one simple craft to make with clear instructions
  • additional challenges to complete that provoke reflection, research and creativity
  • QR code to register the card in the mobile app and use the additional content there.

The mobile app provides for each card:

  • detailed instructions video
  • opportunity for the users to share video or images of their own creatures
  • full list of what other users have uploaded and shared for the specific card, so one can use for inspiration and additional ideas.

 

See for yourself:

The front side of the cards

 

The back side of the cards

 

A schematic presentation of how the mobile app works

 

Few mockups of the mobile app. For full demo, watch the video again.

 

WHY CRAFTS?

We researched all kinds of traditional pedagogy, Montessori and Waldorf methodologies. Consulted with specialists on all children education and development related topics. Inspired from Design Thinking and other similar methodologies for boosting innovation and creativity.

It turned out that making crafts and working on micro projects with their loved ones, is the best way for children to create safe environment and open their minds to explore and learn.

Making crafts:

  • develops sensorimotor skills
  • boosts children natural ability for out of the box thinking and problem solving skills
  • helps them acquire learning patterns that will support them do better at whatever they are on to in their life. 

     

    WHY DID WE MAKE A MOBILE APP?

    We decided to develop a mobile app to teach the children that the mobile devices should be used as a tool for additional information and inspiration to build something offline, rather than something to spend your time when you are most bored.

    It also allows us to "augment" the content of the offline cards with video instructions, images or videos of what others have built and possibility for sharing own creations.

    On top of that and if we meet our stretch goals, the mobile app allows us to make:

    • A “hedgehog from dough” tracker - a virtual map of the world with indications where are born the hedgehogs made from “Mila Lila” Craft Cards. This way we will bring closer to kids the idea that the world has no limits when people are driven by the same passion.
    • Augmented reality display of the expected end result over the cards. This way we will make the kids aware of the new dimensions of technology; what is a 3D object vs. 2D; position of an object in space, etc.

     

    HOW IT LOOKS?

    Below we are showing the designs, some photos and technical details of the cards and the mobile application. 

    Cardboard cards

    The cards are A5 size (148mm×210mm or 5.8 inches×8.3 inches) and are made from 1.53 mm thick beer cardboard, full color digital printing on self-adhesive matte paper. A laminate for additional strength is also added.

    Take a look at them in the previews below.

     
     

     

    The mobile application

    The mobile application is compatible both with iOS and Android.
     
     
     

    HOW WE MADE IT?

      Everything in our cards has been developed with the attention to the smallest detail. From the initial idea about the specific craft and the additional challenges, through the specific design of the card and materials used when printing.

      We worked closely with teachers, psychologists, art pedagogues and parents. Hired one of the best children illustrators in the country and worked with a world class printing house.

      Most important of all - we tested the results of each stage in the process with children from different ages and educational background and iterated again and again until we got satisfied with the result.

      Our goal was to make at least 2 production ready cards prior the Indiegogo campaign in order to test the content, work out the whole process and find the right partners.

      Now we need your support to produce the remaining 10 cards from the set & their corresponding instructions videos for the app.

       

      WHO WE ARE?

      The founders

      We are Venera and Yosif. Former colleagues from Telerik. A product manager and a software developer. A mother of two and a father of one (still;)). We are makers and believers. We love our kids and want to give a chance to all children in the world to make, have fun and learn. We want more families to spend more time together. And to make hedgehogs from dough:)

      We love technology and we want to bridge the offline play at home with the possibility to inspire from others and share with the whole world. And to keep that focused without all the clutter and insecurity from the usual social media.

      Of course, nothing from our dreams would have been possible without the help of our team.

       

      The team

      Eli (Elena Yosifova) is journalist and key supporter of Yosif in his family life :) On top of that she helped with everything that you see from Mila Lila. She made the first hedgehog. And the instructions video for making it. And the first version of the printed cards, so we could start talking to people about the product and actually be able to demonstrate it. 

      Eli provided the so needed feedback when we were wandering between this or that option for the craft, the text or the design of the cards. She was there for us each time when we felt most stuck - be it for the script of the Indiegogo video or the mail we sent to potential external supporters. Thanks, Eli!

       

       

      Evga (Evgenia Nikolova) is Art Director in Next DC - the best Digital Creative Agency in Bulgaria and one of the founders of "Ribka publishing" - a small publishing house focused on children books with unique illustrations.

       

      Evga created the beautiful brand and the design for the cards but most importantly was our corrective for everything visual we tried to produce, including the overall content and look & feel of this page :) Thanks, Evga! 

       

       

      Jeni (Jenia Milusheva) is children-adolescent and school psychologist with more than 10 years of experience.  She has specializations in the fields of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, Family Therapy, Play Therapy and Parent-Child Interaction Therapy. She knows everything Montessori and Waldorf and was able to translate it even to us - the digital nerds from the software industry.

      Jenia helped us to polish the content for the cards and figure out what actually the whole product should be. It is her idea to provide to parents and educators quick tips re: how to create stories and create the needed atmosphere so the children feel most relaxed and motivated for making. Thanks, Jeni!

       

       

      Yuli (Yulian Naydenov) is fine arts pedagogue with more than 20 years of experience teaching children and adolescents. Together with Jenia, he helped us figure out the content of the first 2 cards (actually he insisted in making 3 in the beginning:)).

       

      Yuli provided us with precious know-how regarding the best way to teach arts to children so that it's applicable from toddlers to high-schoolers. We will reveal that in some of the remaining cards we will make for the set. Thanks, Yuli!

       

      HOW CAN YOU HELP?

       

       

      WHEN TO EXPECT THE DELIVERY?

       

       

      WANT TO HELP EVEN MORE?

      Spread the word on

story:
Wind of Happiness Campaign Launches in Nigeria

 

  • Hello there, I'm Wind, a blue dinosaur character created by Minglang Production (based in China). Last year I went to Nigeria and met kids there. We shared stories, watched movie footage from my company together. I began to know more about them. I really like them and it's my great honor if I could make these little angels even happier. This year, with my film approaching its post-production stage, I'll go to Nigeria to have fun with the kids and bring happiness to them.

  •  This year I'm planning to meet some kids in Nigeria again in September 2018. My friend Rosanna has contacted schools and they allowed us to do a special activity with their children in a cinema. We'll give out stationery they need for a new semester and fund the schools. They'll all get Travel With the Wind products.  Probably, I'll bring them an animation film called Travel With the Wind . BTW, this film is produced by Minglang Production and It's  permitted for me to screen it once I'm with the kids. 

  • I launch this campaign because I need some help to purchase a lot of stationery, such as backpacks, books, pens, crayons and some stuff a school needs to conduct teaching. Besides, I guess lots of people from all over the world are thinking about or ever had the idea to offer help to people in need but you might encounter difficulty in implementing your plan. Then this is a great opportunity for you to fulfill your dream! Come join us! Together we can make a difference! More fund from you means more kids and schools are going to be helped!!

Happiness Worth Spreading 

 

We Need: 

  • 5000 USD is needed for this campaign. 

  1. Stationery: backpacks 735 USD; books 800 USD; pens 290 USD; crayons and others 440 USD

  2. Fund for schools: 2735 USD

 

You Get: 

  • These perks are the most special!. They are customized derivative products of our animation film-- Travel With the Wind. Some of them are produced by G20 Summit gift producers in Hangzhou, China. 

  1. Fans With a blue Dinosaur named Wind   (price: 40 USD)

  2. Mug Gift Sets

(early bird price: 17 USD; regular price: 22 USD)

3.Cartoon T-shirts          (price: 12 USD)

4. 10 USD: A thank you note posted on our social networks  

5. 10 USD: A West Lake picture taken for you

6. With 600 USD fund, you'll get:

                          1. a free lunch with us in Hangzhou, China

                          2. a Travel With the Wind Fan

                          3. a Travel With the Wind Mug

                          4. a thank you note posted for you on our social networks.

                           5. a West Lake picture taken for you

                                      Worldwide Shipping!!

7.With 1500 USD fund, we'll 

                        1. add your name to the film credits as Travel With the Wind film producer!!

                        2.send you a Travel With the Wind Fan.

                        3.send you a Travel With the Wind Mug.

                        4.send you a Travel With the Wind T-shirt.

                        5.post a thank you note for you on our social networks.

                                  6. send you a West Lake picture

                                           Worldwide Shipping!!

It's about sharing happiness with them. Support my campaign! 

As I'll go to Nigeria on behalf of my company Minglang Film &TV Production Company and It's allowed by the local schools and assisted by my business partner and friend Miss Rosanna in Nigeria, I can assure you that every cent from you is going to matter a lot for kids in Nigeria.  If I don't reach the entire goal, I'll still use the money for kids and schools in Nigeria.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Please tell your friends and family about this campaign.
  • Please share this campaign link using Indiegogo share tools.
  • You can follow up with the campaign  on Facebook: 

    https://m.facebook.com/Minglang-Production-1773...

  • Or on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/minglang_production/

  • Or on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TWTWfilm

 I'll upload pictures or videos about this campaign later on social networks and Indiegogo. 

              Happiness Worth Spreading

This year, with my film approaching its post-production stage, I'll go to Nigeria to have fun with the kids and bring happiness to them.
 This year I'm planning to meet some kids in Nigeria again in September 2018. My friend Rosanna has contacted schools and they allowed us to do a special activity with their children in a cinema. We'll give out stationery they need for a new semester and fund the schools. They'll all get Travel With the Wind products.  Probably, I'll bring them an animation film called Travel With the Wind . BTW, this film is produced by Minglang Production and It's  permitted for me to screen it once I'm with the kids. 
I launch this campaign because I need some help to purchase a lot of stationery, such as backpacks, books, pens, crayons and some stuff a school needs to conduct teaching. Besides, I guess lots of people from all over the world are thinking about or ever had the idea to offer help to people in need but you might encounter difficulty in implementing your plan. Then this is a great opportunity for you to fulfill your dream! Come join us! Together we can make a difference! More fund from you means more kids and schools are going to be helped!!

Happiness Worth Spreading 

 
We Need: 
5000 USD is needed for this campaign. 

Stationery: backpacks 735 USD; books 800 USD; pens 290 USD; crayons and others 440 USD
Fund for schools: 2735 USD

 
You Get: 
These perks are the most special!. They are customized derivative products of our animation film-- Travel With the Wind. Some of them are produced by G20 Summit gift producers in Hangzhou, China. 

Fans With a blue Dinosaur named Wind   (price: 40 USD)

Mug Gift Sets

(early bird price: 17 USD; regular price: 22 USD)


3.Cartoon T-shirts          (price: 12 USD)

4. 10 USD: A thank you note posted on our social networks  
5. 10 USD: A West Lake picture taken for you
6. With 600 USD fund, you'll get:
                          1. a free lunch with us in Hangzhou, China
                          2. a Travel With the Wind Fan
                          3. a Travel With the Wind Mug
                          4. a thank you note posted for you on our social networks.
                           5. a West Lake picture taken for you
                                      Worldwide Shipping!!
7.With 1500 USD fund, we'll 
                        1. add your name to the film credits as Travel With the Wind film producer!!
                        2.send you a Travel With the Wind Fan.
                        3.send you a Travel With the Wind Mug.
                        4.send you a Travel With the Wind T-shirt.
                        5.post a thank you note for you on our social networks.
                                  6. send you a West Lake picture
                                           Worldwide Shipping!!
It's about sharing happiness with them. Support my campaign! 
As I'll go to Nigeria on behalf of my company Minglang Film &TV Production Company and It's allowed by the local schools and assisted by my business partner and friend Miss Rosanna in Nigeria, I can assure you that every cent from you is going to matter a lot for kids in Nigeria.  If I don't reach the entire goal, I'll still use the money for kids and schools in Nigeria.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
 

Please tell your friends and family about this campaign.
Please share this campaign link using Indiegogo share tools.
You can follow up with the campaign  on Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/Minglang-Production-1773...

Or on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/minglang_production/
Or on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TWTWfilm

 I'll upload pictures or videos about this campaign later on social networks and Indiegogo. 
              Happiness Worth Spreading

story:
We‘re a team of Chinese language learners and machine learning engineers who specialize in voice processing and we’ve invented an exciting device that can teach you Chinese faster than anything on the market.
 

Lily is a voice-controlled speaker that can simply and easily teach you Chinese - think Alexa for Chinese learning! The fastest way to learn a language is not simply through reading books or the use of a basic app but to immerse yourself in the language and speak as much possible.

Learn Chinese by speaking directly with Lily. No voice-actor dialogs you must memorize but instead real interactive conversations to help you understand the language. Lily uses speech recognition to understand what you say and uses voice synthesis to reply with a human voice.
 

Translation has never been easier. Just ask Lily and get a response in real-time. Every translation is then logged into our mobile app so that you can find them later and review.
 

Learning vocabulary is tedious due to having to memorize long vocabulary lists. We’re changing all of this. Our voice games help you actively learn vocabulary, with oral questions and animations making the whole learning process fun and sticky.
 

Our Chinese voice assistant immerses you into a full Chinese language environment, from the comfort of your own home. Learning through immersion is the best way to become fluent in Chinese and better understand the culture.

 

 

See your conversations in Pinyin and learn Chinese characters with our mobile app. Get more details about each phrase including the translation and word breakdown.

 

 

 

We want you to have a great Chinese accent and we have designed the best way to help you achieve that goal. For a given phrase, you can check the accuracy of your pronunciation, see which words have been mispronounced and compare with perfect Chinese pronunciation.
 

In collaboration with professional Chinese tutors, we’ve developed easy to understand training programs so that you can reach a target Chinese level in 3, 6 or 12 months. We have a well- designed curriculum with regular exercises and a progress tracking system.

 

Lily can help improve your Chinese, no matter what stage you are at from beginner to advanced. Based on your product usage, we can approximate your Chinese language level and customize Lily’s teaching level so that it best fits your needs.

We’ll be adding more languages after Q2 2019, starting with French and Spanish. People who buy Lily now will benefit from those new languages just updating their software, for free.
 

Lily was designed with music in mind. Great sound begins with great driver design; a custom designed long-throw woofer for rich vocals, deep bass, dynamic range and a full-size edge-driven tweeter to deliver the high-fidelity audio resolution that you would find in a high-end home speaker. The drivers are managed by a perfectly tuned 30W high-power class D amplifier.

The audio team crafted the sound output with a true 360 degree by 100-degree constant directivity horn. The constant directivity means that anywhere within this listening window, you hear the same sound. The result? Anywhere you place the speaker and anywhere you are in the listening window, you’re immersed in deep bass, rich vocals, and crisp highs. No corners were cut and no compromises were made.
 



Lily is wrapped in a seamless knit fabric with both a beautiful texture and a strong permeability to sound. We engineered a low stitch density fabric so that its intermeshing loops can be elastic and stretch during assembly into large "holes" to better let the sound pass through.


Maybe is the only language learning company in the world that has vertically integrated its own hardware, its own voice AI and its own language learning content (each being a barrier to market entry by itself) into a language learning tool smarter than any other.
 

In 2014, before Amazon Echo existed, our team started working on voice-controlled speakers. Since then, we've engineered 3 voice-controlled speakers with some of the biggest Internet companies in the world and developed the voice AI to power them.
 


For teaching Chinese, we had to develop specific voice AI technology that can't be found in usual voice-controlled devices, whether it's being able to understand people speaking Chinese with a strong accent, or synthesizing a voice that can speak both English and Chinese fluently.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Maybe is an AI company that develops voice-controlled devices and voice processing AI chipsets which is based between San Francisco and Shenzhen.

Maybe is backed by Tencent through the Tencent AI Accelerator (40 companies selected out of 1500) and has worked with Baidu on a voice-controlled speaker. Our founder also went through YCombinator.

The team is composed of PhDs in Machine Learning and Signal Processing, software, engineers, electrical engineers, mechanical engineers that have built products for Google, Samsung, Intel and Huawei.

 

We live in a world with strong educational inequalities, some people can go to the best schools and afford the best private teachers while others can’t pay for college. There are even people afraid to have a child because they think they wouldn't be able to pay for education.

Maybe is making education cheaper and more accessible by developing automated teaching devices powered by Artificial Intelligence. Maybe’s first product is a voice-controlled speaker that can teach Chinese.

Our goal is to foster a new era in which robots teach humans and humans have access to unlimited education.

story:
[IMPORTANT UPDATE: The Fusion Writer was an overoptimistic idea that failed to garner enough support or interest. Unfortunately, not many people supported the project for it to take off. Even though I received much interest, there was also much skepticism. For that reason, I am cancelling the funding for the project. However, due to IndieGoGo's rules, once a certain sum has been collected, the project cannot be cancelled or deleted until the end date. Therefore, I will be refunding the $40 collected to my backers as soon as possible. I will relaunch the project once more once I have raised up enough personal funds to build a working prototype. Perhaps then it would have more appeal. Thanks to everyone who expressed interest in my idea.]

What is the Fusion Writer? 

•A portable, durable and energy efficient E-ink word processor 

•No strain high contrast 13" screen

•Reversible twist screen, foldable to transform into an ebook

•Will be ultra-slim and durable

•Will feature a 2 month average battery life

•Will be able to charge on solar power or via USB

•Will have a full ergonomic QWERTY keyboard

•Will be powered by Android OS with a custom developed word processor application

•Designed for distraction-free writing

As an aspiring writer and gadget lover, I have always noticed the lack of any one specific portable writing tool made only for writers and writing. Sure there was the Alphasmart, which catered to writers with its full keyboard, but it was limited then and is now. 

Laptops have a great deal of functionality, but when it comes down to it they are also limited by battery life, portability and durability. 

In today's day and age it seems that the number of laptops and tablets keeps increasing exponentially - so does the number of possible distractions when using them. 

The Fusion Writer will have the following great features:

•High contrast 13" touchscreen E-ink display

•2 month average battery life

•Powered by Android OS 

•Full sized ergonomic keyboard

•Built-in LCD backlight

•Built-in solar panel outer cover (under consideration as an option for future models)

•Waterproof construction (up to 1-2 meters estimated)

•Durable and shock-proof (can withstand a 5 meter drop estimated)

•Flash built in memory (with upgradeable SD card memory slot)

•WiFi & Bluetooth connectivity

•Ultra-thin & lightweight construction


Why choose the Fusion Writer?

Because it has all the necessary features for dependable writing anywhere and anytime:

•Permanent autosave (anything you type will be saved automatically)

•Complete word processor and document editor (custom Android application to be developed)

•Multi-sharing (upload your document anywhere via Bluetooth or WiFi)

•Built-in dictionaries and thesaurus for reference

•Built-in default Android email and browser applications

The Fusion Writer will allow anyone who wants to write, blog or work on their novel to be able to do it anywhere. Want to go fishing or camping and work on some short stories amidst the wildlife? Why not? The durable and waterproof construction will allow you to write without worrying about battery life or dropping. 

Most writers spend an extended time writing and reading in front of a computer screen. This strains and hurts the eyes. The Fusion Writer's high contrast, E-ink screen will allow you to keep writing or reading without negatively impacting your vision.

What do writer's usually crave for? Distraction-free writing. With the Fusion Writer, this is as close as you can possibly get. Open it up and start writing! The built-in browser allows you to search for any information or catch up on the news.

Spilled some coffee? No problem, rinse it off the Fusion Writer and keep writing. Want to read an ebook or edit a document? The Fusion Writer will allow you to read any book with its e-ink screen and multi-format support. Plus, if you do run out of battery life, leave it in the sun to re-charge in a few hours.

The Fusion Writer is now just a concept, but with help it can become a real product that will work for and not against writers.

Currently, this project is intended to raise money to build and test a fully-functional prototype. With your help the prototype will allow us to build a complete working final product and launch it into production. All orders for the final product will be accepted online and will be hand-assembled.

Why $50,000?

- To choose appropriate internal components 
- Programming the device to work flawlessly 
- Develop several working prototypes 
- Test the device for waterproofing, drop resistance and dust- proofing (several prototypes will be destroyed during the testing process) 
- Developing a custom word processing application for Android OS 
- Testing for overall reliability (quality assurance testing) 
- Marketing the device and preparing post-production 
- Launching the device for purchase online
- Packaging with recyclable materials

The fully working prototype may take OVER A YEAR to develop. Choosing the correct parts for assembly and experimenting with materials (3D printing) will allow the development process to minimize costs and determine the optimum parts. Testing the prototype, revising and assembling from scratch will take time and effort.

The schedule to develop the prototype into a fully-fledged product will be roughly the following:

December 2015 - Fusion Writer Beta (working test prototype) 
Funding needed - $50,000

April 2016 - Fusion Writer (production launch) 
Available for custom order online

story:
Aikido Without Borders

Since 2008 Aikido Without Borders has been promoting the development of Aikido in both Israel and Palestine. 

In 2016 the Palestinian Aikido community made the big step of creating the Palestinian Aikido Federation, a fully independent Aikido body for the promotion of Aikido culture and education in Palestine. 

Yet, as you can imagine, the Palestinian Aikido Federation faces many political, social, and economic challenges. 

As a fledgling organization, they do not have official recognition from the Aikikai Foundation in Japan. Gaining their Dan ranks from the Aikikai is an important step in gaining international recognition from the Aikikai.

However, the economic situation in Palestine is underdeveloped. And with the current Covid-19 pandemic it has gotten even worse. Palestinian Aikidoka simply do not have the funds to pay for their Aikikai ranks...  This is where you come in!  
 

Support The Aikidoka In Palestine For Their Aikikai Dan Ranks! 

Here are the details and needs:

  • Currently, there are 7 Palestinian Aikidoka who have achieved the necessary requirements for their next dan rank; 4 for the rank of Shodan, and 3 students for the rank of Nidan.
  • The 3 Nidan candidates are currently Aikido instructors who are teaching adults and children in both urban centers and in refugee camps.
  • The total amount needed for ranks and Aikikai membership is $2,000 (includes dan rank application fees, admin costs, and taxes).
     

The Challenge Of "Normalization"

The political situation between Israel and Palestine is extremely complicated. The Palestinians in the West Bank are extremely concerned with any activities that appear as "normalizing" relations with Israel.

As an Israeli NPO, Aikido Without Borders strives to respect the concerns of our Palestinian friends by avoiding the appearance of "normalization" of relations.

For this reason, this campaign is not public. It is also why we are posting no photos.

This request for support is a personal outreach, and I ask you to please not share this publicly. 

Sharing it with personal friends and contacts is both welcome and appreciated.

story:
“For it is in giving that we receive” - St. Francis of Assisi -

We are a group of friends that over the years has dedicated time to various fundraising projects for people in need. After our success with our previous project “Hygiene Project” that made the construction of toilets at a primary school in Ghana, Africa, possible, we are now moving forward with a new project!

“The School Project” aims to fundraise money for the purchase of desks and chairs for the classrooms at a vocational school at Kumasi area in Ghana. The school is a recently constructed school, fundraised by the non-profit organization Enliven Mamma Africa. The purpose of the school is to educate girls on various skills in order to become financially independent when they become adults e.g. cooking, sewing, hairdressing, soap making and etc.  Currently, the school is in need of desks and chairs for its 6 classrooms.

We believe that building a healthy learning environment by providing the basics can contribute to a productive and beneficial education!

A small donation can go a long way! A desk or a chair can make a lot of difference!

story:
Kamibot Pi is a creative coding robot that can teach your child coding step-by-step through fun activities outlined in our curriculum. Whether you are coding for the first time or you’ve learned some Scratch in school, Kamibot Pi is a fun and easy way to learn functional coding.

 

Kamibot started with the idea of creating moving interactive papercrafts, and evolved into  teaching young students to code with an interactive robot. Our goal was to create a robot that was perfect for the school desk with a few more features that will allow the teachers to do more for their lesson plans. Kamibot Pi also complies with Japanese National standards for STEAM robots used in coding education.

 

Ever worry about how to teach your child or students coding? You're not alone. We have many teachers in Korea who were just as lost as you might be. We've created a curriculum to guide your students step-by-step to becoming self sufficient coders.

 Coding with Action Cards:

Kamibot Pi is codable with command cards straight out of the box. Kids can feed the cards to Kamibot Pi and see the commands come to life. Not needing a smart device to code their robots is a relief for many teachers and parents who do not have access to a tablet device.

 

Coding with the RoCoCon (Remote Control):

 Kamibot Pi is also codable with the RoCoCon (Short for Robot Coding Controller)!  The remote control will only be available to backers at specific reward tiers.

 

 

Graphical coding with our Kamicard app allows users to pick commands based on the images on each card.

Block-based coding with our Kamiblock 3.0 introduces more structure and more advanced commands for coding Kamibot Pi.

 Seasoned coders can take Kamibot Pi to the next level with Python coding.

 

Children can explore their artistic creativity through coding. A few adjustments to your code here and there show up as new shapes and drawings.

If you can code it, Kamibot will draw it.
 
 
 
Team up with your friends and play an arcade classic.
 

  Collaborate with your friends on cool projects like recreating the solar system. Code the path of Earth’s orbit around the sun and the Moon’s orbit around the Earth.

Work together with your friends to clean up our oceans of trash.
Challenge your friends to see who can code their robot to catch the most fish.
 

 Our new Kamibot skins don’t only give Kamibot a cool new look. These skins give children a hands-on approach to purposeful coding. 
 
 

Our in-depth curriculum and multitude of activities will help boost your child’s critical thinking and problem solving skills.

Our coding apps are easy to use and are designed so that you can learn coding at your own pace. If you want just want to remotely control Kamibot Pi we have an app for that too.

 

 

We’ve redone our block-based coding app. The new and improved Kamiblock 3.0 will support the “multiple robot coding” that a lot of our teachers were requesting. This is exciting news for kids that want to code multiple robots to perform cooperative tasks.

Kamibot Pi is a perfect coding robot for children from ages 3 and up. Kamibot Pi’s coding curriculum makes it great for use in schools, academies, Montessori schools, and at home.

 Follow along with the video and learn how to code your Kamibot Pi to move like a caterpillar using Kamiblock 3.0. 

We are still working on Kamiblock3.0  and will be releasing it for download before we ship to our backers. 

 

 

 

The Kamibot team first launched Kamibot on Kickstarter in 2016. After years of data and working with teachers and educators, we’ve been able to put together a coding curriculum that will make a difference in the way your child or students learn to code. We’re launching Kamibot Pi to share the culmination of research and feedback from hundreds of parents and teachers that are educating the next generation of humankind.

Risks and challenges

The Kamibot team has been at this since 2015. This is our second time around with Kickstarter, and we have a team that are familiar with the challenges that need to be overcome in order to deliver a quality product to our backers. As with any production, problems may arise by some unforeseen act of nature affecting the delivery date. In the case that delays do arise, we will be transparent and keep our backers informed.
story_txt:
Kamibot Pi is a creative coding robot that can teach your child coding step-by-step through fun activities outlined in our curriculum. Whether you are coding for the first time or you’ve learned some Scratch in school, Kamibot Pi is a fun and easy way to learn functional coding. Kamibot started with the idea of creating moving interactive papercrafts, and evolved into  teaching young students to code with an interactive robot. Our goal was to create a robot that was perfect for the school desk with a few more features that will allow the teachers to do more for their lesson plans. Kamibot Pi also complies with Japanese National standards for STEAM robots used in coding education. Ever worry about how to teach your child or students coding? You're not alone. We have many teachers in Korea who were just as lost as you might be. We've created a curriculum to guide your students step-by-step to becoming self sufficient coders. Coding with Action Cards:Kamibot Pi is codable with command cards straight out of the box. Kids can feed the cards to Kamibot Pi and see the commands come to life. Not needing a smart device to code their robots is a relief for many teachers and parents who do not have access to a tablet device. Coding with the RoCoCon (Remote Control): Kamibot Pi is also codable with the RoCoCon (Short for Robot Coding Controller)!  The remote control will only be available to backers at specific reward tiers.  Graphical coding with our Kamicard app allows users to pick commands based on the images on each card.Block-based coding with our Kamiblock 3.0 introduces more structure and more advanced commands for coding Kamibot Pi. Seasoned coders can take Kamibot Pi to the next level with Python coding. Children can explore their artistic creativity through coding. A few adjustments to your code here and there show up as new shapes and drawings.If you can code it, Kamibot will draw it.   Team up with your friends and play an arcade classic.   Collaborate with your friends on cool projects like recreating the solar system. Code the path of Earth’s orbit around the sun and the Moon’s orbit around the Earth.Work together with your friends to clean up our oceans of trash.

Challenge your friends to see who can code their robot to catch the most fish.

 


 Our new Kamibot skins don’t only give Kamibot a cool new look. These skins give children a hands-on approach to purposeful coding.

story:
Have you ever wondered how Instagram filters work?

Or, how computers perform face detection in crowds?

Are you curious how virtual meeting applications blur the background or replace the background with other images?

How do self-driving cars navigate safely in a busy city environment?

Also, isn’t it amazing how the ball is tracked with such accuracy in televised sporting events such as Tennis, Soccer, and Basketball?

If we’ve piqued your curiosity then this course is what you need. Show your support by backing us right away and learn about topics in Computer Vision such as Object Tracking, Augmented Reality, Face Detection, Optical Flow, Human Pose Estimation and many more.



 

 

Unlike many Computer Vision courses available online, this hands-on course approaches Computer Vision more practically, experientially and intuitively. All you need is a working knowledge of the Python programming language. And, if you are not confident about your Python skills, we will direct you to some of the best-curated resources on Python, so that you come up to speed with Python in the shortest possible time.

In short, beginners, coding enthusiasts, start-up owners, Tony Stark fans - everyone is welcome to this introductory course.

 

 

 

 

 

OpenCV is the largest and the most popular Computer Vision library in the world. It is utilized by thousands of companies, products and devices, and is tested for scalability and performance every single day. 

We, at OpenCV.org, are on a mission to educate a global workforce. We have been offering very comprehensive online courses in Computer Vision to professionals, job-seekers and enthusiasts from over 100 countries.

 

After the success of our first Kickstarter campaign in 2019, AI Courses By OpenCV.org, we want to make the practical knowledge of Computer Vision available to anyone who is interested in entering the world of Computer Vision. All we need is your support!


 

  • Designed By Industry Experts: OpenCV For Beginners has been designed by our team of engineers and researchers, currently working in the field of Computer Vision and Deep Learning.

  • Powered By Python: The programming language of choice for this course is Python, one of the most comprehensive and widely used languages in AI.

  • Foundational & Experiential Learning: This course will help you develop essential understanding and practice of the subject matter before committing to more intermediate and advanced learning paths. This has been done using real-life examples which can be executed using your own data as well. As you proceed through the course, regular quizzes will also keep testing your level of understanding while providing important feedback to you.

  • Practical & Intuitive:  The field of Computer Vision contains many theoretical underpinnings which can become a stumbling block for beginners, especially, when courses contain heavy mathematics. With this in mind, we have created this course with an emphasis on understanding through concrete, practical examples and explanations based on intuition rather than detailed mathematics which are covered in our advanced courses.

 

Once the course begins, we will provide you with extensive forum support in order to get you and your system ready for the course. We will always be there with you to troubleshoot any technical issues associated with software installation or executing any of the code provided in the course. Your questions will be answered by a team of instructors. In addition, we encourage you to brainstorm with your peers in the discussion forum and maybe even find a future collaborator to work with.

 

Each module in this well-structured course contains a tutorial introduction to a particular topic. This is followed by an application example to further reinforce the concepts. In these tutorials, we aim to provide the intuition necessary for true understanding as well as an explanation of the code. The applications developed in this course will be something you can actually use and build upon.

 

The unique curriculum offered in this course is aimed at providing you with a solid foundation in the field of Computer Vision. We will take great pride in each and everyone who completes it successfully. Upon completion of the course, we will award you with a digital certificate from OpenCV.org. You can showcase it across your social profiles and give a kickstart to your career and continued studies in the field of Computer Vision.

 

It’s a lucky day! It’s a lucky course!

With just a few clicks, you can show your support to us. In return, we will show our appreciation and let you in on our special Indiegogo deals. These deals are exclusively for our Indiegogo backers and won’t be available once the campaign ends.

Extraordinary discount on OpenCV For Beginners course

Heavy discounts on all ‘Add-Ons’

All our popular courses offered as ‘Add-Ons’ at huge discounts 

No deadline for course completion; complete the course and earn your certificate at your own pace

 

This course also gives you a fantastic chance to win lifetime access to another course of your choice. All you need to do is submit a project that you created during the course, end up in the top three of all submissions and get lifetime access to a course of your choice for FREE along with getting featured on the OpenCV.org website.

 

 

Have a look at some of the applications we plan to offer in this course.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Getting Started With Images

  • Image basics (reading, displaying and writing images)
  • Working with video files (reading, displaying and writing videos)
  • Color space conversion and different color spaces
  • Basic image manipulation (resizing, cropping, annotating, creating a Region of Interest)

Basic Image Operations

  • Mathematical operations on images (brightness and contrast)
  • Image thresholding, bitwise operations and masking
  • Image blending and the alpha channel

Image Enhancement Techniques

  • Image filtering using convolution
  • Image blurring, noise reduction and sharpness
  • Artistic rendering

Image Analysis

  • Edge detection
  • Hough transforms
  • Contour and shape detection
  • Working with different types of image data such as satellite imagery

Augmented Reality

  • ArUco markers and augmented reality
  • Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) using gestures

Computational Photography

  • Image restoration

Image Retrieval and Object Detection

  • Finding good features in images like SIFT, ORB
  • Image hashing
  • Geometric transformations like affine transformation and homography

Video Processing

  • Object tracking
  • Optical flow and motion estimation

OpenCV DNN Module

  • OpenCV DNN inference module
  • Face detection using Deep Learning
  • Object detection using Deep Learning
  • Human pose estimation using Deep Learning

Text In Images (OCR)

  • Text spotting and detection using Deep Learning
  • Text recognition and Optical Character Recognition (OCR) using Deep Learning

Using OpenCV High-Level GUI For Creating Applications

  • Using mouse and keyboard with OpenCV

Creating Web Applications Using Streamlit

  • Streamlit framework for building web-based applications

Ethical And Socially Responsible Ways Of Using OpenCV

 

 
Check out the video to know about the various rewards and combos:
 
 

NOTE: For combos that include an OAK-D, the prices shown do not include SHIPPING and TAXES. These additional charges may be substantial for non-US residents.

 

This course is designed to build a strong foundation in Computer Vision. You will get a solid understanding of all the tools in OpenCV for Image Processing, Computer Vision, Video Processing and the basics of AI.

  •  Available in Python and C++ 

 

In this course, you will build systems or applications using the techniques learnt in the first course as well as some new ones. We also cover a substantial amount of Machine Learning and the basics of Deep Learning in this course. We will also build interesting web applications as part of the course curriculum.

  •  Available in Python and C++ 

 

In this course, we will start with a theoretical understanding of simple neural nets and gradually move to Deep Neural Networks and Convolutional Neural Networks.

Not only will we go over Deep Network architectures used for solving various Computer Vision problems, we will also go over practical considerations needed to successfully train Deep Neural Networks. These include how to prepare datasets; how to perform sanity checks before embarking on training which usually takes hours; how to use visualization tools to debug the training process; which workflows to use when the results are not satisfactory; and finally, how to deploy your network on the cloud.

  • Students will get 100 Free GPU hours of Azure credits to be used with Microsoft Azure Cloud Services
  •  Please refer to the link below to learn more about our existing course offerings: https://opencv.org/courses/ 
 
 

 

OpenCV For Beginners is a hitchhiker's guide to Computer Vision. Through this campaign we are offering significantly discounted ‘Add-Ons’ on existing courses as well. Here’s what’s being offered:

 

 

NOTE: The price for OAK-D shown does not include SHIPPING and TAXES. These additional charges may be substantial for non-US residents.

OpenCV for Beginners will be available from September 2021. 

All existing courses that are part of Combos and Add-ons will be available by end of July 2021.

OAK-D Shipping will commence in July 2021.

DL with TensorFlow and Keras will be available from December 2021.

 

 

 

 

All courses offered in our Kickstarter bundles, including OpenCV For Beginners, are the only official and certified courses by OpenCV.org available online.

The courses are created in collaboration with Big Vision LLC, a California-based Computer Vision and Machine Learning consulting company. Big Vision LLC owns the popular Computer Vision blog LearnOpenCV.com, and is the exclusive and official course provider of OpenCV.org. Have a look at the industry experts that form our core course team.


 

  • One of the top 30 AI influencers to follow on Twitter as per IBM Watson blog (2017)
  • Alumnus of Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur and Ph.D. from the University of California (San Diego)
  • Author of Computer Vision blog LearnOpenCV.com
  • Work featured in publications such as BBC, Time, Huffington Post, Wall Street Journal, Oprah Magazine, TechCrunch and TheRegister.co.uk

 

  • BS from University of California, Berkeley and Ph.D. from Boston University in AI, Machine Learning and Neuro-Modelling
  • Served as a Visiting Professor at Computer Science Department, Stanford University for 7 years
  • Founder of the most powerful and popular Computer Vision library in the world, OpenCV.org
  • Organized the Computer Vision team for Stanley, the autonomous car that won the $2M DARPA Grand Challenge and currently displayed at the Smithsonian Air and Space Museum

 

  • Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of South Florida
  • Pioneered the development of automated systems for the Deaf community, helping them sign and communicate with others by translating American Sign Language to English text
  • Published multiple research papers in top scientific conferences including IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, and high-impact scientific journals such as IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

 

  • AI & Computer Vision Researcher and an Alumnus of Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bangalore
  • Leading planning and development of our Computer Vision and AI courses, in partnership with OpenCV
  • Over a decade of rich experience as Professor, AI Engineer and Data Scientist
  • Worked on various Deep Learning and Computer Vision projects with Samsung and Snapdeal
  • Interested in doing research in the field of Machine Perception, Scene Understanding, Deep Learning and Robotics

 

  • Masters degree in Aeronautics and Astronautics from Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), including graduate course work in Machine Learning and Image Processing at Stanford University
  • Extensive experience in the space science and defense industries, supporting several major development programs and research efforts for over two decades
  • Background in modelling and simulations, satellite systems, orbital analysis and machine learning

 

Risks and challenges

Our risk assessment to roll out the product is LOW with HIGH DEGREE of DELIVERY CONFIDENCE in September 2021. We have completed the course design and are in the advanced stages of development. We have a strong track record of successfully delivering AI, Computer Vision and Deep Learning courses. AI professionals and enthusiasts from more than 100 countries have benefited from our courses. Our course instructors are truly world-class with exceptional credentials in AI and Computer Vision research, education and consulting.

story:
Mumtaz's story

My Name is Mumtaz Ahmed Ahmed. I belong to Khuzdar, a city in Balochistan, which is one the most conflict effected and underdeveloped regions of Pakistan. Despite the odds, with the support of my parents I graduated from the University of Karachi where I studied International Relations in 2017. As a student I was active in supporting students rights, organizing and participating in sit ins and protests to ensure better provision of educational facilities for my fellow students. After graduation I have worked with different  NGOs on peace building, gender equality, health and education. I worked as a Union council, Communication Officer at the World Health Organization from 2018 to 2020 and I am presently teaching at the  Lasbela University of Agriculture Water and Marine Science. 

Recently, I secured admission in the MSc programme  "Climate Change and International Development" at the University of East Anglia UK with 80% scholarship. I am raising funds for  the rest of my tuition fees and living expenses. While I am continuing to save what I earn, given the exchange rate it will not be enough to fund the remaining 20% for which I am now raising funds. Please do consider contributing to support my further studies. My session will begin in September. Your small contribution make a huge difference for me. Thanking you for your support.
